00010 (function( $, undefined ) {
00011 
00012 // prevent duplicate loading
00013 // this is only a problem because we proxy existing functions
00014 // and we don't want to double proxy them
00015 $.ui = $.ui || {};
00016 if ( $.ui.version ) {
00017       return;
00018 }
00019 
00020 //Helper functions and ui object
00021 $.extend( $.ui, {
00022       version: "1.8.4",
00023 
00024       // $.ui.plugin is deprecated.  Use the proxy pattern instead.
00025       plugin: {
00026             add: function( module, option, set ) {
00027                   var proto = $.ui[ moduleÂ ].prototype;
00028                   for ( var i in set ) {
00029                         proto.plugins[ i ] = proto.plugins[ i ] || [];
00030                         proto.plugins[ i ].push( [ option, set[ i ] ] );
00031                   }
00032             },
00033             call: function( instance, name, args ) {
00034                   var set = instance.plugins[ name ];
00035                   if ( !set || !instance.element[ 0 ].parentNode ) {
00036                         return;
00037                   }
00038 
00039                   for ( var i = 0; i < set.length; i++ ) {
00040                         if ( instance.options[ set[ i ][ 0 ] ] ) {
00041                               set[ i ][ 1 ].apply( instance.element, args );
00042                         }
00043                   }
00044             }
00045       },
00046 
00047       contains: function( a, b ) {
00048             return document.compareDocumentPosition ?
00049                   a.compareDocumentPosition( b ) & 16 :
00050                   a !== b && a.contains( b );
00051       },
00052 
00053       hasScroll: function( el, a ) {
00054 
00055             //If overflow is hidden, the element might have extra content, but the user wants to hide it
00056             if ( $( el ).css( "overflow" ) === "hidden") {
00057                   return false;
00058             }
00059 
00060             var scroll = ( a && a === "left" ) ? "scrollLeft" : "scrollTop",
00061                   has = false;
00062 
00063             if ( el[ scroll ] > 0 ) {
00064                   return true;
00065             }
00066 
00067             // TODO: determine which cases actually cause this to happen
00068             // if the element doesn't have the scroll set, see if it's possible to
00069             // set the scroll
00070             el[ scroll ] = 1;
00071             has = ( el[ scroll ] > 0 );
00072             el[ scroll ] = 0;
00073             return has;
00074       },
00075 
00076       isOverAxis: function( x, reference, size ) {
00077             //Determines when x coordinate is over "b" element axis
00078             return ( x > reference ) && ( x < ( reference + size ) );
00079       },
00080 
00081       isOver: function( y, x, top, left, height, width ) {
00082             //Determines when x, y coordinates is over "b" element
00083             return $.ui.isOverAxis( y, top, height ) && $.ui.isOverAxis( x, left, width );
00084       },
00085 
00086       keyCode: {
00087             ALT: 18,
00088             BACKSPACE: 8,
00089             CAPS_LOCK: 20,
00090             COMMA: 188,
00091             COMMAND: 91,
00092             COMMAND_LEFT: 91, // COMMAND
00093             COMMAND_RIGHT: 93,
00094             CONTROL: 17,
00095             DELETE: 46,
00096             DOWN: 40,
00097             END: 35,
00098             ENTER: 13,
00099             ESCAPE: 27,
00100             HOME: 36,
00101             INSERT: 45,
00102             LEFT: 37,
00103             MENU: 93, // COMMAND_RIGHT
00104             NUMPAD_ADD: 107,
00105             NUMPAD_DECIMAL: 110,
00106             NUMPAD_DIVIDE: 111,
00107             NUMPAD_ENTER: 108,
00108             NUMPAD_MULTIPLY: 106,
00109             NUMPAD_SUBTRACT: 109,
00110             PAGE_DOWN: 34,
00111             PAGE_UP: 33,
00112             PERIOD: 190,
00113             RIGHT: 39,
00114             SHIFT: 16,
00115             SPACE: 32,
00116             TAB: 9,
00117             UP: 38,
00118             WINDOWS: 91 // COMMAND
00119       }

00122 //jQuery plugins
00123 $.fn.extend({
00124       _focus: $.fn.focus,
00125       focus: function( delay, fn ) {
00126             return typeof delay === "number" ?
00127                   this.each(function() {
00128                         var elem = this;
00129                         setTimeout(function() {
00130                               $( elem ).focus();
00131                               if ( fn ) {
00132                                     fn.call( elem );
00133                               }
00134                         }, delay );
00135                   }) :
00136                   this._focus.apply( this, arguments );
00137       },
00138 
00139       enableSelection: function() {
00140             return this
00141                   .attr( "unselectable", "off" )
00142                   .css( "MozUserSelect", "" );
00143       },
00144 
00145       disableSelection: function() {
00146             return this
00147                   .attr( "unselectable", "on" )
00148                   .css( "MozUserSelect", "none" );
00149       },
00150 
00151       scrollParent: function() {
00152             var scrollParent;
00153             if (($.browser.msie && (/(static|relative)/).test(this.css('position'))) || (/absolute/).test(this.css('position'))) {
00154                   scrollParent = this.parents().filter(function() {
00155                         return (/(relative|absolute|fixed)/).test($.curCSS(this,'position',1)) && (/(auto|scroll)/).test($.curCSS(this,'overflow',1)+$.curCSS(this,'overflow-y',1)+$.curCSS(this,'overflow-x',1));
00156                   }).eq(0);
00157             } else {
00158                   scrollParent = this.parents().filter(function() {
00159                         return (/(auto|scroll)/).test($.curCSS(this,'overflow',1)+$.curCSS(this,'overflow-y',1)+$.curCSS(this,'overflow-x',1));
00160                   }).eq(0);
00161             }
00162 
00163             return (/fixed/).test(this.css('position')) || !scrollParent.length ? $(document) : scrollParent;
00164       },
00165 
00166       zIndex: function( zIndex ) {
00167             if ( zIndex !== undefined ) {
00168                   return this.css( "zIndex", zIndex );
00169             }
00170 
00171             if ( this.length ) {
00172                   var elem = $( this[ 0 ] ), position, value;
00173                   while ( elem.length && elem[ 0 ] !== document ) {
00174                         // Ignore z-index if position is set to a value where z-index is ignored by the browser
00175                         // This makes behavior of this function consistent across browsers
00176                         // WebKit always returns auto if the element is positioned
00177                         position = elem.css( "position" );
00178                         if ( position === "absolute" || position === "relative" || position === "fixed" ) {
00179                               // IE returns 0 when zIndex is not specified
00180                               // other browsers return a string
00181                               // we ignore the case of nested elements with an explicit value of 0
00182                               // <div style="z-index: -10;"><div style="z-index: 0;"></div></div>
00183                               value = parseInt( elem.css( "zIndex" ) );
00184                               if ( !isNaN( value ) && value != 0 ) {
00185                                     return value;
00186                               }
00187                         }
00188                         elem = elem.parent();
00189                   }
00190             }
00191 
00192             return 0;
00193       }
00194 });
00195 
00196 $.each( [ "Width", "Height" ], function( i, name ) {
00197       var side = name === "Width" ? [ "Left", "Right" ] : [ "Top", "Bottom" ],
00198             type = name.toLowerCase(),
00199             orig = {
00200                   innerWidth: $.fn.innerWidth,
00201                   innerHeight: $.fn.innerHeight,
00202                   outerWidth: $.fn.outerWidth,
00203                   outerHeight: $.fn.outerHeight
00204             };
00205 
00206       function reduce( elem, size, border, margin ) {
00207             $.each( side, function() {
00208                   size -= parseFloat( $.curCSS( elem, "padding" + this, true) ) || 0;
00209                   if ( border ) {
00210                         size -= parseFloat( $.curCSS( elem, "border" + this + "Width", true) ) || 0;
00211                   }
00212                   if ( margin ) {
00213                         size -= parseFloat( $.curCSS( elem, "margin" + this, true) ) || 0;
00214                   }
00215             });
00216             return size;
00217       }
00218 
00219       $.fn[ "inner" + name ] = function( size ) {
00220             if ( size === undefined ) {
00221                   return orig[ "inner" + name ].call( this );
00222             }
00223 
00224             return this.each(function() {
00225                   $.style( this, type, reduce( this, size ) + "px" );
00226             });
00227       };
00228 
00229       $.fn[ "outer" + name] = function( size, margin ) {
00230             if ( typeof size !== "number" ) {
00231                   return orig[ "outer" + name ].call( this, size );
00232             }
00233 
00234             return this.each(function() {
00235                   $.style( this, type, reduce( this, size, true, margin ) + "px" );
00236             });
00237       };
00238 });
00239 
00240 //Additional selectors
00241 function visible( element ) {
00242       return !$( element ).parents().andSelf().filter(function() {
00243             return $.curCSS( this, "visibility" ) === "hidden" ||
00244                   $.expr.filters.hidden( this );
00245       }).length;
00246 }
00247 
00248 $.extend( $.expr[ ":" ], {
00249       data: function( elem, i, match ) {
00250             return !!$.data( elem, match[ 3 ] );
00251       },
00252 
00253       focusable: function( element ) {
00254             var nodeName = element.nodeName.toLowerCase(),
00255                   tabIndex = $.attr( element, "tabindex" );
00256             if ( "area" === nodeName ) {
00257                   var map = element.parentNode,
00258                         mapName = map.name,
00259                         img;
00260                   if ( !element.href || !mapName || map.nodeName.toLowerCase() !== "map" ) {
00261                         return false;
00262                   }
00263                   img = $( "img[usemap=#" + mapName + "]" )[0];
00264                   return !!img && visible( img );
00265             }
00266             return ( /input|select|textarea|button|object/.test( nodeName )
00267                   ? !element.disabled
00268                   : "a" == nodeName
00269                         ? element.href || !isNaN( tabIndex )
00270                         : !isNaN( tabIndex ))
00271                   // the element and all of its ancestors must be visible
00272                   && visible( element );
00273       },
00274 
00275       tabbable: function( element ) {
00276             var tabIndex = $.attr( element, "tabindex" );
00277             return ( isNaN( tabIndex ) || tabIndex >= 0 ) && $( element ).is( ":focusable" );
00278       }
00279 });
00280 
00281 })( jQuery );
00291 (function( $, undefined ) {
00292 
00293 var _remove = $.fn.remove;
00294 
00295 $.fn.remove = function( selector, keepData ) {
00296       return this.each(function() {
00297             if ( !keepData ) {
00298                   if ( !selector || $.filter( selector, [ this ] ).length ) {
00299                         $( "*", this ).add( [ this ] ).each(function() {
00300                               $( this ).triggerHandler( "remove" );
00301                         });
00302                   }
00303             }
00304             return _remove.call( $(this), selector, keepData );
00305       });
00306 };
00307 
00308 $.widget = function( name, base, prototype ) {
00309       var namespace = name.split( "." )[ 0 ],
00310             fullName;
00311       name = name.split( "." )[ 1 ];
00312       fullName = namespace + "-" + name;
00313 
00314       if ( !prototype ) {
00315             prototype = base;
00316             base = $.Widget;
00317       }
00318 
00319       // create selector for plugin
00320       $.expr[ ":" ][ fullName ] = function( elem ) {
00321             return !!$.data( elem, name );
00322       };
00323 
00324       $[ namespace ] = $[ namespace ] || {};
00325       $[ namespace ][ name ] = function( options, element ) {
00326             // allow instantiation without initializing for simple inheritance
00327             if ( arguments.length ) {
00328                   this._createWidget( options, element );
00329             }
00330       };
00331 
00332       var basePrototype = new base();
00333       // we need to make the options hash a property directly on the new instance
00334       // otherwise we'll modify the options hash on the prototype that we're
00335       // inheriting from
00336 //    $.each( basePrototype, function( key, val ) {
00337 //          if ( $.isPlainObject(val) ) {
00338 //                basePrototype[ key ] = $.extend( {}, val );
00339 //          }
00340 //    });
00341       basePrototype.options = $.extend( true, {}, basePrototype.options );
00342       $[ namespace ][ name ].prototype = $.extend( true, basePrototype, {
00343             namespace: namespace,
00344             widgetName: name,
00345             widgetEventPrefix: $[ namespace ][ name ].prototype.widgetEventPrefix || name,
00346             widgetBaseClass: fullName
00347       }, prototype );
00348 
00349       $.widget.bridge( name, $[ namespace ][ name ] );
00350 };
00351 
00352 $.widget.bridge = function( name, object ) {
00353       $.fn[ name ] = function( options ) {
00354             var isMethodCall = typeof options === "string",
00355                   args = Array.prototype.slice.call( arguments, 1 ),
00356                   returnValue = this;
00357 
00358             // allow multiple hashes to be passed on init
00359             options = !isMethodCall && args.length ?
00360                   $.extend.apply( null, [ true, options ].concat(args) ) :
00361                   options;
00362 
00363             // prevent calls to internal methods
00364             if ( isMethodCall && options.substring( 0, 1 ) === "_" ) {
00365                   return returnValue;
00366             }
00367 
00368             if ( isMethodCall ) {
00369                   this.each(function() {
00370                         var instance = $.data( this, name ),
00371                               methodValue = instance && $.isFunction( instance[options] ) ?
00372                                     instance[ options ].apply( instance, args ) :
00373                                     instance;
00374                         if ( methodValue !== instance && methodValue !== undefined ) {
00375                               returnValue = methodValue;
00376                               return false;
00377                         }
00378                   });
00379             } else {
00380                   this.each(function() {
00381                         var instance = $.data( this, name );
00382                         if ( instance ) {
00383                               if ( options ) {
00384                                     instance.option( options );
00385                               }
00386                               instance._init();
00387                         } else {
00388                               $.data( this, name, new object( options, this ) );
00389                         }
00390                   });
00391             }
00392 
00393             return returnValue;
00394       };
00395 };
00396 
00397 $.Widget = function( options, element ) {
00398       // allow instantiation without initializing for simple inheritance
00399       if ( arguments.length ) {
00400             this._createWidget( options, element );
00401       }
00402 };
00403 
00404 $.Widget.prototype = {
00405       widgetName: "widget",
00406       widgetEventPrefix: "",
00407       options: {
00408             disabled: false
00409       },
00410       _createWidget: function( options, element ) {
00411             // $.widget.bridge stores the plugin instance, but we do it anyway
00412             // so that it's stored even before the _create function runs
00413             $.data( element, this.widgetName, this );
00414             this.element = $( element );
00415             this.options = $.extend( true, {},
00416                   this.options,
00417                   $.metadata && $.metadata.get( element )[ this.widgetName ],
00418                   options );
00419 
00420             var self = this;
00421             this.element.bind( "remove." + this.widgetName, function() {
00422                   self.destroy();
00423             });
00424 
00425             this._create();
00426             this._init();
00427       },
00428       _create: function() {},
00429       _init: function() {},
00430 
00431       destroy: function() {
00432             this.element
00433                   .unbind( "." + this.widgetName )
00434                   .removeData( this.widgetName );
00435             this.widget()
00436                   .unbind( "." + this.widgetName )
00437                   .removeAttr( "aria-disabled" )
00438                   .removeClass(
00439                         this.widgetBaseClass + "-disabled " +
00440                         "ui-state-disabled" );
00441       },
00442 
00443       widget: function() {
00444             return this.element;
00445       },
00446 
00447       option: function( key, value ) {
00448             var options = key,
00449                   self = this;
00450 
00451             if ( arguments.length === 0 ) {
00452                   // don't return a reference to the internal hash
00453                   return $.extend( {}, self.options );
00454             }
00455 
00456             if  (typeof key === "string" ) {
00457                   if ( value === undefined ) {
00458                         return this.options[ key ];
00459                   }
00460                   options = {};
00461                   options[ key ] = value;
00462             }
00463 
00464             $.each( options, function( key, value ) {
00465                   self._setOption( key, value );
00466             });
00467 
00468             return self;
00469       },
00470       _setOption: function( key, value ) {
00471             this.options[ key ] = value;
00472 
00473             if ( key === "disabled" ) {
00474                   this.widget()
00475                         [ value ? "addClass" : "removeClass"](
00476                               this.widgetBaseClass + "-disabled" + " " +
00477                               "ui-state-disabled" )
00478                         .attr( "aria-disabled", value );
00479             }
00480 
00481             return this;
00482       },
00483 
00484       enable: function() {
00485             return this._setOption( "disabled", false );
00486       },
00487       disable: function() {
00488             return this._setOption( "disabled", true );
00489       },
00490 
00491       _trigger: function( type, event, data ) {
00492             var callback = this.options[ type ];
00493 
00494             event = $.Event( event );
00495             event.type = ( type === this.widgetEventPrefix ?
00496                   type :
00497                   this.widgetEventPrefix + type ).toLowerCase();
00498             data = data || {};
00499 
00500             // copy original event properties over to the new event
00501             // this would happen if we could call $.event.fix instead of $.Event
00502             // but we don't have a way to force an event to be fixed multiple times
00503             if ( event.originalEvent ) {
00504                   for ( var i = $.event.props.length, prop; i; ) {
00505                         prop = $.event.props[ --i ];
00506                         event[ prop ] = event.originalEvent[ prop ];
00507                   }
00508             }
00509 
00510             this.element.trigger( event, data );
00511 
00512             return !( $.isFunction(callback) &&
00513                   callback.call( this.element[0], event, data ) === false ||
00514                   event.isDefaultPrevented() );
00515       }
00516 };
00517 
00518 })( jQuery );
00531 (function( $, undefined ) {
00532 
00533 $.widget("ui.mouse", {
00534       options: {
00535             cancel: ':input,option',
00536             distance: 1,
00537             delay: 0
00538       },
00539       _mouseInit: function() {
00540             var self = this;
00541 
00542             this.element
00543                   .bind('mousedown.'+this.widgetName, function(event) {
00544                         return self._mouseDown(event);
00545                   })
00546                   .bind('click.'+this.widgetName, function(event) {
00547                         if(self._preventClickEvent) {
00548                               self._preventClickEvent = false;
00549                               event.stopImmediatePropagation();
00550                               return false;
00551                         }
00552                   });
00553 
00554             this.started = false;
00555       },
00556 
00557       // TODO: make sure destroying one instance of mouse doesn't mess with
00558       // other instances of mouse
00559       _mouseDestroy: function() {
00560             this.element.unbind('.'+this.widgetName);
00561       },
00562 
00563       _mouseDown: function(event) {
00564             // don't let more than one widget handle mouseStart
00565             // TODO: figure out why we have to use originalEvent
00566             event.originalEvent = event.originalEvent || {};
00567             if (event.originalEvent.mouseHandled) { return; }
00568 
00569             // we may have missed mouseup (out of window)
00570             (this._mouseStarted && this._mouseUp(event));
00571 
00572             this._mouseDownEvent = event;
00573 
00574             var self = this,
00575                   btnIsLeft = (event.which == 1),
00576                   elIsCancel = (typeof this.options.cancel == "string" ? $(event.target).parents().add(event.target).filter(this.options.cancel).length : false);
00577             if (!btnIsLeft || elIsCancel || !this._mouseCapture(event)) {
00578                   return true;
00579             }
00580 
00581             this.mouseDelayMet = !this.options.delay;
00582             if (!this.mouseDelayMet) {
00583                   this._mouseDelayTimer = setTimeout(function() {
00584                         self.mouseDelayMet = true;
00585                   }, this.options.delay);
00586             }
00587 
00588             if (this._mouseDistanceMet(event) && this._mouseDelayMet(event)) {
00589                   this._mouseStarted = (this._mouseStart(event) !== false);
00590                   if (!this._mouseStarted) {
00591                         event.preventDefault();
00592                         return true;
00593                   }
00594             }
00595 
00596             // these delegates are required to keep context
00597             this._mouseMoveDelegate = function(event) {
00598                   return self._mouseMove(event);
00599             };
00600             this._mouseUpDelegate = function(event) {
00601                   return self._mouseUp(event);
00602             };
00603             $(document)
00604                   .bind('mousemove.'+this.widgetName, this._mouseMoveDelegate)
00605                   .bind('mouseup.'+this.widgetName, this._mouseUpDelegate);
00606 
00607             // preventDefault() is used to prevent the selection of text here -
00608             // however, in Safari, this causes select boxes not to be selectable
00609             // anymore, so this fix is needed
00610             ($.browser.safari || event.preventDefault());
00611 
00612             event.originalEvent.mouseHandled = true;
00613             return true;
00614       },
00615 
00616       _mouseMove: function(event) {
00617             // IE mouseup check - mouseup happened when mouse was out of window
00618             if ($.browser.msie && !event.button) {
00619                   return this._mouseUp(event);
00620             }
00621 
00622             if (this._mouseStarted) {
00623                   this._mouseDrag(event);
00624                   return event.preventDefault();
00625             }
00626 
00627             if (this._mouseDistanceMet(event) && this._mouseDelayMet(event)) {
00628                   this._mouseStarted =
00629                         (this._mouseStart(this._mouseDownEvent, event) !== false);
00630                   (this._mouseStarted ? this._mouseDrag(event) : this._mouseUp(event));
00631             }
00632 
00633             return !this._mouseStarted;
00634       },
00635 
00636       _mouseUp: function(event) {
00637             $(document)
00638                   .unbind('mousemove.'+this.widgetName, this._mouseMoveDelegate)
00639                   .unbind('mouseup.'+this.widgetName, this._mouseUpDelegate);
00640 
00641             if (this._mouseStarted) {
00642                   this._mouseStarted = false;
00643                   this._preventClickEvent = (event.target == this._mouseDownEvent.target);
00644                   this._mouseStop(event);
00645             }
00646 
00647             return false;
00648       },
00649 
00650       _mouseDistanceMet: function(event) {
00651             return (Math.max(
00652                         Math.abs(this._mouseDownEvent.pageX - event.pageX),
00653                         Math.abs(this._mouseDownEvent.pageY - event.pageY)
00654                   ) >= this.options.distance
00655             );
00656       },
00657 
00658       _mouseDelayMet: function(event) {
00659             return this.mouseDelayMet;
00660       },
00661 
00662       // These are placeholder methods, to be overriden by extending plugin
00663       _mouseStart: function(event) {},
00664       _mouseDrag: function(event) {},
00665       _mouseStop: function(event) {},
00666       _mouseCapture: function(event) { return true; }
00667 });
00668 
00669 })(jQuery);
00670 /*
00671  * jQuery UI Position 1.8.4
00672  *
00673  * Copyright 2010, AUTHORS.txt (http://jqueryui.com/about)
00674  * Dual licensed under the MIT or GPL Version 2 licenses.
00675  * http://jquery.org/license
00676  *
00677  * http://docs.jquery.com/UI/Position
00678  */
00679 (function( $, undefined ) {
00680 
00681 $.ui = $.ui || {};
00682 
00683 var horizontalPositions = /left|center|right/,
00684       horizontalDefault = "center",
00685       verticalPositions = /top|center|bottom/,
00686       verticalDefault = "center",
00687       _position = $.fn.position,
00688       _offset = $.fn.offset;
00689 
00690 $.fn.position = function( options ) {
00691       if ( !options || !options.of ) {
00692             return _position.apply( this, arguments );
00693       }
00694 
00695       // make a copy, we don't want to modify arguments
00696       options = $.extend( {}, options );
00697 
00698       var target = $( options.of ),
00699             collision = ( options.collision || "flip" ).split( " " ),
00700             offset = options.offset ? options.offset.split( " " ) : [ 0, 0 ],
00701             targetWidth,
00702             targetHeight,
00703             basePosition;
00704 
00705       if ( options.of.nodeType === 9 ) {
00706             targetWidth = target.width();
00707             targetHeight = target.height();
00708             basePosition = { top: 0, left: 0 };
00709       } else if ( options.of.scrollTo && options.of.document ) {
00710             targetWidth = target.width();
00711             targetHeight = target.height();
00712             basePosition = { top: target.scrollTop(), left: target.scrollLeft() };
00713       } else if ( options.of.preventDefault ) {
00714             // force left top to allow flipping
00715             options.at = "left top";
00716             targetWidth = targetHeight = 0;
00717             basePosition = { top: options.of.pageY, left: options.of.pageX };
00718       } else {
00719             targetWidth = target.outerWidth();
00720             targetHeight = target.outerHeight();
00721             basePosition = target.offset();
00722       }
00723 
00724       // force my and at to have valid horizontal and veritcal positions
00725       // if a value is missing or invalid, it will be converted to center 
00726       $.each( [ "my", "at" ], function() {
00727             var pos = ( options[this] || "" ).split( " " );
00728             if ( pos.length === 1) {
00729                   pos = horizontalPositions.test( pos[0] ) ?
00730                         pos.concat( [verticalDefault] ) :
00731                         verticalPositions.test( pos[0] ) ?
00732                               [ horizontalDefault ].concat( pos ) :
00733                               [ horizontalDefault, verticalDefault ];
00734             }
00735             pos[ 0 ] = horizontalPositions.test( pos[0] ) ? pos[ 0 ] : horizontalDefault;
00736             pos[ 1 ] = verticalPositions.test( pos[1] ) ? pos[ 1 ] : verticalDefault;
00737             options[ this ] = pos;
00738       });
00739 
00740       // normalize collision option
00741       if ( collision.length === 1 ) {
00742             collision[ 1 ] = collision[ 0 ];
00743       }
00744 
00745       // normalize offset option
00746       offset[ 0 ] = parseInt( offset[0], 10 ) || 0;
00747       if ( offset.length === 1 ) {
00748             offset[ 1 ] = offset[ 0 ];
00749       }
00750       offset[ 1 ] = parseInt( offset[1], 10 ) || 0;
00751 
00752       if ( options.at[0] === "right" ) {
00753             basePosition.left += targetWidth;
00754       } else if (options.at[0] === horizontalDefault ) {
00755             basePosition.left += targetWidth / 2;
00756       }
00757 
00758       if ( options.at[1] === "bottom" ) {
00759             basePosition.top += targetHeight;
00760       } else if ( options.at[1] === verticalDefault ) {
00761             basePosition.top += targetHeight / 2;
00762       }
00763 
00764       basePosition.left += offset[ 0 ];
00765       basePosition.top += offset[ 1 ];
00766 
00767       return this.each(function() {
00768             var elem = $( this ),
00769                   elemWidth = elem.outerWidth(),
00770                   elemHeight = elem.outerHeight(),
00771                   position = $.extend( {}, basePosition );
00772 
00773             if ( options.my[0] === "right" ) {
00774                   position.left -= elemWidth;
00775             } else if ( options.my[0] === horizontalDefault ) {
00776                   position.left -= elemWidth / 2;
00777             }
00778 
00779             if ( options.my[1] === "bottom" ) {
00780                   position.top -= elemHeight;
00781             } else if ( options.my[1] === verticalDefault ) {
00782                   position.top -= elemHeight / 2;
00783             }
00784 
00785             // prevent fractions (see #5280)
00786             position.left = parseInt( position.left );
00787             position.top = parseInt( position.top );
00788 
00789             $.each( [ "left", "top" ], function( i, dir ) {
00790                   if ( $.ui.position[ collision[i] ] ) {
00791                         $.ui.position[ collision[i] ][ dir ]( position, {
00792                               targetWidth: targetWidth,
00793                               targetHeight: targetHeight,
00794                               elemWidth: elemWidth,
00795                               elemHeight: elemHeight,
00796                               offset: offset,
00797                               my: options.my,
00798                               at: options.at
00799                         });
00800                   }
00801             });
00802 
00803             if ( $.fn.bgiframe ) {
00804                   elem.bgiframe();
00805             }
00806             elem.offset( $.extend( position, { using: options.using } ) );
00807       });
00808 };
00809 
00810 $.ui.position = {
00811       fit: {
00812             left: function( position, data ) {
00813                   var win = $( window ),
00814                         over = position.left + data.elemWidth - win.width() - win.scrollLeft();
00815                   position.left = over > 0 ? position.left - over : Math.max( 0, position.left );
00816             },
00817             top: function( position, data ) {
00818                   var win = $( window ),
00819                         over = position.top + data.elemHeight - win.height() - win.scrollTop();
00820                   position.top = over > 0 ? position.top - over : Math.max( 0, position.top );
00821             }
00822       },
00823 
00824       flip: {
00825             left: function( position, data ) {
00826                   if ( data.at[0] === "center" ) {
00827                         return;
00828                   }
00829                   var win = $( window ),
00830                         over = position.left + data.elemWidth - win.width() - win.scrollLeft(),
00831                         myOffset = data.my[ 0 ] === "left" ?
00832                               -data.elemWidth :
00833                               data.my[ 0 ] === "right" ?
00834                                     data.elemWidth :
00835                                     0,
00836                         offset = -2 * data.offset[ 0 ];
00837                   position.left += position.left < 0 ?
00838                         myOffset + data.targetWidth + offset :
00839                         over > 0 ?
00840                               myOffset - data.targetWidth + offset :
00841                               0;
00842             },
00843             top: function( position, data ) {
00844                   if ( data.at[1] === "center" ) {
00845                         return;
00846                   }
00847                   var win = $( window ),
00848                         over = position.top + data.elemHeight - win.height() - win.scrollTop(),
00849                         myOffset = data.my[ 1 ] === "top" ?
00850                               -data.elemHeight :
00851                               data.my[ 1 ] === "bottom" ?
00852                                     data.elemHeight :
00853                                     0,
00854                         atOffset = data.at[ 1 ] === "top" ?
00855                               data.targetHeight :
00856                               -data.targetHeight,
00857                         offset = -2 * data.offset[ 1 ];
00858                   position.top += position.top < 0 ?
00859                         myOffset + data.targetHeight + offset :
00860                         over > 0 ?
00861                               myOffset + atOffset + offset :
00862                               0;
00863             }
00864       }
00865 };
00866 
00867 // offset setter from jQuery 1.4
00868 if ( !$.offset.setOffset ) {
00869       $.offset.setOffset = function( elem, options ) {
00870             // set position first, in-case top/left are set even on static elem
00871             if ( /static/.test( $.curCSS( elem, "position" ) ) ) {
00872                   elem.style.position = "relative";
00873             }
00874             var curElem   = $( elem ),
00875                   curOffset = curElem.offset(),
00876                   curTop    = parseInt( $.curCSS( elem, "top",  true ), 10 ) || 0,
00877                   curLeft   = parseInt( $.curCSS( elem, "left", true ), 10)  || 0,
00878                   props     = {
00879                         top:  (options.top  - curOffset.top)  + curTop,
00880                         left: (options.left - curOffset.left) + curLeft
00881                   };
00882             
00883             if ( 'using' in options ) {
00884                   options.using.call( elem, props );
00885             } else {
00886                   curElem.css( props );
00887             }
00888       };
00889 
00890       $.fn.offset = function( options ) {
00891             var elem = this[ 0 ];
00892             if ( !elem || !elem.ownerDocument ) { return null; }
00893             if ( options ) { 
00894                   return this.each(function() {
00895                         $.offset.setOffset( this, options );
00896                   });
00897             }
00898             return _offset.call( this );
00899       };
00900 }
00901 
00902 }( jQuery ));
00903 /*
00904  * jQuery UI Draggable 1.8.4
00905  *
00906  * Copyright 2010, AUTHORS.txt (http://jqueryui.com/about)
00907  * Dual licensed under the MIT or GPL Version 2 licenses.
00908  * http://jquery.org/license
00909  *
00910  * http://docs.jquery.com/UI/Draggables
00911  *
00912  * Depends:
00913  *    jquery.ui.core.js
00914  *    jquery.ui.mouse.js
00915  *    jquery.ui.widget.js
00916  */
00917 (function( $, undefined ) {
00918 
00919 $.widget("ui.draggable", $.ui.mouse, {
00920       widgetEventPrefix: "drag",
00921       options: {
00922             addClasses: true,
00923             appendTo: "parent",
00924             axis: false,
00925             connectToSortable: false,
00926             containment: false,
00927             cursor: "auto",
00928             cursorAt: false,
00929             grid: false,
00930             handle: false,
00931             helper: "original",
00932             iframeFix: false,
00933             opacity: false,
00934             refreshPositions: false,
00935             revert: false,
00936             revertDuration: 500,
00937             scope: "default",
00938             scroll: true,
00939             scrollSensitivity: 20,
00940             scrollSpeed: 20,
00941             snap: false,
00942             snapMode: "both",
00943             snapTolerance: 20,
00944             stack: false,
00945             zIndex: false
00946       },
00947       _create: function() {
00948 
00949             if (this.options.helper == 'original' && !(/^(?:r|a|f)/).test(this.element.css("position")))
00950                   this.element[0].style.position = 'relative';
00951 
00952             (this.options.addClasses && this.element.addClass("ui-draggable"));
00953             (this.options.disabled && this.element.addClass("ui-draggable-disabled"));
00954 
00955             this._mouseInit();
00956 
00957       },
00958 
00959       destroy: function() {
00960             if(!this.element.data('draggable')) return;
00961             this.element
00962                   .removeData("draggable")
00963                   .unbind(".draggable")
00964                   .removeClass("ui-draggable"
00965                         + " ui-draggable-dragging"
00966                         + " ui-draggable-disabled");
00967             this._mouseDestroy();
00968 
00969             return this;
00970       },
00971 
00972       _mouseCapture: function(event) {
00973 
00974             var o = this.options;
00975 
00976             // among others, prevent a drag on a resizable-handle
00977             if (this.helper || o.disabled || $(event.target).is('.ui-resizable-handle'))
00978                   return false;
00979 
00980             //Quit if we're not on a valid handle
00981             this.handle = this._getHandle(event);
00982             if (!this.handle)
00983                   return false;
00984 
00985             return true;
00986 
00987       },
00988 
00989       _mouseStart: function(event) {
00990 
00991             var o = this.options;
00992 
00993             //Create and append the visible helper
00994             this.helper = this._createHelper(event);
00995 
00996             //Cache the helper size
00997             this._cacheHelperProportions();
00998 
00999             //If ddmanager is used for droppables, set the global draggable
01000             if($.ui.ddmanager)
01001                   $.ui.ddmanager.current = this;
01002 
01003             /*
01004              * - Position generation -
01005              * This block generates everything position related - it's the core of draggables.
01006              */
01007 
01008             //Cache the margins of the original element
01009             this._cacheMargins();
01010 
01011             //Store the helper's css position
01012             this.cssPosition = this.helper.css("position");
01013             this.scrollParent = this.helper.scrollParent();
01014 
01015             //The element's absolute position on the page minus margins
01016             this.offset = this.positionAbs = this.element.offset();
01017             this.offset = {
01018                   top: this.offset.top - this.margins.top,
01019                   left: this.offset.left - this.margins.left
01020             };
01021 
01022             $.extend(this.offset, {
01023                   click: { //Where the click happened, relative to the element
01024                         left: event.pageX - this.offset.left,
01025                         top: event.pageY - this.offset.top
01026                   },
01027                   parent: this._getParentOffset(),
01028                   relative: this._getRelativeOffset() //This is a relative to absolute position minus the actual position calculation - only used for relative positioned helper
01029             });
01030 
01031             //Generate the original position
01032             this.originalPosition = this.position = this._generatePosition(event);
01033             this.originalPageX = event.pageX;
01034             this.originalPageY = event.pageY;
01035 
01036             //Adjust the mouse offset relative to the helper if 'cursorAt' is supplied
01037             (o.cursorAt && this._adjustOffsetFromHelper(o.cursorAt));
01038 
01039             //Set a containment if given in the options
01040             if(o.containment)
01041                   this._setContainment();
01042 
01043             //Trigger event + callbacks
01044             if(this._trigger("start", event) === false) {
01045                   this._clear();
01046                   return false;
01047             }
01048 
01049             //Recache the helper size
01050             this._cacheHelperProportions();
01051 
01052             //Prepare the droppable offsets
01053             if ($.ui.ddmanager && !o.dropBehaviour)
01054                   $.ui.ddmanager.prepareOffsets(this, event);
01055 
01056             this.helper.addClass("ui-draggable-dragging");
01057             this._mouseDrag(event, true); //Execute the drag once - this causes the helper not to be visible before getting its correct position
01058             return true;
01059       },
01060 
01061       _mouseDrag: function(event, noPropagation) {
01062 
01063             //Compute the helpers position
01064             this.position = this._generatePosition(event);
01065             this.positionAbs = this._convertPositionTo("absolute");
01066 
01067             //Call plugins and callbacks and use the resulting position if something is returned
01068             if (!noPropagation) {
01069                   var ui = this._uiHash();
01070                   if(this._trigger('drag', event, ui) === false) {
01071                         this._mouseUp({});
01072                         return false;
01073                   }
01074                   this.position = ui.position;
01075             }
01076 
01077             if(!this.options.axis || this.options.axis != "y") this.helper[0].style.left = this.position.left+'px';
01078             if(!this.options.axis || this.options.axis != "x") this.helper[0].style.top = this.position.top+'px';
01079             if($.ui.ddmanager) $.ui.ddmanager.drag(this, event);
01080 
01081             return false;
01082       },
01083 
01084       _mouseStop: function(event) {
01085 
01086             //If we are using droppables, inform the manager about the drop
01087             var dropped = false;
01088             if ($.ui.ddmanager && !this.options.dropBehaviour)
01089                   dropped = $.ui.ddmanager.drop(this, event);
01090 
01091             //if a drop comes from outside (a sortable)
01092             if(this.dropped) {
01093                   dropped = this.dropped;
01094                   this.dropped = false;
01095             }
01096             
01097             //if the original element is removed, don't bother to continue
01098             if(!this.element[0] || !this.element[0].parentNode)
01099                   return false;
01100 
01101             if((this.options.revert == "invalid" && !dropped) || (this.options.revert == "valid" && dropped) || this.options.revert === true || ($.isFunction(this.options.revert) && this.options.revert.call(this.element, dropped))) {
01102                   var self = this;
01103                   $(this.helper).animate(this.originalPosition, parseInt(this.options.revertDuration, 10), function() {
01104                         if(self._trigger("stop", event) !== false) {
01105                               self._clear();
01106                         }
01107                   });
01108             } else {
01109                   if(this._trigger("stop", event) !== false) {
01110                         this._clear();
01111                   }
01112             }
01113 
01114             return false;
01115       },
01116       
01117       cancel: function() {
01118             
01119             if(this.helper.is(".ui-draggable-dragging")) {
01120                   this._mouseUp({});
01121             } else {
01122                   this._clear();
01123             }
01124             
01125             return this;
01126             
01127       },
01128 
01129       _getHandle: function(event) {
01130 
01131             var handle = !this.options.handle || !$(this.options.handle, this.element).length ? true : false;
01132             $(this.options.handle, this.element)
01133                   .find("*")
01134                   .andSelf()
01135                   .each(function() {
01136                         if(this == event.target) handle = true;
01137                   });
01138 
01139             return handle;
01140 
01141       },
01142 
01143       _createHelper: function(event) {
01144 
01145             var o = this.options;
01146             var helper = $.isFunction(o.helper) ? $(o.helper.apply(this.element[0], [event])) : (o.helper == 'clone' ? this.element.clone() : this.element);
01147 
01148             if(!helper.parents('body').length)
01149                   helper.appendTo((o.appendTo == 'parent' ? this.element[0].parentNode : o.appendTo));
01150 
01151             if(helper[0] != this.element[0] && !(/(fixed|absolute)/).test(helper.css("position")))
01152                   helper.css("position", "absolute");
01153 
01154             return helper;
01155 
01156       },
01157 
01158       _adjustOffsetFromHelper: function(obj) {
01159             if (typeof obj == 'string') {
01160                   obj = obj.split(' ');
01161             }
01162             if ($.isArray(obj)) {
01163                   obj = {left: +obj[0], top: +obj[1] || 0};
01164             }
01165             if ('left' in obj) {
01166                   this.offset.click.left = obj.left + this.margins.left;
01167             }
01168             if ('right' in obj) {
01169                   this.offset.click.left = this.helperProportions.width - obj.right + this.margins.left;
01170             }
01171             if ('top' in obj) {
01172                   this.offset.click.top = obj.top + this.margins.top;
01173             }
01174             if ('bottom' in obj) {
01175                   this.offset.click.top = this.helperProportions.height - obj.bottom + this.margins.top;
01176             }
01177       },
01178 
01179       _getParentOffset: function() {
01180 
01181             //Get the offsetParent and cache its position
01182             this.offsetParent = this.helper.offsetParent();
01183             var po = this.offsetParent.offset();
01184 
01185             // This is a special case where we need to modify a offset calculated on start, since the following happened:
01186             // 1. The position of the helper is absolute, so it's position is calculated based on the next positioned parent
01187             // 2. The actual offset parent is a child of the scroll parent, and the scroll parent isn't the document, which means that
01188             //    the scroll is included in the initial calculation of the offset of the parent, and never recalculated upon drag
01189             if(this.cssPosition == 'absolute' && this.scrollParent[0] != document && $.ui.contains(this.scrollParent[0], this.offsetParent[0])) {
01190                   po.left += this.scrollParent.scrollLeft();
01191                   po.top += this.scrollParent.scrollTop();
01192             }
01193 
01194             if((this.offsetParent[0] == document.body) //This needs to be actually done for all browsers, since pageX/pageY includes this information
01195             || (this.offsetParent[0].tagName && this.offsetParent[0].tagName.toLowerCase() == 'html' && $.browser.msie)) //Ugly IE fix
01196                   po = { top: 0, left: 0 };
01197 
01198             return {
01199                   top: po.top + (parseInt(this.offsetParent.css("borderTopWidth"),10) || 0),
01200                   left: po.left + (parseInt(this.offsetParent.css("borderLeftWidth"),10) || 0)
01201             };
01202 
01203       },
01204 
01205       _getRelativeOffset: function() {
01206 
01207             if(this.cssPosition == "relative") {
01208                   var p = this.element.position();
01209                   return {
01210                         top: p.top - (parseInt(this.helper.css("top"),10) || 0) + this.scrollParent.scrollTop(),
01211                         left: p.left - (parseInt(this.helper.css("left"),10) || 0) + this.scrollParent.scrollLeft()
01212                   };
01213             } else {
01214                   return { top: 0, left: 0 };
01215             }
01216 
01217       },
01218 
01219       _cacheMargins: function() {
01220             this.margins = {
01221                   left: (parseInt(this.element.css("marginLeft"),10) || 0),
01222                   top: (parseInt(this.element.css("marginTop"),10) || 0)
01223             };
01224       },
01225 
01226       _cacheHelperProportions: function() {
01227             this.helperProportions = {
01228                   width: this.helper.outerWidth(),
01229                   height: this.helper.outerHeight()
01230             };
01231       },
01232 
01233       _setContainment: function() {
01234 
01235             var o = this.options;
01236             if(o.containment == 'parent') o.containment = this.helper[0].parentNode;
01237             if(o.containment == 'document' || o.containment == 'window') this.containment = [
01238                   0 - this.offset.relative.left - this.offset.parent.left,
01239                   0 - this.offset.relative.top - this.offset.parent.top,
01240                   $(o.containment == 'document' ? document : window).width() - this.helperProportions.width - this.margins.left,
01241                   ($(o.containment == 'document' ? document : window).height() || document.body.parentNode.scrollHeight) - this.helperProportions.height - this.margins.top
01242             ];
01243 
01244             if(!(/^(document|window|parent)$/).test(o.containment) && o.containment.constructor != Array) {
01245                   var ce = $(o.containment)[0]; if(!ce) return;
01246                   var co = $(o.containment).offset();
01247                   var over = ($(ce).css("overflow") != 'hidden');
01248 
01249                   this.containment = [
01250                         co.left + (parseInt($(ce).css("borderLeftWidth"),10) || 0) + (parseInt($(ce).css("paddingLeft"),10) || 0) - this.margins.left,
01251                         co.top + (parseInt($(ce).css("borderTopWidth"),10) || 0) + (parseInt($(ce).css("paddingTop"),10) || 0) - this.margins.top,
01252                         co.left+(over ? Math.max(ce.scrollWidth,ce.offsetWidth) : ce.offsetWidth) - (parseInt($(ce).css("borderLeftWidth"),10) || 0) - (parseInt($(ce).css("paddingRight"),10) || 0) - this.helperProportions.width - this.margins.left,
01253                         co.top+(over ? Math.max(ce.scrollHeight,ce.offsetHeight) : ce.offsetHeight) - (parseInt($(ce).css("borderTopWidth"),10) || 0) - (parseInt($(ce).css("paddingBottom"),10) || 0) - this.helperProportions.height - this.margins.top
01254                   ];
01255             } else if(o.containment.constructor == Array) {
01256                   this.containment = o.containment;
01257             }
01258 
01259       },
01260 
01261       _convertPositionTo: function(d, pos) {
01262 
01263             if(!pos) pos = this.position;
01264             var mod = d == "absolute" ? 1 : -1;
01265             var o = this.options, scroll = this.cssPosition == 'absolute' && !(this.scrollParent[0] != document && $.ui.contains(this.scrollParent[0], this.offsetParent[0])) ? this.offsetParent : this.scrollParent, scrollIsRootNode = (/(html|body)/i).test(scroll[0].tagName);
01266 
01267             return {
01268                   top: (
01269                         pos.top                                                                                                     // The absolute mouse position
01270                         + this.offset.relative.top * mod                                                          // Only for relative positioned nodes: Relative offset from element to offset parent
01271                         + this.offset.parent.top * mod                                                                  // The offsetParent's offset without borders (offset + border)
01272                         - ($.browser.safari && $.browser.version < 526 && this.cssPosition == 'fixed' ? 0 : ( this.cssPosition == 'fixed' ? -this.scrollParent.scrollTop() : ( scrollIsRootNode ? 0 : scroll.scrollTop() ) ) * mod)
01273                   ),
01274                   left: (
01275                         pos.left                                                                                              // The absolute mouse position
01276                         + this.offset.relative.left * mod                                                         // Only for relative positioned nodes: Relative offset from element to offset parent
01277                         + this.offset.parent.left * mod                                                                 // The offsetParent's offset without borders (offset + border)
01278                         - ($.browser.safari && $.browser.version < 526 && this.cssPosition == 'fixed' ? 0 : ( this.cssPosition == 'fixed' ? -this.scrollParent.scrollLeft() : scrollIsRootNode ? 0 : scroll.scrollLeft() ) * mod)
01279                   )
01280             };
01281 
01282       },
01283 
01284       _generatePosition: function(event) {
01285 
01286             var o = this.options, scroll = this.cssPosition == 'absolute' && !(this.scrollParent[0] != document && $.ui.contains(this.scrollParent[0], this.offsetParent[0])) ? this.offsetParent : this.scrollParent, scrollIsRootNode = (/(html|body)/i).test(scroll[0].tagName);
01287             var pageX = event.pageX;
01288             var pageY = event.pageY;
01289 
01290             /*
01291              * - Position constraining -
01292              * Constrain the position to a mix of grid, containment.
01293              */
01294 
01295             if(this.originalPosition) { //If we are not dragging yet, we won't check for options
01296 
01297                   if(this.containment) {
01298                         if(event.pageX - this.offset.click.left < this.containment[0]) pageX = this.containment[0] + this.offset.click.left;
01299                         if(event.pageY - this.offset.click.top < this.containment[1]) pageY = this.containment[1] + this.offset.click.top;
01300                         if(event.pageX - this.offset.click.left > this.containment[2]) pageX = this.containment[2] + this.offset.click.left;
01301                         if(event.pageY - this.offset.click.top > this.containment[3]) pageY = this.containment[3] + this.offset.click.top;
01302                   }
01303 
01304                   if(o.grid) {
01305                         var top = this.originalPageY + Math.round((pageY - this.originalPageY) / o.grid[1]) * o.grid[1];
01306                         pageY = this.containment ? (!(top - this.offset.click.top < this.containment[1] || top - this.offset.click.top > this.containment[3]) ? top : (!(top - this.offset.click.top < this.containment[1]) ? top - o.grid[1] : top + o.grid[1])) : top;
01307 
01308                         var left = this.originalPageX + Math.round((pageX - this.originalPageX) / o.grid[0]) * o.grid[0];
01309                         pageX = this.containment ? (!(left - this.offset.click.left < this.containment[0] || left - this.offset.click.left > this.containment[2]) ? left : (!(left - this.offset.click.left < this.containment[0]) ? left - o.grid[0] : left + o.grid[0])) : left;
01310                   }
01311 
01312             }
01313 
01314             return {
01315                   top: (
01316                         pageY                                                                                           // The absolute mouse position
01317                         - this.offset.click.top                                                                         // Click offset (relative to the element)
01318                         - this.offset.relative.top                                                                      // Only for relative positioned nodes: Relative offset from element to offset parent
01319                         - this.offset.parent.top                                                                        // The offsetParent's offset without borders (offset + border)
01320                         + ($.browser.safari && $.browser.version < 526 && this.cssPosition == 'fixed' ? 0 : ( this.cssPosition == 'fixed' ? -this.scrollParent.scrollTop() : ( scrollIsRootNode ? 0 : scroll.scrollTop() ) ))
01321                   ),
01322                   left: (
01323                         pageX                                                                                           // The absolute mouse position
01324                         - this.offset.click.left                                                                        // Click offset (relative to the element)
01325                         - this.offset.relative.left                                                                     // Only for relative positioned nodes: Relative offset from element to offset parent
01326                         - this.offset.parent.left                                                                       // The offsetParent's offset without borders (offset + border)
01327                         + ($.browser.safari && $.browser.version < 526 && this.cssPosition == 'fixed' ? 0 : ( this.cssPosition == 'fixed' ? -this.scrollParent.scrollLeft() : scrollIsRootNode ? 0 : scroll.scrollLeft() ))
01328                   )
01329             };
01330 
01331       },
01332 
01333       _clear: function() {
01334             this.helper.removeClass("ui-draggable-dragging");
01335             if(this.helper[0] != this.element[0] && !this.cancelHelperRemoval) this.helper.remove();
01336             //if($.ui.ddmanager) $.ui.ddmanager.current = null;
01337             this.helper = null;
01338             this.cancelHelperRemoval = false;
01339       },
01340 
01341       // From now on bulk stuff - mainly helpers
01342 
01343       _trigger: function(type, event, ui) {
01344             ui = ui || this._uiHash();
01345             $.ui.plugin.call(this, type, [event, ui]);
01346             if(type == "drag") this.positionAbs = this._convertPositionTo("absolute"); //The absolute position has to be recalculated after plugins
01347             return $.Widget.prototype._trigger.call(this, type, event, ui);
01348       },
01349 
01350       plugins: {},
01351 
01352       _uiHash: function(event) {
01353             return {
01354                   helper: this.helper,
01355                   position: this.position,
01356                   originalPosition: this.originalPosition,
01357                   offset: this.positionAbs
01358             };
01359       }
01360 
01361 });
01362 
01363 $.extend($.ui.draggable, {
01364       version: "1.8.4"
01365 });
01366 
01367 $.ui.plugin.add("draggable", "connectToSortable", {
01368       start: function(event, ui) {
01369 
01370             var inst = $(this).data("draggable"), o = inst.options,
01371                   uiSortable = $.extend({}, ui, { item: inst.element });
01372             inst.sortables = [];
01373             $(o.connectToSortable).each(function() {
01374                   var sortable = $.data(this, 'sortable');
01375                   if (sortable && !sortable.options.disabled) {
01376                         inst.sortables.push({
01377                               instance: sortable,
01378                               shouldRevert: sortable.options.revert
01379                         });
01380                         sortable._refreshItems();     //Do a one-time refresh at start to refresh the containerCache
01381                         sortable._trigger("activate", event, uiSortable);
01382                   }
01383             });
01384 
01385       },
01386       stop: function(event, ui) {
01387 
01388             //If we are still over the sortable, we fake the stop event of the sortable, but also remove helper
01389             var inst = $(this).data("draggable"),
01390                   uiSortable = $.extend({}, ui, { item: inst.element });
01391 
01392             $.each(inst.sortables, function() {
01393                   if(this.instance.isOver) {
01394 
01395                         this.instance.isOver = 0;
01396 
01397                         inst.cancelHelperRemoval = true; //Don't remove the helper in the draggable instance
01398                         this.instance.cancelHelperRemoval = false; //Remove it in the sortable instance (so sortable plugins like revert still work)
01399 
01400                         //The sortable revert is supported, and we have to set a temporary dropped variable on the draggable to support revert: 'valid/invalid'
01401                         if(this.shouldRevert) this.instance.options.revert = true;
01402 
01403                         //Trigger the stop of the sortable
01404                         this.instance._mouseStop(event);
01405 
01406                         this.instance.options.helper = this.instance.options._helper;
01407 
01408                         //If the helper has been the original item, restore properties in the sortable
01409                         if(inst.options.helper == 'original')
01410                               this.instance.currentItem.css({ top: 'auto', left: 'auto' });
01411 
01412                   } else {
01413                         this.instance.cancelHelperRemoval = false; //Remove the helper in the sortable instance
01414                         this.instance._trigger("deactivate", event, uiSortable);
01415                   }
01416 
01417             });
01418 
01419       },
01420       drag: function(event, ui) {
01421 
01422             var inst = $(this).data("draggable"), self = this;
01423 
01424             var checkPos = function(o) {
01425                   var dyClick = this.offset.click.top, dxClick = this.offset.click.left;
01426                   var helperTop = this.positionAbs.top, helperLeft = this.positionAbs.left;
01427                   var itemHeight = o.height, itemWidth = o.width;
01428                   var itemTop = o.top, itemLeft = o.left;
01429 
01430                   return $.ui.isOver(helperTop + dyClick, helperLeft + dxClick, itemTop, itemLeft, itemHeight, itemWidth);
01431             };
01432 
01433             $.each(inst.sortables, function(i) {
01434                   
01435                   //Copy over some variables to allow calling the sortable's native _intersectsWith
01436                   this.instance.positionAbs = inst.positionAbs;
01437                   this.instance.helperProportions = inst.helperProportions;
01438                   this.instance.offset.click = inst.offset.click;
01439                   
01440                   if(this.instance._intersectsWith(this.instance.containerCache)) {
01441 
01442                         //If it intersects, we use a little isOver variable and set it once, so our move-in stuff gets fired only once
01443                         if(!this.instance.isOver) {
01444 
01445                               this.instance.isOver = 1;
01446                               //Now we fake the start of dragging for the sortable instance,
01447                               //by cloning the list group item, appending it to the sortable and using it as inst.currentItem
01448                               //We can then fire the start event of the sortable with our passed browser event, and our own helper (so it doesn't create a new one)
01449                               this.instance.currentItem = $(self).clone().appendTo(this.instance.element).data("sortable-item", true);
01450                               this.instance.options._helper = this.instance.options.helper; //Store helper option to later restore it
01451                               this.instance.options.helper = function() { return ui.helper[0]; };
01452 
01453                               event.target = this.instance.currentItem[0];
01454                               this.instance._mouseCapture(event, true);
01455                               this.instance._mouseStart(event, true, true);
01456 
01457                               //Because the browser event is way off the new appended portlet, we modify a couple of variables to reflect the changes
01458                               this.instance.offset.click.top = inst.offset.click.top;
01459                               this.instance.offset.click.left = inst.offset.click.left;
01460                               this.instance.offset.parent.left -= inst.offset.parent.left - this.instance.offset.parent.left;
01461                               this.instance.offset.parent.top -= inst.offset.parent.top - this.instance.offset.parent.top;
01462 
01463                               inst._trigger("toSortable", event);
01464                               inst.dropped = this.instance.element; //draggable revert needs that
01465                               //hack so receive/update callbacks work (mostly)
01466                               inst.currentItem = inst.element;
01467                               this.instance.fromOutside = inst;
01468 
01469                         }
01470 
01471                         //Provided we did all the previous steps, we can fire the drag event of the sortable on every draggable drag, when it intersects with the sortable
01472                         if(this.instance.currentItem) this.instance._mouseDrag(event);
01473 
01474                   } else {
01475 
01476                         //If it doesn't intersect with the sortable, and it intersected before,
01477                         //we fake the drag stop of the sortable, but make sure it doesn't remove the helper by using cancelHelperRemoval
01478                         if(this.instance.isOver) {
01479 
01480                               this.instance.isOver = 0;
01481                               this.instance.cancelHelperRemoval = true;
01482                               
01483                               //Prevent reverting on this forced stop
01484                               this.instance.options.revert = false;
01485                               
01486                               // The out event needs to be triggered independently
01487                               this.instance._trigger('out', event, this.instance._uiHash(this.instance));
01488                               
01489                               this.instance._mouseStop(event, true);
01490                               this.instance.options.helper = this.instance.options._helper;
01491 
01492                               //Now we remove our currentItem, the list group clone again, and the placeholder, and animate the helper back to it's original size
01493                               this.instance.currentItem.remove();
01494                               if(this.instance.placeholder) this.instance.placeholder.remove();
01495 
01496                               inst._trigger("fromSortable", event);
01497                               inst.dropped = false; //draggable revert needs that
01498                         }
01499 
01500                   };
01501 
01502             });
01503 
01504       }
01505 });
01506 
01507 $.ui.plugin.add("draggable", "cursor", {
01508       start: function(event, ui) {
01509             var t = $('body'), o = $(this).data('draggable').options;
01510             if (t.css("cursor")) o._cursor = t.css("cursor");
01511             t.css("cursor", o.cursor);
01512       },
01513       stop: function(event, ui) {
01514             var o = $(this).data('draggable').options;
01515             if (o._cursor) $('body').css("cursor", o._cursor);
01516       }
01517 });
01518 
01519 $.ui.plugin.add("draggable", "iframeFix", {
01520       start: function(event, ui) {
01521             var o = $(this).data('draggable').options;
01522             $(o.iframeFix === true ? "iframe" : o.iframeFix).each(function() {
01523                   $('<div class="ui-draggable-iframeFix" style="background: #fff;"></div>')
01524                   .css({
01525                         width: this.offsetWidth+"px", height: this.offsetHeight+"px",
01526                         position: "absolute", opacity: "0.001", zIndex: 1000
01527                   })
01528                   .css($(this).offset())
01529                   .appendTo("body");
01530             });
01531       },
01532       stop: function(event, ui) {
01533             $("div.ui-draggable-iframeFix").each(function() { this.parentNode.removeChild(this); }); //Remove frame helpers
01534       }
01535 });
01536 
01537 $.ui.plugin.add("draggable", "opacity", {
01538       start: function(event, ui) {
01539             var t = $(ui.helper), o = $(this).data('draggable').options;
01540             if(t.css("opacity")) o._opacity = t.css("opacity");
01541             t.css('opacity', o.opacity);
01542       },
01543       stop: function(event, ui) {
01544             var o = $(this).data('draggable').options;
01545             if(o._opacity) $(ui.helper).css('opacity', o._opacity);
01546       }
01547 });
01548 
01549 $.ui.plugin.add("draggable", "scroll", {
01550       start: function(event, ui) {
01551             var i = $(this).data("draggable");
01552             if(i.scrollParent[0] != document && i.scrollParent[0].tagName != 'HTML') i.overflowOffset = i.scrollParent.offset();
01553       },
01554       drag: function(event, ui) {
01555 
01556             var i = $(this).data("draggable"), o = i.options, scrolled = false;
01557 
01558             if(i.scrollParent[0] != document && i.scrollParent[0].tagName != 'HTML') {
01559 
01560                   if(!o.axis || o.axis != 'x') {
01561                         if((i.overflowOffset.top + i.scrollParent[0].offsetHeight) - event.pageY < o.scrollSensitivity)
01562                               i.scrollParent[0].scrollTop = scrolled = i.scrollParent[0].scrollTop + o.scrollSpeed;
01563                         else if(event.pageY - i.overflowOffset.top < o.scrollSensitivity)
01564                               i.scrollParent[0].scrollTop = scrolled = i.scrollParent[0].scrollTop - o.scrollSpeed;
01565                   }
01566 
01567                   if(!o.axis || o.axis != 'y') {
01568                         if((i.overflowOffset.left + i.scrollParent[0].offsetWidth) - event.pageX < o.scrollSensitivity)
01569                               i.scrollParent[0].scrollLeft = scrolled = i.scrollParent[0].scrollLeft + o.scrollSpeed;
01570                         else if(event.pageX - i.overflowOffset.left < o.scrollSensitivity)
01571                               i.scrollParent[0].scrollLeft = scrolled = i.scrollParent[0].scrollLeft - o.scrollSpeed;
01572                   }
01573 
01574             } else {
01575 
01576                   if(!o.axis || o.axis != 'x') {
01577                         if(event.pageY - $(document).scrollTop() < o.scrollSensitivity)
01578                               scrolled = $(document).scrollTop($(document).scrollTop() - o.scrollSpeed);
01579                         else if($(window).height() - (event.pageY - $(document).scrollTop()) < o.scrollSensitivity)
01580                               scrolled = $(document).scrollTop($(document).scrollTop() + o.scrollSpeed);
01581                   }
01582 
01583                   if(!o.axis || o.axis != 'y') {
01584                         if(event.pageX - $(document).scrollLeft() < o.scrollSensitivity)
01585                               scrolled = $(document).scrollLeft($(document).scrollLeft() - o.scrollSpeed);
01586                         else if($(window).width() - (event.pageX - $(document).scrollLeft()) < o.scrollSensitivity)
01587                               scrolled = $(document).scrollLeft($(document).scrollLeft() + o.scrollSpeed);
01588                   }
01589 
01590             }
01591 
01592             if(scrolled !== false && $.ui.ddmanager && !o.dropBehaviour)
01593                   $.ui.ddmanager.prepareOffsets(i, event);
01594 
01595       }
01596 });
01597 
01598 $.ui.plugin.add("draggable", "snap", {
01599       start: function(event, ui) {
01600 
01601             var i = $(this).data("draggable"), o = i.options;
01602             i.snapElements = [];
01603 
01604             $(o.snap.constructor != String ? ( o.snap.items || ':data(draggable)' ) : o.snap).each(function() {
01605                   var $t = $(this); var $o = $t.offset();
01606                   if(this != i.element[0]) i.snapElements.push({
01607                         item: this,
01608                         width: $t.outerWidth(), height: $t.outerHeight(),
01609                         top: $o.top, left: $o.left
01610                   });
01611             });
01612 
01613       },
01614       drag: function(event, ui) {
01615 
01616             var inst = $(this).data("draggable"), o = inst.options;
01617             var d = o.snapTolerance;
01618 
01619             var x1 = ui.offset.left, x2 = x1 + inst.helperProportions.width,
01620                   y1 = ui.offset.top, y2 = y1 + inst.helperProportions.height;
01621 
01622             for (var i = inst.snapElements.length - 1; i >= 0; i--){
01623 
01624                   var l = inst.snapElements[i].left, r = l + inst.snapElements[i].width,
01625                         t = inst.snapElements[i].top, b = t + inst.snapElements[i].height;
01626 
01627                   //Yes, I know, this is insane ;)
01628                   if(!((l-d < x1 && x1 < r+d && t-d < y1 && y1 < b+d) || (l-d < x1 && x1 < r+d && t-d < y2 && y2 < b+d) || (l-d < x2 && x2 < r+d && t-d < y1 && y1 < b+d) || (l-d < x2 && x2 < r+d && t-d < y2 && y2 < b+d))) {
01629                         if(inst.snapElements[i].snapping) (inst.options.snap.release && inst.options.snap.release.call(inst.element, event, $.extend(inst._uiHash(), { snapItem: inst.snapElements[i].item })));
01630                         inst.snapElements[i].snapping = false;
01631                         continue;
01632                   }
01633 
01634                   if(o.snapMode != 'inner') {
01635                         var ts = Math.abs(t - y2) <= d;
01636                         var bs = Math.abs(b - y1) <= d;
01637                         var ls = Math.abs(l - x2) <= d;
01638                         var rs = Math.abs(r - x1) <= d;
01639                         if(ts) ui.position.top = inst._convertPositionTo("relative", { top: t - inst.helperProportions.height, left: 0 }).top - inst.margins.top;
01640                         if(bs) ui.position.top = inst._convertPositionTo("relative", { top: b, left: 0 }).top - inst.margins.top;
01641                         if(ls) ui.position.left = inst._convertPositionTo("relative", { top: 0, left: l - inst.helperProportions.width }).left - inst.margins.left;
01642                         if(rs) ui.position.left = inst._convertPositionTo("relative", { top: 0, left: r }).left - inst.margins.left;
01643                   }
01644 
01645                   var first = (ts || bs || ls || rs);
01646 
01647                   if(o.snapMode != 'outer') {
01648                         var ts = Math.abs(t - y1) <= d;
01649                         var bs = Math.abs(b - y2) <= d;
01650                         var ls = Math.abs(l - x1) <= d;
01651                         var rs = Math.abs(r - x2) <= d;
01652                         if(ts) ui.position.top = inst._convertPositionTo("relative", { top: t, left: 0 }).top - inst.margins.top;
01653                         if(bs) ui.position.top = inst._convertPositionTo("relative", { top: b - inst.helperProportions.height, left: 0 }).top - inst.margins.top;
01654                         if(ls) ui.position.left = inst._convertPositionTo("relative", { top: 0, left: l }).left - inst.margins.left;
01655                         if(rs) ui.position.left = inst._convertPositionTo("relative", { top: 0, left: r - inst.helperProportions.width }).left - inst.margins.left;
01656                   }
01657 
01658                   if(!inst.snapElements[i].snapping && (ts || bs || ls || rs || first))
01659                         (inst.options.snap.snap && inst.options.snap.snap.call(inst.element, event, $.extend(inst._uiHash(), { snapItem: inst.snapElements[i].item })));
01660                   inst.snapElements[i].snapping = (ts || bs || ls || rs || first);
01661 
01662             };
01663 
01664       }
01665 });
01666 
01667 $.ui.plugin.add("draggable", "stack", {
01668       start: function(event, ui) {
01669 
01670             var o = $(this).data("draggable").options;
01671 
01672             var group = $.makeArray($(o.stack)).sort(function(a,b) {
01673                   return (parseInt($(a).css("zIndex"),10) || 0) - (parseInt($(b).css("zIndex"),10) || 0);
01674             });
01675             if (!group.length) { return; }
01676             
01677             var min = parseInt(group[0].style.zIndex) || 0;
01678             $(group).each(function(i) {
01679                   this.style.zIndex = min + i;
01680             });
01681 
01682             this[0].style.zIndex = min + group.length;
01683 
01684       }
01685 });
01686 
01687 $.ui.plugin.add("draggable", "zIndex", {
01688       start: function(event, ui) {
01689             var t = $(ui.helper), o = $(this).data("draggable").options;
01690             if(t.css("zIndex")) o._zIndex = t.css("zIndex");
