01691             t.css('zIndex', o.zIndex);
01692       },
01693       stop: function(event, ui) {
01694             var o = $(this).data("draggable").options;
01695             if(o._zIndex) $(ui.helper).css('zIndex', o._zIndex);
01696       }
01697 });
01698 
01699 })(jQuery);
01700 /*
01701  * jQuery UI Droppable 1.8.4
01702  *
01703  * Copyright 2010, AUTHORS.txt (http://jqueryui.com/about)
01704  * Dual licensed under the MIT or GPL Version 2 licenses.
01705  * http://jquery.org/license
01706  *
01707  * http://docs.jquery.com/UI/Droppables
01708  *
01709  * Depends:
01710  *    jquery.ui.core.js
01711  *    jquery.ui.widget.js
01712  *    jquery.ui.mouse.js
01713  *    jquery.ui.draggable.js
01714  */
01715 (function( $, undefined ) {
01716 
01717 $.widget("ui.droppable", {
01718       widgetEventPrefix: "drop",
01719       options: {
01720             accept: '*',
01721             activeClass: false,
01722             addClasses: true,
01723             greedy: false,
01724             hoverClass: false,
01725             scope: 'default',
01726             tolerance: 'intersect'
01727       },
01728       _create: function() {
01729 
01730             var o = this.options, accept = o.accept;
01731             this.isover = 0; this.isout = 1;
01732 
01733             this.accept = $.isFunction(accept) ? accept : function(d) {
01734                   return d.is(accept);
01735             };
01736 
01737             //Store the droppable's proportions
01738             this.proportions = { width: this.element[0].offsetWidth, height: this.element[0].offsetHeight };
01739 
01740             // Add the reference and positions to the manager
01741             $.ui.ddmanager.droppables[o.scope] = $.ui.ddmanager.droppables[o.scope] || [];
01742             $.ui.ddmanager.droppables[o.scope].push(this);
01743 
01744             (o.addClasses && this.element.addClass("ui-droppable"));
01745 
01746       },
01747 
01748       destroy: function() {
01749             var drop = $.ui.ddmanager.droppables[this.options.scope];
01750             for ( var i = 0; i < drop.length; i++ )
01751                   if ( drop[i] == this )
01752                         drop.splice(i, 1);
01753 
01754             this.element
01755                   .removeClass("ui-droppable ui-droppable-disabled")
01756                   .removeData("droppable")
01757                   .unbind(".droppable");
01758 
01759             return this;
01760       },
01761 
01762       _setOption: function(key, value) {
01763 
01764             if(key == 'accept') {
01765                   this.accept = $.isFunction(value) ? value : function(d) {
01766                         return d.is(value);
01767                   };
01768             }
01769             $.Widget.prototype._setOption.apply(this, arguments);
01770       },
01771 
01772       _activate: function(event) {
01773             var draggable = $.ui.ddmanager.current;
01774             if(this.options.activeClass) this.element.addClass(this.options.activeClass);
01775             (draggable && this._trigger('activate', event, this.ui(draggable)));
01776       },
01777 
01778       _deactivate: function(event) {
01779             var draggable = $.ui.ddmanager.current;
01780             if(this.options.activeClass) this.element.removeClass(this.options.activeClass);
01781             (draggable && this._trigger('deactivate', event, this.ui(draggable)));
01782       },
01783 
01784       _over: function(event) {
01785 
01786             var draggable = $.ui.ddmanager.current;
01787             if (!draggable || (draggable.currentItem || draggable.element)[0] == this.element[0]) return; // Bail if draggable and droppable are same element
01788 
01789             if (this.accept.call(this.element[0],(draggable.currentItem || draggable.element))) {
01790                   if(this.options.hoverClass) this.element.addClass(this.options.hoverClass);
01791                   this._trigger('over', event, this.ui(draggable));
01792             }
01793 
01794       },
01795 
01796       _out: function(event) {
01797 
01798             var draggable = $.ui.ddmanager.current;
01799             if (!draggable || (draggable.currentItem || draggable.element)[0] == this.element[0]) return; // Bail if draggable and droppable are same element
01800 
01801             if (this.accept.call(this.element[0],(draggable.currentItem || draggable.element))) {
01802                   if(this.options.hoverClass) this.element.removeClass(this.options.hoverClass);
01803                   this._trigger('out', event, this.ui(draggable));
01804             }
01805 
01806       },
01807 
01808       _drop: function(event,custom) {
01809 
01810             var draggable = custom || $.ui.ddmanager.current;
01811             if (!draggable || (draggable.currentItem || draggable.element)[0] == this.element[0]) return false; // Bail if draggable and droppable are same element
01812 
01813             var childrenIntersection = false;
01814             this.element.find(":data(droppable)").not(".ui-draggable-dragging").each(function() {
01815                   var inst = $.data(this, 'droppable');
01816                   if(
01817                         inst.options.greedy
01818                         && !inst.options.disabled
01819                         && inst.options.scope == draggable.options.scope
01820                         && inst.accept.call(inst.element[0], (draggable.currentItem || draggable.element))
01821                         && $.ui.intersect(draggable, $.extend(inst, { offset: inst.element.offset() }), inst.options.tolerance)
01822                   ) { childrenIntersection = true; return false; }
01823             });
01824             if(childrenIntersection) return false;
01825 
01826             if(this.accept.call(this.element[0],(draggable.currentItem || draggable.element))) {
01827                   if(this.options.activeClass) this.element.removeClass(this.options.activeClass);
01828                   if(this.options.hoverClass) this.element.removeClass(this.options.hoverClass);
01829                   this._trigger('drop', event, this.ui(draggable));
01830                   return this.element;
01831             }
01832 
01833             return false;
01834 
01835       },
01836 
01837       ui: function(c) {
01838             return {
01839                   draggable: (c.currentItem || c.element),
01840                   helper: c.helper,
01841                   position: c.position,
01842                   offset: c.positionAbs
01843             };
01844       }
01845 
01846 });
01847 
01848 $.extend($.ui.droppable, {
01849       version: "1.8.4"
01850 });
01851 
01852 $.ui.intersect = function(draggable, droppable, toleranceMode) {
01853 
01854       if (!droppable.offset) return false;
01855 
01856       var x1 = (draggable.positionAbs || draggable.position.absolute).left, x2 = x1 + draggable.helperProportions.width,
01857             y1 = (draggable.positionAbs || draggable.position.absolute).top, y2 = y1 + draggable.helperProportions.height;
01858       var l = droppable.offset.left, r = l + droppable.proportions.width,
01859             t = droppable.offset.top, b = t + droppable.proportions.height;
01860 
01861       switch (toleranceMode) {
01862             case 'fit':
01863                   return (l <= x1 && x2 <= r
01864                         && t <= y1 && y2 <= b);
01865                   break;
01866             case 'intersect':
01867                   return (l < x1 + (draggable.helperProportions.width / 2) // Right Half
01868                         && x2 - (draggable.helperProportions.width / 2) < r // Left Half
01869                         && t < y1 + (draggable.helperProportions.height / 2) // Bottom Half
01870                         && y2 - (draggable.helperProportions.height / 2) < b ); // Top Half
01871                   break;
01872             case 'pointer':
01873                   var draggableLeft = ((draggable.positionAbs || draggable.position.absolute).left + (draggable.clickOffset || draggable.offset.click).left),
01874                         draggableTop = ((draggable.positionAbs || draggable.position.absolute).top + (draggable.clickOffset || draggable.offset.click).top),
01875                         isOver = $.ui.isOver(draggableTop, draggableLeft, t, l, droppable.proportions.height, droppable.proportions.width);
01876                   return isOver;
01877                   break;
01878             case 'touch':
01879                   return (
01880                               (y1 >= t && y1 <= b) || // Top edge touching
01881                               (y2 >= t && y2 <= b) || // Bottom edge touching
01882                               (y1 < t && y2 > b)            // Surrounded vertically
01883                         ) && (
01884                               (x1 >= l && x1 <= r) || // Left edge touching
01885                               (x2 >= l && x2 <= r) || // Right edge touching
01886                               (x1 < l && x2 > r)            // Surrounded horizontally
01887                         );
01888                   break;
01889             default:
01890                   return false;
01891                   break;
01892             }
01893 
01894 };
01895 
01896 /*
01897       This manager tracks offsets of draggables and droppables
01898 */
01899 $.ui.ddmanager = {
01900       current: null,
01901       droppables: { 'default': [] },
01902       prepareOffsets: function(t, event) {
01903 
01904             var m = $.ui.ddmanager.droppables[t.options.scope] || [];
01905             var type = event ? event.type : null; // workaround for #2317
01906             var list = (t.currentItem || t.element).find(":data(droppable)").andSelf();
01907 
01908             droppablesLoop: for (var i = 0; i < m.length; i++) {
01909 
01910                   if(m[i].options.disabled || (t && !m[i].accept.call(m[i].element[0],(t.currentItem || t.element)))) continue;     //No disabled and non-accepted
01911                   for (var j=0; j < list.length; j++) { if(list[j] == m[i].element[0]) { m[i].proportions.height = 0; continue droppablesLoop; } }; //Filter out elements in the current dragged item
01912                   m[i].visible = m[i].element.css("display") != "none"; if(!m[i].visible) continue;                                                   //If the element is not visible, continue
01913 
01914                   m[i].offset = m[i].element.offset();
01915                   m[i].proportions = { width: m[i].element[0].offsetWidth, height: m[i].element[0].offsetHeight };
01916 
01917                   if(type == "mousedown") m[i]._activate.call(m[i], event); //Activate the droppable if used directly from draggables
01918 
01919             }
01920 
01921       },
01922       drop: function(draggable, event) {
01923 
01924             var dropped = false;
01925             $.each($.ui.ddmanager.droppables[draggable.options.scope] || [], function() {
01926 
01927                   if(!this.options) return;
01928                   if (!this.options.disabled && this.visible && $.ui.intersect(draggable, this, this.options.tolerance))
01929                         dropped = dropped || this._drop.call(this, event);
01930 
01931                   if (!this.options.disabled && this.visible && this.accept.call(this.element[0],(draggable.currentItem || draggable.element))) {
01932                         this.isout = 1; this.isover = 0;
01933                         this._deactivate.call(this, event);
01934                   }
01935 
01936             });
01937             return dropped;
01938 
01939       },
01940       drag: function(draggable, event) {
01941 
01942             //If you have a highly dynamic page, you might try this option. It renders positions every time you move the mouse.
01943             if(draggable.options.refreshPositions) $.ui.ddmanager.prepareOffsets(draggable, event);
01944 
01945             //Run through all droppables and check their positions based on specific tolerance options
01946             $.each($.ui.ddmanager.droppables[draggable.options.scope] || [], function() {
01947 
01948                   if(this.options.disabled || this.greedyChild || !this.visible) return;
01949                   var intersects = $.ui.intersect(draggable, this, this.options.tolerance);
01950 
01951                   var c = !intersects && this.isover == 1 ? 'isout' : (intersects && this.isover == 0 ? 'isover' : null);
01952                   if(!c) return;
01953 
01954                   var parentInstance;
01955                   if (this.options.greedy) {
01956                         var parent = this.element.parents(':data(droppable):eq(0)');
01957                         if (parent.length) {
01958                               parentInstance = $.data(parent[0], 'droppable');
01959                               parentInstance.greedyChild = (c == 'isover' ? 1 : 0);
01960                         }
01961                   }
01962 
01963                   // we just moved into a greedy child
01964                   if (parentInstance && c == 'isover') {
01965                         parentInstance['isover'] = 0;
01966                         parentInstance['isout'] = 1;
01967                         parentInstance._out.call(parentInstance, event);
01968                   }
01969 
01970                   this[c] = 1; this[c == 'isout' ? 'isover' : 'isout'] = 0;
01971                   this[c == "isover" ? "_over" : "_out"].call(this, event);
01972 
01973                   // we just moved out of a greedy child
01974                   if (parentInstance && c == 'isout') {
01975                         parentInstance['isout'] = 0;
01976                         parentInstance['isover'] = 1;
01977                         parentInstance._over.call(parentInstance, event);
01978                   }
01979             });
01980 
01981       }
01982 };
01983 
01984 })(jQuery);
01985 /*
01986  * jQuery UI Resizable 1.8.4
01987  *
01988  * Copyright 2010, AUTHORS.txt (http://jqueryui.com/about)
01989  * Dual licensed under the MIT or GPL Version 2 licenses.
01990  * http://jquery.org/license
01991  *
01992  * http://docs.jquery.com/UI/Resizables
01993  *
01994  * Depends:
01995  *    jquery.ui.core.js
01996  *    jquery.ui.mouse.js
01997  *    jquery.ui.widget.js
01998  */
01999 (function( $, undefined ) {
02000 
02001 $.widget("ui.resizable", $.ui.mouse, {
02002       widgetEventPrefix: "resize",
02003       options: {
02004             alsoResize: false,
02005             animate: false,
02006             animateDuration: "slow",
02007             animateEasing: "swing",
02008             aspectRatio: false,
02009             autoHide: false,
02010             containment: false,
02011             ghost: false,
02012             grid: false,
02013             handles: "e,s,se",
02014             helper: false,
02015             maxHeight: null,
02016             maxWidth: null,
02017             minHeight: 10,
02018             minWidth: 10,
02019             zIndex: 1000
02020       },
02021       _create: function() {
02022 
02023             var self = this, o = this.options;
02024             this.element.addClass("ui-resizable");
02025 
02026             $.extend(this, {
02027                   _aspectRatio: !!(o.aspectRatio),
02028                   aspectRatio: o.aspectRatio,
02029                   originalElement: this.element,
02030                   _proportionallyResizeElements: [],
02031                   _helper: o.helper || o.ghost || o.animate ? o.helper || 'ui-resizable-helper' : null
02032             });
02033 
02034             //Wrap the element if it cannot hold child nodes
02035             if(this.element[0].nodeName.match(/canvas|textarea|input|select|button|img/i)) {
02036 
02037                   //Opera fix for relative positioning
02038                   if (/relative/.test(this.element.css('position')) && $.browser.opera)
02039                         this.element.css({ position: 'relative', top: 'auto', left: 'auto' });
02040 
02041                   //Create a wrapper element and set the wrapper to the new current internal element
02042                   this.element.wrap(
02043                         $('<div class="ui-wrapper" style="overflow: hidden;"></div>').css({
02044                               position: this.element.css('position'),
02045                               width: this.element.outerWidth(),
02046                               height: this.element.outerHeight(),
02047                               top: this.element.css('top'),
02048                               left: this.element.css('left')
02049                         })
02050                   );
02051 
02052                   //Overwrite the original this.element
02053                   this.element = this.element.parent().data(
02054                         "resizable", this.element.data('resizable')
02055                   );
02056 
02057                   this.elementIsWrapper = true;
02058 
02059                   //Move margins to the wrapper
02060                   this.element.css({ marginLeft: this.originalElement.css("marginLeft"), marginTop: this.originalElement.css("marginTop"), marginRight: this.originalElement.css("marginRight"), marginBottom: this.originalElement.css("marginBottom") });
02061                   this.originalElement.css({ marginLeft: 0, marginTop: 0, marginRight: 0, marginBottom: 0});
02062 
02063                   //Prevent Safari textarea resize
02064                   this.originalResizeStyle = this.originalElement.css('resize');
02065                   this.originalElement.css('resize', 'none');
02066 
02067                   //Push the actual element to our proportionallyResize internal array
02068                   this._proportionallyResizeElements.push(this.originalElement.css({ position: 'static', zoom: 1, display: 'block' }));
02069 
02070                   // avoid IE jump (hard set the margin)
02071                   this.originalElement.css({ margin: this.originalElement.css('margin') });
02072 
02073                   // fix handlers offset
02074                   this._proportionallyResize();
02075 
02076             }
02077 
02078             this.handles = o.handles || (!$('.ui-resizable-handle', this.element).length ? "e,s,se" : { n: '.ui-resizable-n', e: '.ui-resizable-e', s: '.ui-resizable-s', w: '.ui-resizable-w', se: '.ui-resizable-se', sw: '.ui-resizable-sw', ne: '.ui-resizable-ne', nw: '.ui-resizable-nw' });
02079             if(this.handles.constructor == String) {
02080 
02081                   if(this.handles == 'all') this.handles = 'n,e,s,w,se,sw,ne,nw';
02082                   var n = this.handles.split(","); this.handles = {};
02083 
02084                   for(var i = 0; i < n.length; i++) {
02085 
02086                         var handle = $.trim(n[i]), hname = 'ui-resizable-'+handle;
02087                         var axis = $('<div class="ui-resizable-handle ' + hname + '"></div>');
02088 
02089                         // increase zIndex of sw, se, ne, nw axis
02090                         //TODO : this modifies original option
02091                         if(/sw|se|ne|nw/.test(handle)) axis.css({ zIndex: ++o.zIndex });
02092 
02093                         //TODO : What's going on here?
02094                         if ('se' == handle) {
02095                               axis.addClass('ui-icon ui-icon-gripsmall-diagonal-se');
02096                         };
02097 
02098                         //Insert into internal handles object and append to element
02099                         this.handles[handle] = '.ui-resizable-'+handle;
02100                         this.element.append(axis);
02101                   }
02102 
02103             }
02104 
02105             this._renderAxis = function(target) {
02106 
02107                   target = target || this.element;
02108 
02109                   for(var i in this.handles) {
02110 
02111                         if(this.handles[i].constructor == String)
02112                               this.handles[i] = $(this.handles[i], this.element).show();
02113 
02114                         //Apply pad to wrapper element, needed to fix axis position (textarea, inputs, scrolls)
02115                         if (this.elementIsWrapper && this.originalElement[0].nodeName.match(/textarea|input|select|button/i)) {
02116 
02117                               var axis = $(this.handles[i], this.element), padWrapper = 0;
02118 
02119                               //Checking the correct pad and border
02120                               padWrapper = /sw|ne|nw|se|n|s/.test(i) ? axis.outerHeight() : axis.outerWidth();
02121 
02122                               //The padding type i have to apply...
02123                               var padPos = [ 'padding',
02124                                     /ne|nw|n/.test(i) ? 'Top' :
02125                                     /se|sw|s/.test(i) ? 'Bottom' :
02126                                     /^e$/.test(i) ? 'Right' : 'Left' ].join("");
02127 
02128                               target.css(padPos, padWrapper);
02129 
02130                               this._proportionallyResize();
02131 
02132                         }
02133 
02134                         //TODO: What's that good for? There's not anything to be executed left
02135                         if(!$(this.handles[i]).length)
02136                               continue;
02137 
02138                   }
02139             };
02140 
02141             //TODO: make renderAxis a prototype function
02142             this._renderAxis(this.element);
02143 
02144             this._handles = $('.ui-resizable-handle', this.element)
02145                   .disableSelection();
02146 
02147             //Matching axis name
02148             this._handles.mouseover(function() {
02149                   if (!self.resizing) {
02150                         if (this.className)
02151                               var axis = this.className.match(/ui-resizable-(se|sw|ne|nw|n|e|s|w)/i);
02152                         //Axis, default = se
02153                         self.axis = axis && axis[1] ? axis[1] : 'se';
02154                   }
02155             });
02156 
02157             //If we want to auto hide the elements
02158             if (o.autoHide) {
02159                   this._handles.hide();
02160                   $(this.element)
02161                         .addClass("ui-resizable-autohide")
02162                         .hover(function() {
02163                               $(this).removeClass("ui-resizable-autohide");
02164                               self._handles.show();
02165                         },
02166                         function(){
02167                               if (!self.resizing) {
02168                                     $(this).addClass("ui-resizable-autohide");
02169                                     self._handles.hide();
02170                               }
02171                         });
02172             }
02173 
02174             //Initialize the mouse interaction
02175             this._mouseInit();
02176 
02177       },
02178 
02179       destroy: function() {
02180 
02181             this._mouseDestroy();
02182 
02183             var _destroy = function(exp) {
02184                   $(exp).removeClass("ui-resizable ui-resizable-disabled ui-resizable-resizing")
02185                         .removeData("resizable").unbind(".resizable").find('.ui-resizable-handle').remove();
02186             };
02187 
02188             //TODO: Unwrap at same DOM position
02189             if (this.elementIsWrapper) {
02190                   _destroy(this.element);
02191                   var wrapper = this.element;
02192                   wrapper.after(
02193                         this.originalElement.css({
02194                               position: wrapper.css('position'),
02195                               width: wrapper.outerWidth(),
02196                               height: wrapper.outerHeight(),
02197                               top: wrapper.css('top'),
02198                               left: wrapper.css('left')
02199                         })
02200                   ).remove();
02201             }
02202 
02203             this.originalElement.css('resize', this.originalResizeStyle);
02204             _destroy(this.originalElement);
02205 
02206             return this;
02207       },
02208 
02209       _mouseCapture: function(event) {
02210             var handle = false;
02211             for (var i in this.handles) {
02212                   if ($(this.handles[i])[0] == event.target) {
02213                         handle = true;
02214                   }
02215             }
02216 
02217             return !this.options.disabled && handle;
02218       },
02219 
02220       _mouseStart: function(event) {
02221 
02222             var o = this.options, iniPos = this.element.position(), el = this.element;
02223 
02224             this.resizing = true;
02225             this.documentScroll = { top: $(document).scrollTop(), left: $(document).scrollLeft() };
02226 
02227             // bugfix for http://dev.jquery.com/ticket/1749
02228             if (el.is('.ui-draggable') || (/absolute/).test(el.css('position'))) {
02229                   el.css({ position: 'absolute', top: iniPos.top, left: iniPos.left });
02230             }
02231 
02232             //Opera fixing relative position
02233             if ($.browser.opera && (/relative/).test(el.css('position')))
02234                   el.css({ position: 'relative', top: 'auto', left: 'auto' });
02235 
02236             this._renderProxy();
02237 
02238             var curleft = num(this.helper.css('left')), curtop = num(this.helper.css('top'));
02239 
02240             if (o.containment) {
02241                   curleft += $(o.containment).scrollLeft() || 0;
02242                   curtop += $(o.containment).scrollTop() || 0;
02243             }
02244 
02245             //Store needed variables
02246             this.offset = this.helper.offset();
02247             this.position = { left: curleft, top: curtop };
02248             this.size = this._helper ? { width: el.outerWidth(), height: el.outerHeight() } : { width: el.width(), height: el.height() };
02249             this.originalSize = this._helper ? { width: el.outerWidth(), height: el.outerHeight() } : { width: el.width(), height: el.height() };
02250             this.originalPosition = { left: curleft, top: curtop };
02251             this.sizeDiff = { width: el.outerWidth() - el.width(), height: el.outerHeight() - el.height() };
02252             this.originalMousePosition = { left: event.pageX, top: event.pageY };
02253 
02254             //Aspect Ratio
02255             this.aspectRatio = (typeof o.aspectRatio == 'number') ? o.aspectRatio : ((this.originalSize.width / this.originalSize.height) || 1);
02256 
02257           var cursor = $('.ui-resizable-' + this.axis).css('cursor');
02258           $('body').css('cursor', cursor == 'auto' ? this.axis + '-resize' : cursor);
02259 
02260             el.addClass("ui-resizable-resizing");
02261             this._propagate("start", event);
02262             return true;
02263       },
02264 
02265       _mouseDrag: function(event) {
02266 
02267             //Increase performance, avoid regex
02268             var el = this.helper, o = this.options, props = {},
02269                   self = this, smp = this.originalMousePosition, a = this.axis;
02270 
02271             var dx = (event.pageX-smp.left)||0, dy = (event.pageY-smp.top)||0;
02272             var trigger = this._change[a];
02273             if (!trigger) return false;
02274 
02275             // Calculate the attrs that will be change
02276             var data = trigger.apply(this, [event, dx, dy]), ie6 = $.browser.msie && $.browser.version < 7, csdif = this.sizeDiff;
02277 
02278             if (this._aspectRatio || event.shiftKey)
02279                   data = this._updateRatio(data, event);
02280 
02281             data = this._respectSize(data, event);
02282 
02283             // plugins callbacks need to be called first
02284             this._propagate("resize", event);
02285 
02286             el.css({
02287                   top: this.position.top + "px", left: this.position.left + "px",
02288                   width: this.size.width + "px", height: this.size.height + "px"
02289             });
02290 
02291             if (!this._helper && this._proportionallyResizeElements.length)
02292                   this._proportionallyResize();
02293 
02294             this._updateCache(data);
02295 
02296             // calling the user callback at the end
02297             this._trigger('resize', event, this.ui());
02298 
02299             return false;
02300       },
02301 
02302       _mouseStop: function(event) {
02303 
02304             this.resizing = false;
02305             var o = this.options, self = this;
02306 
02307             if(this._helper) {
02308                   var pr = this._proportionallyResizeElements, ista = pr.length && (/textarea/i).test(pr[0].nodeName),
02309                                     soffseth = ista && $.ui.hasScroll(pr[0], 'left') /* TODO - jump height */ ? 0 : self.sizeDiff.height,
02310                                           soffsetw = ista ? 0 : self.sizeDiff.width;
02311 
02312                   var s = { width: (self.size.width - soffsetw), height: (self.size.height - soffseth) },
02313                         left = (parseInt(self.element.css('left'), 10) + (self.position.left - self.originalPosition.left)) || null,
02314                         top = (parseInt(self.element.css('top'), 10) + (self.position.top - self.originalPosition.top)) || null;
02315 
02316                   if (!o.animate)
02317                         this.element.css($.extend(s, { top: top, left: left }));
02318 
02319                   self.helper.height(self.size.height);
02320                   self.helper.width(self.size.width);
02321 
02322                   if (this._helper && !o.animate) this._proportionallyResize();
02323             }
02324 
02325             $('body').css('cursor', 'auto');
02326 
02327             this.element.removeClass("ui-resizable-resizing");
02328 
02329             this._propagate("stop", event);
02330 
02331             if (this._helper) this.helper.remove();
02332             return false;
02333 
02334       },
02335 
02336       _updateCache: function(data) {
02337             var o = this.options;
02338             this.offset = this.helper.offset();
02339             if (isNumber(data.left)) this.position.left = data.left;
02340             if (isNumber(data.top)) this.position.top = data.top;
02341             if (isNumber(data.height)) this.size.height = data.height;
02342             if (isNumber(data.width)) this.size.width = data.width;
02343       },
02344 
02345       _updateRatio: function(data, event) {
02346 
02347             var o = this.options, cpos = this.position, csize = this.size, a = this.axis;
02348 
02349             if (data.height) data.width = (csize.height * this.aspectRatio);
02350             else if (data.width) data.height = (csize.width / this.aspectRatio);
02351 
02352             if (a == 'sw') {
02353                   data.left = cpos.left + (csize.width - data.width);
02354                   data.top = null;
02355             }
02356             if (a == 'nw') {
02357                   data.top = cpos.top + (csize.height - data.height);
02358                   data.left = cpos.left + (csize.width - data.width);
02359             }
02360 
02361             return data;
02362       },
02363 
02364       _respectSize: function(data, event) {
02365 
02366             var el = this.helper, o = this.options, pRatio = this._aspectRatio || event.shiftKey, a = this.axis,
02367                         ismaxw = isNumber(data.width) && o.maxWidth && (o.maxWidth < data.width), ismaxh = isNumber(data.height) && o.maxHeight && (o.maxHeight < data.height),
02368                               isminw = isNumber(data.width) && o.minWidth && (o.minWidth > data.width), isminh = isNumber(data.height) && o.minHeight && (o.minHeight > data.height);
02369 
02370             if (isminw) data.width = o.minWidth;
02371             if (isminh) data.height = o.minHeight;
02372             if (ismaxw) data.width = o.maxWidth;
02373             if (ismaxh) data.height = o.maxHeight;
02374 
02375             var dw = this.originalPosition.left + this.originalSize.width, dh = this.position.top + this.size.height;
02376             var cw = /sw|nw|w/.test(a), ch = /nw|ne|n/.test(a);
02377 
02378             if (isminw && cw) data.left = dw - o.minWidth;
02379             if (ismaxw && cw) data.left = dw - o.maxWidth;
02380             if (isminh && ch) data.top = dh - o.minHeight;
02381             if (ismaxh && ch) data.top = dh - o.maxHeight;
02382 
02383             // fixing jump error on top/left - bug #2330
02384             var isNotwh = !data.width && !data.height;
02385             if (isNotwh && !data.left && data.top) data.top = null;
02386             else if (isNotwh && !data.top && data.left) data.left = null;
02387 
02388             return data;
02389       },
02390 
02391       _proportionallyResize: function() {
02392 
02393             var o = this.options;
02394             if (!this._proportionallyResizeElements.length) return;
02395             var element = this.helper || this.element;
02396 
02397             for (var i=0; i < this._proportionallyResizeElements.length; i++) {
02398 
02399                   var prel = this._proportionallyResizeElements[i];
02400 
02401                   if (!this.borderDif) {
02402                         var b = [prel.css('borderTopWidth'), prel.css('borderRightWidth'), prel.css('borderBottomWidth'), prel.css('borderLeftWidth')],
02403                               p = [prel.css('paddingTop'), prel.css('paddingRight'), prel.css('paddingBottom'), prel.css('paddingLeft')];
02404 
02405                         this.borderDif = $.map(b, function(v, i) {
02406                               var border = parseInt(v,10)||0, padding = parseInt(p[i],10)||0;
02407                               return border + padding;
02408                         });
02409                   }
02410 
02411                   if ($.browser.msie && !(!($(element).is(':hidden') || $(element).parents(':hidden').length)))
02412                         continue;
02413 
02414                   prel.css({
02415                         height: (element.height() - this.borderDif[0] - this.borderDif[2]) || 0,
02416                         width: (element.width() - this.borderDif[1] - this.borderDif[3]) || 0
02417                   });
02418 
02419             };
02420 
02421       },
02422 
02423       _renderProxy: function() {
02424 
02425             var el = this.element, o = this.options;
02426             this.elementOffset = el.offset();
02427 
02428             if(this._helper) {
02429 
02430                   this.helper = this.helper || $('<div style="overflow:hidden;"></div>');
02431 
02432                   // fix ie6 offset TODO: This seems broken
02433                   var ie6 = $.browser.msie && $.browser.version < 7, ie6offset = (ie6 ? 1 : 0),
02434                   pxyoffset = ( ie6 ? 2 : -1 );
02435 
02436                   this.helper.addClass(this._helper).css({
02437                         width: this.element.outerWidth() + pxyoffset,
02438                         height: this.element.outerHeight() + pxyoffset,
02439                         position: 'absolute',
02440                         left: this.elementOffset.left - ie6offset +'px',
02441                         top: this.elementOffset.top - ie6offset +'px',
02442                         zIndex: ++o.zIndex //TODO: Don't modify option
02443                   });
02444 
02445                   this.helper
02446                         .appendTo("body")
02447                         .disableSelection();
02448 
02449             } else {
02450                   this.helper = this.element;
02451             }
02452 
02453       },
02454 
02455       _change: {
02456             e: function(event, dx, dy) {
02457                   return { width: this.originalSize.width + dx };
02458             },
02459             w: function(event, dx, dy) {
02460                   var o = this.options, cs = this.originalSize, sp = this.originalPosition;
02461                   return { left: sp.left + dx, width: cs.width - dx };
02462             },
02463             n: function(event, dx, dy) {
02464                   var o = this.options, cs = this.originalSize, sp = this.originalPosition;
02465                   return { top: sp.top + dy, height: cs.height - dy };
02466             },
02467             s: function(event, dx, dy) {
02468                   return { height: this.originalSize.height + dy };
02469             },
02470             se: function(event, dx, dy) {
02471                   return $.extend(this._change.s.apply(this, arguments), this._change.e.apply(this, [event, dx, dy]));
02472             },
02473             sw: function(event, dx, dy) {
02474                   return $.extend(this._change.s.apply(this, arguments), this._change.w.apply(this, [event, dx, dy]));
02475             },
02476             ne: function(event, dx, dy) {
02477                   return $.extend(this._change.n.apply(this, arguments), this._change.e.apply(this, [event, dx, dy]));
02478             },
02479             nw: function(event, dx, dy) {
02480                   return $.extend(this._change.n.apply(this, arguments), this._change.w.apply(this, [event, dx, dy]));
02481             }
02482       },
02483 
02484       _propagate: function(n, event) {
02485             $.ui.plugin.call(this, n, [event, this.ui()]);
02486             (n != "resize" && this._trigger(n, event, this.ui()));
02487       },
02488 
02489       plugins: {},
02490 
02491       ui: function() {
02492             return {
02493                   originalElement: this.originalElement,
02494                   element: this.element,
02495                   helper: this.helper,
02496                   position: this.position,
02497                   size: this.size,
02498                   originalSize: this.originalSize,
02499                   originalPosition: this.originalPosition
02500             };
02501       }
02502 
02503 });
02504 
02505 $.extend($.ui.resizable, {
02506       version: "1.8.4"
02507 });
02508 
02509 /*
02510  * Resizable Extensions
02511  */
02512 
02513 $.ui.plugin.add("resizable", "alsoResize", {
02514 
02515       start: function (event, ui) {
02516             var self = $(this).data("resizable"), o = self.options;
02517 
02518             var _store = function (exp) {
02519                   $(exp).each(function() {
02520                         var el = $(this);
02521                         el.data("resizable-alsoresize", {
02522                               width: parseInt(el.width(), 10), height: parseInt(el.height(), 10),
02523                               left: parseInt(el.css('left'), 10), top: parseInt(el.css('top'), 10),
02524                               position: el.css('position') // to reset Opera on stop()
02525                         });
02526                   });
02527             };
02528 
02529             if (typeof(o.alsoResize) == 'object' && !o.alsoResize.parentNode) {
02530                   if (o.alsoResize.length) { o.alsoResize = o.alsoResize[0]; _store(o.alsoResize); }
02531                   else { $.each(o.alsoResize, function (exp) { _store(exp); }); }
02532             }else{
02533                   _store(o.alsoResize);
02534             }
02535       },
02536 
02537       resize: function (event, ui) {
02538             var self = $(this).data("resizable"), o = self.options, os = self.originalSize, op = self.originalPosition;
02539 
02540             var delta = {
02541                   height: (self.size.height - os.height) || 0, width: (self.size.width - os.width) || 0,
02542                   top: (self.position.top - op.top) || 0, left: (self.position.left - op.left) || 0
02543             },
02544 
02545             _alsoResize = function (exp, c) {
02546                   $(exp).each(function() {
02547                         var el = $(this), start = $(this).data("resizable-alsoresize"), style = {}, 
02548                               css = c && c.length ? c : el.parents(ui.originalElement[0]).length ? ['width', 'height'] : ['width', 'height', 'top', 'left'];
02549 
02550                         $.each(css, function (i, prop) {
02551                               var sum = (start[prop]||0) + (delta[prop]||0);
02552                               if (sum && sum >= 0)
02553                                     style[prop] = sum || null;
02554                         });
02555 
02556                         // Opera fixing relative position
02557                         if ($.browser.opera && /relative/.test(el.css('position'))) {
02558                               self._revertToRelativePosition = true;
02559                               el.css({ position: 'absolute', top: 'auto', left: 'auto' });
02560                         }
02561 
02562                         el.css(style);
02563                   });
02564             };
02565 
02566             if (typeof(o.alsoResize) == 'object' && !o.alsoResize.nodeType) {
02567                   $.each(o.alsoResize, function (exp, c) { _alsoResize(exp, c); });
02568             }else{
02569                   _alsoResize(o.alsoResize);
02570             }
02571       },
02572 
02573       stop: function (event, ui) {
02574             var self = $(this).data("resizable"), o = self.options;
02575 
02576             var _reset = function (exp) {
02577                   $(exp).each(function() {
02578                         var el = $(this);
02579                         // reset position for Opera - no need to verify it was changed
02580                         el.css({ position: el.data("resizable-alsoresize").position });
02581                   });
02582             }
02583 
02584             if (self._revertToRelativePosition) {
02585                   self._revertToRelativePosition = false;
02586                   if (typeof(o.alsoResize) == 'object' && !o.alsoResize.nodeType) {
02587                         $.each(o.alsoResize, function (exp) { _reset(exp); });
02588                   }else{
02589                         _reset(o.alsoResize);
02590                   }
02591             }
02592 
02593             $(this).removeData("resizable-alsoresize");
02594       }
02595 });
02596 
02597 $.ui.plugin.add("resizable", "animate", {
02598 
02599       stop: function(event, ui) {
02600             var self = $(this).data("resizable"), o = self.options;
02601 
02602             var pr = self._proportionallyResizeElements, ista = pr.length && (/textarea/i).test(pr[0].nodeName),
02603                               soffseth = ista && $.ui.hasScroll(pr[0], 'left') /* TODO - jump height */ ? 0 : self.sizeDiff.height,
02604                                     soffsetw = ista ? 0 : self.sizeDiff.width;
02605 
02606             var style = { width: (self.size.width - soffsetw), height: (self.size.height - soffseth) },
02607                               left = (parseInt(self.element.css('left'), 10) + (self.position.left - self.originalPosition.left)) || null,
02608                                     top = (parseInt(self.element.css('top'), 10) + (self.position.top - self.originalPosition.top)) || null;
02609 
02610             self.element.animate(
02611                   $.extend(style, top && left ? { top: top, left: left } : {}), {
02612                         duration: o.animateDuration,
02613                         easing: o.animateEasing,
02614                         step: function() {
02615 
02616                               var data = {
02617                                     width: parseInt(self.element.css('width'), 10),
02618                                     height: parseInt(self.element.css('height'), 10),
02619                                     top: parseInt(self.element.css('top'), 10),
02620                                     left: parseInt(self.element.css('left'), 10)
02621                               };
02622 
02623                               if (pr && pr.length) $(pr[0]).css({ width: data.width, height: data.height });
02624 
02625                               // propagating resize, and updating values for each animation step
02626                               self._updateCache(data);
02627                               self._propagate("resize", event);
02628 
02629                         }
02630                   }
02631             );
02632       }
02633 
02634 });
02635 
02636 $.ui.plugin.add("resizable", "containment", {
02637 
02638       start: function(event, ui) {
02639             var self = $(this).data("resizable"), o = self.options, el = self.element;
02640             var oc = o.containment, ce = (oc instanceof $) ? oc.get(0) : (/parent/.test(oc)) ? el.parent().get(0) : oc;
02641             if (!ce) return;
02642 
02643             self.containerElement = $(ce);
02644 
02645             if (/document/.test(oc) || oc == document) {
02646                   self.containerOffset = { left: 0, top: 0 };
02647                   self.containerPosition = { left: 0, top: 0 };
02648 
02649                   self.parentData = {
02650                         element: $(document), left: 0, top: 0,
02651                         width: $(document).width(), height: $(document).height() || document.body.parentNode.scrollHeight
02652                   };
02653             }
02654 
02655             // i'm a node, so compute top, left, right, bottom
02656             else {
02657                   var element = $(ce), p = [];
02658                   $([ "Top", "Right", "Left", "Bottom" ]).each(function(i, name) { p[i] = num(element.css("padding" + name)); });
02659 
02660                   self.containerOffset = element.offset();
02661                   self.containerPosition = element.position();
02662                   self.containerSize = { height: (element.innerHeight() - p[3]), width: (element.innerWidth() - p[1]) };
02663 
02664                   var co = self.containerOffset, ch = self.containerSize.height,    cw = self.containerSize.width,
02665                                     width = ($.ui.hasScroll(ce, "left") ? ce.scrollWidth : cw ), height = ($.ui.hasScroll(ce) ? ce.scrollHeight : ch);
02666 
02667                   self.parentData = {
02668                         element: ce, left: co.left, top: co.top, width: width, height: height
02669                   };
02670             }
02671       },
02672 
02673       resize: function(event, ui) {
02674             var self = $(this).data("resizable"), o = self.options,
02675                         ps = self.containerSize, co = self.containerOffset, cs = self.size, cp = self.position,
02676                         pRatio = self._aspectRatio || event.shiftKey, cop = { top:0, left:0 }, ce = self.containerElement;
02677 
02678             if (ce[0] != document && (/static/).test(ce.css('position'))) cop = co;
02679 
02680             if (cp.left < (self._helper ? co.left : 0)) {
02681                   self.size.width = self.size.width + (self._helper ? (self.position.left - co.left) : (self.position.left - cop.left));
02682                   if (pRatio) self.size.height = self.size.width / o.aspectRatio;
02683                   self.position.left = o.helper ? co.left : 0;
02684             }
02685 
02686             if (cp.top < (self._helper ? co.top : 0)) {
02687                   self.size.height = self.size.height + (self._helper ? (self.position.top - co.top) : self.position.top);
02688                   if (pRatio) self.size.width = self.size.height * o.aspectRatio;
02689                   self.position.top = self._helper ? co.top : 0;
02690             }
02691 
02692             self.offset.left = self.parentData.left+self.position.left;
02693             self.offset.top = self.parentData.top+self.position.top;
02694 
02695             var woset = Math.abs( (self._helper ? self.offset.left - cop.left : (self.offset.left - cop.left)) + self.sizeDiff.width ),
02696                               hoset = Math.abs( (self._helper ? self.offset.top - cop.top : (self.offset.top - co.top)) + self.sizeDiff.height );
02697 
02698             var isParent = self.containerElement.get(0) == self.element.parent().get(0),
02699                 isOffsetRelative = /relative|absolute/.test(self.containerElement.css('position'));
02700 
02701             if(isParent && isOffsetRelative) woset -= self.parentData.left;
02702 
02703             if (woset + self.size.width >= self.parentData.width) {
02704                   self.size.width = self.parentData.width - woset;
02705                   if (pRatio) self.size.height = self.size.width / self.aspectRatio;
02706             }
02707 
02708             if (hoset + self.size.height >= self.parentData.height) {
02709                   self.size.height = self.parentData.height - hoset;
02710                   if (pRatio) self.size.width = self.size.height * self.aspectRatio;
02711             }
02712       },
02713 
02714       stop: function(event, ui){
02715             var self = $(this).data("resizable"), o = self.options, cp = self.position,
02716                         co = self.containerOffset, cop = self.containerPosition, ce = self.containerElement;
02717 
02718             var helper = $(self.helper), ho = helper.offset(), w = helper.outerWidth() - self.sizeDiff.width, h = helper.outerHeight() - self.sizeDiff.height;
02719 
02720             if (self._helper && !o.animate && (/relative/).test(ce.css('position')))
02721                   $(this).css({ left: ho.left - cop.left - co.left, width: w, height: h });
02722 
02723             if (self._helper && !o.animate && (/static/).test(ce.css('position')))
02724                   $(this).css({ left: ho.left - cop.left - co.left, width: w, height: h });
02725 
02726       }
02727 });
02728 
02729 $.ui.plugin.add("resizable", "ghost", {
02730 
02731       start: function(event, ui) {
02732 
02733             var self = $(this).data("resizable"), o = self.options, cs = self.size;
02734 
02735             self.ghost = self.originalElement.clone();
02736             self.ghost
02737                   .css({ opacity: .25, display: 'block', position: 'relative', height: cs.height, width: cs.width, margin: 0, left: 0, top: 0 })
02738                   .addClass('ui-resizable-ghost')
02739                   .addClass(typeof o.ghost == 'string' ? o.ghost : '');
02740 
02741             self.ghost.appendTo(self.helper);
02742 
02743       },
02744 
02745       resize: function(event, ui){
02746             var self = $(this).data("resizable"), o = self.options;
02747             if (self.ghost) self.ghost.css({ position: 'relative', height: self.size.height, width: self.size.width });
02748       },
02749 
02750       stop: function(event, ui){
02751             var self = $(this).data("resizable"), o = self.options;
02752             if (self.ghost && self.helper) self.helper.get(0).removeChild(self.ghost.get(0));
02753       }
02754 
02755 });
02756 
02757 $.ui.plugin.add("resizable", "grid", {
02758 
02759       resize: function(event, ui) {
02760             var self = $(this).data("resizable"), o = self.options, cs = self.size, os = self.originalSize, op = self.originalPosition, a = self.axis, ratio = o._aspectRatio || event.shiftKey;
02761             o.grid = typeof o.grid == "number" ? [o.grid, o.grid] : o.grid;
02762             var ox = Math.round((cs.width - os.width) / (o.grid[0]||1)) * (o.grid[0]||1), oy = Math.round((cs.height - os.height) / (o.grid[1]||1)) * (o.grid[1]||1);
02763 
02764             if (/^(se|s|e)$/.test(a)) {
02765                   self.size.width = os.width + ox;
02766                   self.size.height = os.height + oy;
02767             }
02768             else if (/^(ne)$/.test(a)) {
02769                   self.size.width = os.width + ox;
02770                   self.size.height = os.height + oy;
02771                   self.position.top = op.top - oy;
02772             }
02773             else if (/^(sw)$/.test(a)) {
02774                   self.size.width = os.width + ox;
02775                   self.size.height = os.height + oy;
02776                   self.position.left = op.left - ox;
02777             }
02778             else {
02779                   self.size.width = os.width + ox;
02780                   self.size.height = os.height + oy;
02781                   self.position.top = op.top - oy;
02782                   self.position.left = op.left - ox;
02783             }
02784       }
02785 
02786 });
02787 
02788 var num = function(v) {
02789       return parseInt(v, 10) || 0;
02790 };
02791 
02792 var isNumber = function(value) {
02793       return !isNaN(parseInt(value, 10));
02794 };
02795 
02796 })(jQuery);
02797 /*
02798  * jQuery UI Selectable 1.8.4
02799  *
02800  * Copyright 2010, AUTHORS.txt (http://jqueryui.com/about)
02801  * Dual licensed under the MIT or GPL Version 2 licenses.
02802  * http://jquery.org/license
02803  *
02804  * http://docs.jquery.com/UI/Selectables
02805  *
02806  * Depends:
02807  *    jquery.ui.core.js
02808  *    jquery.ui.mouse.js
02809  *    jquery.ui.widget.js
02810  */
02811 (function( $, undefined ) {
02812 
02813 $.widget("ui.selectable", $.ui.mouse, {
02814       options: {
02815             appendTo: 'body',
02816             autoRefresh: true,
02817             distance: 0,
02818             filter: '*',
02819             tolerance: 'touch'
02820       },
02821       _create: function() {
02822             var self = this;
02823 
02824             this.element.addClass("ui-selectable");
02825 
02826             this.dragged = false;
02827 
02828             // cache selectee children based on filter
02829             var selectees;
02830             this.refresh = function() {
02831                   selectees = $(self.options.filter, self.element[0]);
02832                   selectees.each(function() {
02833                         var $this = $(this);
02834                         var pos = $this.offset();
02835                         $.data(this, "selectable-item", {
02836                               element: this,
02837                               $element: $this,
02838                               left: pos.left,
02839                               top: pos.top,
02840                               right: pos.left + $this.outerWidth(),
02841                               bottom: pos.top + $this.outerHeight(),
02842                               startselected: false,
02843                               selected: $this.hasClass('ui-selected'),
02844                               selecting: $this.hasClass('ui-selecting'),
02845                               unselecting: $this.hasClass('ui-unselecting')
02846                         });
02847                   });
02848             };
02849             this.refresh();
02850 
02851             this.selectees = selectees.addClass("ui-selectee");
02852 
02853             this._mouseInit();
02854 
02855             this.helper = $("<div class='ui-selectable-helper'></div>");
02856       },
02857 
02858       destroy: function() {
02859             this.selectees
02860                   .removeClass("ui-selectee")
02861                   .removeData("selectable-item");
02862             this.element
02863                   .removeClass("ui-selectable ui-selectable-disabled")
02864                   .removeData("selectable")
02865                   .unbind(".selectable");
02866             this._mouseDestroy();
02867 
02868             return this;
02869       },
02870 
02871       _mouseStart: function(event) {
02872             var self = this;
02873 
02874             this.opos = [event.pageX, event.pageY];
02875 
02876             if (this.options.disabled)
02877                   return;
02878 
02879             var options = this.options;
02880 
02881             this.selectees = $(options.filter, this.element[0]);
02882 
02883             this._trigger("start", event);
02884 
02885             $(options.appendTo).append(this.helper);
02886             // position helper (lasso)
02887             this.helper.css({
02888                   "left": event.clientX,
02889                   "top": event.clientY,
02890                   "width": 0,
02891                   "height": 0
02892             });
02893 
02894             if (options.autoRefresh) {
02895                   this.refresh();
02896             }
02897 
02898             this.selectees.filter('.ui-selected').each(function() {
02899                   var selectee = $.data(this, "selectable-item");
02900                   selectee.startselected = true;
02901                   if (!event.metaKey) {
02902                         selectee.$element.removeClass('ui-selected');
02903                         selectee.selected = false;
02904                         selectee.$element.addClass('ui-unselecting');
02905                         selectee.unselecting = true;
02906                         // selectable UNSELECTING callback
02907                         self._trigger("unselecting", event, {
02908                               unselecting: selectee.element
02909                         });
02910                   }
02911             });
02912 
02913             $(event.target).parents().andSelf().each(function() {
02914                   var selectee = $.data(this, "selectable-item");
02915                   if (selectee) {
02916                         var doSelect = !event.metaKey || !selectee.$element.hasClass('ui-selected');
02917                         selectee.$element
02918                               .removeClass(doSelect ? "ui-unselecting" : "ui-selected")
02919                               .addClass(doSelect ? "ui-selecting" : "ui-unselecting");
02920                         selectee.unselecting = !doSelect;
02921                         selectee.selecting = doSelect;
02922                         selectee.selected = doSelect;
02923                         // selectable (UN)SELECTING callback
02924                         if (doSelect) {
02925                               self._trigger("selecting", event, {
02926                                     selecting: selectee.element
02927                               });
02928                         } else {
02929                               self._trigger("unselecting", event, {
02930                                     unselecting: selectee.element
02931                               });
02932                         }
02933                         return false;
02934                   }
02935             });
02936 
02937       },
02938 
02939       _mouseDrag: function(event) {
02940             var self = this;
02941             this.dragged = true;
02942 
02943             if (this.options.disabled)
02944                   return;
02945 
02946             var options = this.options;
02947 
02948             var x1 = this.opos[0], y1 = this.opos[1], x2 = event.pageX, y2 = event.pageY;
02949             if (x1 > x2) { var tmp = x2; x2 = x1; x1 = tmp; }
02950             if (y1 > y2) { var tmp = y2; y2 = y1; y1 = tmp; }
02951             this.helper.css({left: x1, top: y1, width: x2-x1, height: y2-y1});
02952 
02953             this.selectees.each(function() {
02954                   var selectee = $.data(this, "selectable-item");
02955                   //prevent helper from being selected if appendTo: selectable
02956                   if (!selectee || selectee.element == self.element[0])
02957                         return;
02958                   var hit = false;
02959                   if (options.tolerance == 'touch') {
02960                         hit = ( !(selectee.left > x2 || selectee.right < x1 || selectee.top > y2 || selectee.bottom < y1) );
02961                   } else if (options.tolerance == 'fit') {
02962                         hit = (selectee.left > x1 && selectee.right < x2 && selectee.top > y1 && selectee.bottom < y2);
02963                   }
02964 
02965                   if (hit) {
02966                         // SELECT
02967                         if (selectee.selected) {
02968                               selectee.$element.removeClass('ui-selected');
02969                               selectee.selected = false;
02970                         }
02971                         if (selectee.unselecting) {
02972                               selectee.$element.removeClass('ui-unselecting');
02973                               selectee.unselecting = false;
02974                         }
02975                         if (!selectee.selecting) {
02976                               selectee.$element.addClass('ui-selecting');
02977                               selectee.selecting = true;
02978                               // selectable SELECTING callback
02979                               self._trigger("selecting", event, {
02980                                     selecting: selectee.element
02981                               });
02982                         }
02983                   } else {
02984                         // UNSELECT
02985                         if (selectee.selecting) {
02986                               if (event.metaKey && selectee.startselected) {
02987                                     selectee.$element.removeClass('ui-selecting');
02988                                     selectee.selecting = false;
02989                                     selectee.$element.addClass('ui-selected');
02990                                     selectee.selected = true;
02991                               } else {
02992                                     selectee.$element.removeClass('ui-selecting');
02993                                     selectee.selecting = false;
02994                                     if (selectee.startselected) {
02995                                           selectee.$element.addClass('ui-unselecting');
02996                                           selectee.unselecting = true;
02997                                     }
02998                                     // selectable UNSELECTING callback
02999                                     self._trigger("unselecting", event, {
03000                                           unselecting: selectee.element
03001                                     });
03002                               }
03003                         }
03004                         if (selectee.selected) {
03005                               if (!event.metaKey && !selectee.startselected) {
03006                                     selectee.$element.removeClass('ui-selected');
03007                                     selectee.selected = false;
03008 
03009                                     selectee.$element.addClass('ui-unselecting');
03010                                     selectee.unselecting = true;
03011                                     // selectable UNSELECTING callback
03012                                     self._trigger("unselecting", event, {
03013                                           unselecting: selectee.element
03014                                     });
03015                               }
03016                         }
03017                   }
03018             });
03019 
03020             return false;
03021       },
03022 
03023       _mouseStop: function(event) {
03024             var self = this;
03025 
03026             this.dragged = false;
03027 
03028             var options = this.options;
03029 
03030             $('.ui-unselecting', this.element[0]).each(function() {
03031                   var selectee = $.data(this, "selectable-item");
03032                   selectee.$element.removeClass('ui-unselecting');
03033                   selectee.unselecting = false;
03034                   selectee.startselected = false;
03035                   self._trigger("unselected", event, {
03036                         unselected: selectee.element
03037                   });
03038             });
03039             $('.ui-selecting', this.element[0]).each(function() {
03040                   var selectee = $.data(this, "selectable-item");
03041                   selectee.$element.removeClass('ui-selecting').addClass('ui-selected');
03042                   selectee.selecting = false;
03043                   selectee.selected = true;
03044                   selectee.startselected = true;
03045                   self._trigger("selected", event, {
03046                         selected: selectee.element
03047                   });
03048             });
03049             this._trigger("stop", event);
03050 
03051             this.helper.remove();
03052 
03053             return false;
03054       }
03055 
03056 });
03057 
03058 $.extend($.ui.selectable, {
03059       version: "1.8.4"
03060 });
03061 
03062 })(jQuery);
03063 /*
03064  * jQuery UI Sortable 1.8.4
03065  *
03066  * Copyright 2010, AUTHORS.txt (http://jqueryui.com/about)
03067  * Dual licensed under the MIT or GPL Version 2 licenses.
03068  * http://jquery.org/license
03069  *
03070  * http://docs.jquery.com/UI/Sortables
03071  *
03072  * Depends:
03073  *    jquery.ui.core.js
03074  *    jquery.ui.mouse.js
03075  *    jquery.ui.widget.js
03076  */
03077 (function( $, undefined ) {
03078 
03079 $.widget("ui.sortable", $.ui.mouse, {
03080       widgetEventPrefix: "sort",
03081       options: {
03082             appendTo: "parent",
03083             axis: false,
03084             connectWith: false,
03085             containment: false,
03086             cursor: 'auto',
03087             cursorAt: false,
03088             dropOnEmpty: true,
03089             forcePlaceholderSize: false,
03090             forceHelperSize: false,
03091             grid: false,
03092             handle: false,
03093             helper: "original",
03094             items: '> *',
03095             opacity: false,
03096             placeholder: false,
03097             revert: false,
03098             scroll: true,
03099             scrollSensitivity: 20,
03100             scrollSpeed: 20,
03101             scope: "default",
03102             tolerance: "intersect",
03103             zIndex: 1000
03104       },
03105       _create: function() {
03106 
03107             var o = this.options;
03108             this.containerCache = {};
03109             this.element.addClass("ui-sortable");
03110 
03111             //Get the items
03112             this.refresh();
03113 
03114             //Let's determine if the items are floating
03115             this.floating = this.items.length ? (/left|right/).test(this.items[0].item.css('float')) : false;
03116 
03117             //Let's determine the parent's offset
03118             this.offset = this.element.offset();
03119 
03120             //Initialize mouse events for interaction
03121             this._mouseInit();
03122 
03123       },
03124 
03125       destroy: function() {
03126             this.element
03127                   .removeClass("ui-sortable ui-sortable-disabled")
03128                   .removeData("sortable")
03129                   .unbind(".sortable");
03130             this._mouseDestroy();
03131 
03132             for ( var i = this.items.length - 1; i >= 0; i-- )
03133                   this.items[i].item.removeData("sortable-item");
03134 
03135             return this;
03136       },
03137 
03138       _setOption: function(key, value){
03139             if ( key === "disabled" ) {
03140                   this.options[ key ] = value;
03141       
03142                   this.widget()
03143                         [ value ? "addClass" : "removeClass"]( "ui-sortable-disabled" );
03144             } else {
03145                   // Don't call widget base _setOption for disable as it adds ui-state-disabled class
03146                   $.Widget.prototype._setOption.apply(this, arguments);
03147             }
03148       },
03149 
03150       _mouseCapture: function(event, overrideHandle) {
03151 
03152             if (this.reverting) {
03153                   return false;
03154             }
03155 
03156             if(this.options.disabled || this.options.type == 'static') return false;
03157 
03158             //We have to refresh the items data once first
03159             this._refreshItems(event);
03160 
03161             //Find out if the clicked node (or one of its parents) is a actual item in this.items
03162             var currentItem = null, self = this, nodes = $(event.target).parents().each(function() {
03163                   if($.data(this, 'sortable-item') == self) {
03164                         currentItem = $(this);
03165                         return false;
03166                   }
03167             });
03168             if($.data(event.target, 'sortable-item') == self) currentItem = $(event.target);
03169 
03170             if(!currentItem) return false;
03171             if(this.options.handle && !overrideHandle) {
03172                   var validHandle = false;
03173 
03174                   $(this.options.handle, currentItem).find("*").andSelf().each(function() { if(this == event.target) validHandle = true; });
03175                   if(!validHandle) return false;
03176             }
03177 
03178             this.currentItem = currentItem;
03179             this._removeCurrentsFromItems();
03180             return true;
03181 
03182       },
03183 
03184       _mouseStart: function(event, overrideHandle, noActivation) {
03185 
03186             var o = this.options, self = this;
03187             this.currentContainer = this;
03188 
03189             //We only need to call refreshPositions, because the refreshItems call has been moved to mouseCapture
03190             this.refreshPositions();
03191 
03192             //Create and append the visible helper
03193             this.helper = this._createHelper(event);
03194 
03195             //Cache the helper size
03196             this._cacheHelperProportions();
03197 
03198             /*
03199              * - Position generation -
03200              * This block generates everything position related - it's the core of draggables.
03201              */
03202 
03203             //Cache the margins of the original element
03204             this._cacheMargins();
03205 
03206             //Get the next scrolling parent
03207             this.scrollParent = this.helper.scrollParent();
03208 
03209             //The element's absolute position on the page minus margins
03210             this.offset = this.currentItem.offset();
03211             this.offset = {
03212                   top: this.offset.top - this.margins.top,
03213                   left: this.offset.left - this.margins.left
03214             };
03215 
03216             // Only after we got the offset, we can change the helper's position to absolute
03217             // TODO: Still need to figure out a way to make relative sorting possible
03218             this.helper.css("position", "absolute");
03219             this.cssPosition = this.helper.css("position");
03220 
03221             $.extend(this.offset, {
03222                   click: { //Where the click happened, relative to the element
03223                         left: event.pageX - this.offset.left,
03224                         top: event.pageY - this.offset.top
03225                   },
03226                   parent: this._getParentOffset(),
03227                   relative: this._getRelativeOffset() //This is a relative to absolute position minus the actual position calculation - only used for relative positioned helper
03228             });
03229 
03230             //Generate the original position
03231             this.originalPosition = this._generatePosition(event);
03232             this.originalPageX = event.pageX;
03233             this.originalPageY = event.pageY;
03234 
03235             //Adjust the mouse offset relative to the helper if 'cursorAt' is supplied
03236             (o.cursorAt && this._adjustOffsetFromHelper(o.cursorAt));
03237 
03238             //Cache the former DOM position
03239             this.domPosition = { prev: this.currentItem.prev()[0], parent: this.currentItem.parent()[0] };
03240 
03241             //If the helper is not the original, hide the original so it's not playing any role during the drag, won't cause anything bad this way
03242             if(this.helper[0] != this.currentItem[0]) {
03243                   this.currentItem.hide();
03244             }
03245 
03246             //Create the placeholder
03247             this._createPlaceholder();
03248 
03249             //Set a containment if given in the options
03250             if(o.containment)
03251                   this._setContainment();
03252 
03253             if(o.cursor) { // cursor option
03254                   if ($('body').css("cursor")) this._storedCursor = $('body').css("cursor");
03255                   $('body').css("cursor", o.cursor);
03256             }
03257 
03258             if(o.opacity) { // opacity option
03259                   if (this.helper.css("opacity")) this._storedOpacity = this.helper.css("opacity");
03260                   this.helper.css("opacity", o.opacity);
03261             }
03262 
03263             if(o.zIndex) { // zIndex option
03264                   if (this.helper.css("zIndex")) this._storedZIndex = this.helper.css("zIndex");
03265                   this.helper.css("zIndex", o.zIndex);
03266             }
03267 
03268             //Prepare scrolling
03269             if(this.scrollParent[0] != document && this.scrollParent[0].tagName != 'HTML')
03270                   this.overflowOffset = this.scrollParent.offset();
03271 
03272             //Call callbacks
03273             this._trigger("start", event, this._uiHash());
03274 
03275             //Recache the helper size
03276             if(!this._preserveHelperProportions)
03277                   this._cacheHelperProportions();
03278 
03279 
03280             //Post 'activate' events to possible containers
03281             if(!noActivation) {
03282                    for (var i = this.containers.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) { this.containers[i]._trigger("activate", event, self._uiHash(this)); }
03283             }
03284 
03285             //Prepare possible droppables
03286             if($.ui.ddmanager)
03287                   $.ui.ddmanager.current = this;
03288 
03289             if ($.ui.ddmanager && !o.dropBehaviour)
03290                   $.ui.ddmanager.prepareOffsets(this, event);
03291 
03292             this.dragging = true;
03293 
03294             this.helper.addClass("ui-sortable-helper");
03295             this._mouseDrag(event); //Execute the drag once - this causes the helper not to be visible before getting its correct position
03296             return true;
03297 
03298       },
03299 
03300       _mouseDrag: function(event) {
03301 
03302             //Compute the helpers position
03303             this.position = this._generatePosition(event);
03304             this.positionAbs = this._convertPositionTo("absolute");
03305 
03306             if (!this.lastPositionAbs) {
03307                   this.lastPositionAbs = this.positionAbs;
03308             }
03309 
03310             //Do scrolling
03311             if(this.options.scroll) {
03312                   var o = this.options, scrolled = false;
03313                   if(this.scrollParent[0] != document && this.scrollParent[0].tagName != 'HTML') {
03314 
03315                         if((this.overflowOffset.top + this.scrollParent[0].offsetHeight) - event.pageY < o.scrollSensitivity)
03316                               this.scrollParent[0].scrollTop = scrolled = this.scrollParent[0].scrollTop + o.scrollSpeed;
03317                         else if(event.pageY - this.overflowOffset.top < o.scrollSensitivity)
03318                               this.scrollParent[0].scrollTop = scrolled = this.scrollParent[0].scrollTop - o.scrollSpeed;
03319 
03320                         if((this.overflowOffset.left + this.scrollParent[0].offsetWidth) - event.pageX < o.scrollSensitivity)
03321                               this.scrollParent[0].scrollLeft = scrolled = this.scrollParent[0].scrollLeft + o.scrollSpeed;
03322                         else if(event.pageX - this.overflowOffset.left < o.scrollSensitivity)
03323                               this.scrollParent[0].scrollLeft = scrolled = this.scrollParent[0].scrollLeft - o.scrollSpeed;
03324 
03325                   } else {
03326 
03327                         if(event.pageY - $(document).scrollTop() < o.scrollSensitivity)
03328                               scrolled = $(document).scrollTop($(document).scrollTop() - o.scrollSpeed);
03329                         else if($(window).height() - (event.pageY - $(document).scrollTop()) < o.scrollSensitivity)
03330                               scrolled = $(document).scrollTop($(document).scrollTop() + o.scrollSpeed);
03331 
03332                         if(event.pageX - $(document).scrollLeft() < o.scrollSensitivity)
03333                               scrolled = $(document).scrollLeft($(document).scrollLeft() - o.scrollSpeed);
03334                         else if($(window).width() - (event.pageX - $(document).scrollLeft()) < o.scrollSensitivity)
03335                               scrolled = $(document).scrollLeft($(document).scrollLeft() + o.scrollSpeed);
03336 
03337                   }
03338 
03339                   if(scrolled !== false && $.ui.ddmanager && !o.dropBehaviour)
03340                         $.ui.ddmanager.prepareOffsets(this, event);
03341             }
03342 
03343             //Regenerate the absolute position used for position checks
03344             this.positionAbs = this._convertPositionTo("absolute");
03345 
03346             //Set the helper position
03347             if(!this.options.axis || this.options.axis != "y") this.helper[0].style.left = this.position.left+'px';
03348             if(!this.options.axis || this.options.axis != "x") this.helper[0].style.top = this.position.top+'px';
03349 
03350             //Rearrange
03351             for (var i = this.items.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
03352 
03353                   //Cache variables and intersection, continue if no intersection
03354                   var item = this.items[i], itemElement = item.item[0], intersection = this._intersectsWithPointer(item);
03355                   if (!intersection) continue;
03356 
03357                   if(itemElement != this.currentItem[0] //cannot intersect with itself
03358                         &&    this.placeholder[intersection == 1 ? "next" : "prev"]()[0] != itemElement //no useless actions that have been done before
03359                         &&    !$.ui.contains(this.placeholder[0], itemElement) //no action if the item moved is the parent of the item checked
03360                         && (this.options.type == 'semi-dynamic' ? !$.ui.contains(this.element[0], itemElement) : true)
03361                         //&& itemElement.parentNode == this.placeholder[0].parentNode // only rearrange items within the same container
03362                   ) {
03363 
03364                         this.direction = intersection == 1 ? "down" : "up";
03365 
03366                         if (this.options.tolerance == "pointer" || this._intersectsWithSides(item)) {
03367                               this._rearrange(event, item);
03368                         } else {
