03369                               break;
03370                         }
03371 
03372                         this._trigger("change", event, this._uiHash());
03373                         break;
03374                   }
03375             }
03376 
03377             //Post events to containers
03378             this._contactContainers(event);
03379 
03380             //Interconnect with droppables
03381             if($.ui.ddmanager) $.ui.ddmanager.drag(this, event);
03382 
03383             //Call callbacks
03384             this._trigger('sort', event, this._uiHash());
03385 
03386             this.lastPositionAbs = this.positionAbs;
03387             return false;
03388 
03389       },
03390 
03391       _mouseStop: function(event, noPropagation) {
03392 
03393             if(!event) return;
03394 
03395             //If we are using droppables, inform the manager about the drop
03396             if ($.ui.ddmanager && !this.options.dropBehaviour)
03397                   $.ui.ddmanager.drop(this, event);
03398 
03399             if(this.options.revert) {
03400                   var self = this;
03401                   var cur = self.placeholder.offset();
03402 
03403                   self.reverting = true;
03404 
03405                   $(this.helper).animate({
03406                         left: cur.left - this.offset.parent.left - self.margins.left + (this.offsetParent[0] == document.body ? 0 : this.offsetParent[0].scrollLeft),
03407                         top: cur.top - this.offset.parent.top - self.margins.top + (this.offsetParent[0] == document.body ? 0 : this.offsetParent[0].scrollTop)
03408                   }, parseInt(this.options.revert, 10) || 500, function() {
03409                         self._clear(event);
03410                   });
03411             } else {
03412                   this._clear(event, noPropagation);
03413             }
03414 
03415             return false;
03416 
03417       },
03418 
03419       cancel: function() {
03420 
03421             var self = this;
03422 
03423             if(this.dragging) {
03424 
03425                   this._mouseUp();
03426 
03427                   if(this.options.helper == "original")
03428                         this.currentItem.css(this._storedCSS).removeClass("ui-sortable-helper");
03429                   else
03430                         this.currentItem.show();
03431 
03432                   //Post deactivating events to containers
03433                   for (var i = this.containers.length - 1; i >= 0; i--){
03434                         this.containers[i]._trigger("deactivate", null, self._uiHash(this));
03435                         if(this.containers[i].containerCache.over) {
03436                               this.containers[i]._trigger("out", null, self._uiHash(this));
03437                               this.containers[i].containerCache.over = 0;
03438                         }
03439                   }
03440 
03441             }
03442 
03443             //$(this.placeholder[0]).remove(); would have been the jQuery way - unfortunately, it unbinds ALL events from the original node!
03444             if(this.placeholder[0].parentNode) this.placeholder[0].parentNode.removeChild(this.placeholder[0]);
03445             if(this.options.helper != "original" && this.helper && this.helper[0].parentNode) this.helper.remove();
03446 
03447             $.extend(this, {
03448                   helper: null,
03449                   dragging: false,
03450                   reverting: false,
03451                   _noFinalSort: null
03452             });
03453 
03454             if(this.domPosition.prev) {
03455                   $(this.domPosition.prev).after(this.currentItem);
03456             } else {
03457                   $(this.domPosition.parent).prepend(this.currentItem);
03458             }
03459 
03460             return this;
03461 
03462       },
03463 
03464       serialize: function(o) {
03465 
03466             var items = this._getItemsAsjQuery(o && o.connected);
03467             var str = []; o = o || {};
03468 
03469             $(items).each(function() {
03470                   var res = ($(o.item || this).attr(o.attribute || 'id') || '').match(o.expression || (/(.+)[-=_](.+)/));
03471                   if(res) str.push((o.key || res[1]+'[]')+'='+(o.key && o.expression ? res[1] : res[2]));
03472             });
03473 
03474             if(!str.length && o.key) {
03475                   str.push(o.key + '=');
03476             }
03477 
03478             return str.join('&');
03479 
03480       },
03481 
03482       toArray: function(o) {
03483 
03484             var items = this._getItemsAsjQuery(o && o.connected);
03485             var ret = []; o = o || {};
03486 
03487             items.each(function() { ret.push($(o.item || this).attr(o.attribute || 'id') || ''); });
03488             return ret;
03489 
03490       },
03491 
03492       /* Be careful with the following core functions */
03493       _intersectsWith: function(item) {
03494 
03495             var x1 = this.positionAbs.left,
03496                   x2 = x1 + this.helperProportions.width,
03497                   y1 = this.positionAbs.top,
03498                   y2 = y1 + this.helperProportions.height;
03499 
03500             var l = item.left,
03501                   r = l + item.width,
03502                   t = item.top,
03503                   b = t + item.height;
03504 
03505             var dyClick = this.offset.click.top,
03506                   dxClick = this.offset.click.left;
03507 
03508             var isOverElement = (y1 + dyClick) > t && (y1 + dyClick) < b && (x1 + dxClick) > l && (x1 + dxClick) < r;
03509 
03510             if(      this.options.tolerance == "pointer"
03511                   || this.options.forcePointerForContainers
03512                   || (this.options.tolerance != "pointer" && this.helperProportions[this.floating ? 'width' : 'height'] > item[this.floating ? 'width' : 'height'])
03513             ) {
03514                   return isOverElement;
03515             } else {
03516 
03517                   return (l < x1 + (this.helperProportions.width / 2) // Right Half
03518                         && x2 - (this.helperProportions.width / 2) < r // Left Half
03519                         && t < y1 + (this.helperProportions.height / 2) // Bottom Half
03520                         && y2 - (this.helperProportions.height / 2) < b ); // Top Half
03521 
03522             }
03523       },
03524 
03525       _intersectsWithPointer: function(item) {
03526 
03527             var isOverElementHeight = $.ui.isOverAxis(this.positionAbs.top + this.offset.click.top, item.top, item.height),
03528                   isOverElementWidth = $.ui.isOverAxis(this.positionAbs.left + this.offset.click.left, item.left, item.width),
03529                   isOverElement = isOverElementHeight && isOverElementWidth,
03530                   verticalDirection = this._getDragVerticalDirection(),
03531                   horizontalDirection = this._getDragHorizontalDirection();
03532 
03533             if (!isOverElement)
03534                   return false;
03535 
03536             return this.floating ?
03537                   ( ((horizontalDirection && horizontalDirection == "right") || verticalDirection == "down") ? 2 : 1 )
03538                   : ( verticalDirection && (verticalDirection == "down" ? 2 : 1) );
03539 
03540       },
03541 
03542       _intersectsWithSides: function(item) {
03543 
03544             var isOverBottomHalf = $.ui.isOverAxis(this.positionAbs.top + this.offset.click.top, item.top + (item.height/2), item.height),
03545                   isOverRightHalf = $.ui.isOverAxis(this.positionAbs.left + this.offset.click.left, item.left + (item.width/2), item.width),
03546                   verticalDirection = this._getDragVerticalDirection(),
03547                   horizontalDirection = this._getDragHorizontalDirection();
03548 
03549             if (this.floating && horizontalDirection) {
03550                   return ((horizontalDirection == "right" && isOverRightHalf) || (horizontalDirection == "left" && !isOverRightHalf));
03551             } else {
03552                   return verticalDirection && ((verticalDirection == "down" && isOverBottomHalf) || (verticalDirection == "up" && !isOverBottomHalf));
03553             }
03554 
03555       },
03556 
03557       _getDragVerticalDirection: function() {
03558             var delta = this.positionAbs.top - this.lastPositionAbs.top;
03559             return delta != 0 && (delta > 0 ? "down" : "up");
03560       },
03561 
03562       _getDragHorizontalDirection: function() {
03563             var delta = this.positionAbs.left - this.lastPositionAbs.left;
03564             return delta != 0 && (delta > 0 ? "right" : "left");
03565       },
03566 
03567       refresh: function(event) {
03568             this._refreshItems(event);
03569             this.refreshPositions();
03570             return this;
03571       },
03572 
03573       _connectWith: function() {
03574             var options = this.options;
03575             return options.connectWith.constructor == String
03576                   ? [options.connectWith]
03577                   : options.connectWith;
03578       },
03579       
03580       _getItemsAsjQuery: function(connected) {
03581 
03582             var self = this;
03583             var items = [];
03584             var queries = [];
03585             var connectWith = this._connectWith();
03586 
03587             if(connectWith && connected) {
03588                   for (var i = connectWith.length - 1; i >= 0; i--){
03589                         var cur = $(connectWith[i]);
03590                         for (var j = cur.length - 1; j >= 0; j--){
03591                               var inst = $.data(cur[j], 'sortable');
03592                               if(inst && inst != this && !inst.options.disabled) {
03593                                     queries.push([$.isFunction(inst.options.items) ? inst.options.items.call(inst.element) : $(inst.options.items, inst.element).not(".ui-sortable-helper").not('.ui-sortable-placeholder'), inst]);
03594                               }
03595                         };
03596                   };
03597             }
03598 
03599             queries.push([$.isFunction(this.options.items) ? this.options.items.call(this.element, null, { options: this.options, item: this.currentItem }) : $(this.options.items, this.element).not(".ui-sortable-helper").not('.ui-sortable-placeholder'), this]);
03600 
03601             for (var i = queries.length - 1; i >= 0; i--){
03602                   queries[i][0].each(function() {
03603                         items.push(this);
03604                   });
03605             };
03606 
03607             return $(items);
03608 
03609       },
03610 
03611       _removeCurrentsFromItems: function() {
03612 
03613             var list = this.currentItem.find(":data(sortable-item)");
03614 
03615             for (var i=0; i < this.items.length; i++) {
03616 
03617                   for (var j=0; j < list.length; j++) {
03618                         if(list[j] == this.items[i].item[0])
03619                               this.items.splice(i,1);
03620                   };
03621 
03622             };
03623 
03624       },
03625 
03626       _refreshItems: function(event) {
03627 
03628             this.items = [];
03629             this.containers = [this];
03630             var items = this.items;
03631             var self = this;
03632             var queries = [[$.isFunction(this.options.items) ? this.options.items.call(this.element[0], event, { item: this.currentItem }) : $(this.options.items, this.element), this]];
03633             var connectWith = this._connectWith();
03634 
03635             if(connectWith) {
03636                   for (var i = connectWith.length - 1; i >= 0; i--){
03637                         var cur = $(connectWith[i]);
03638                         for (var j = cur.length - 1; j >= 0; j--){
03639                               var inst = $.data(cur[j], 'sortable');
03640                               if(inst && inst != this && !inst.options.disabled) {
03641                                     queries.push([$.isFunction(inst.options.items) ? inst.options.items.call(inst.element[0], event, { item: this.currentItem }) : $(inst.options.items, inst.element), inst]);
03642                                     this.containers.push(inst);
03643                               }
03644                         };
03645                   };
03646             }
03647 
03648             for (var i = queries.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
03649                   var targetData = queries[i][1];
03650                   var _queries = queries[i][0];
03651 
03652                   for (var j=0, queriesLength = _queries.length; j < queriesLength; j++) {
03653                         var item = $(_queries[j]);
03654 
03655                         item.data('sortable-item', targetData); // Data for target checking (mouse manager)
03656 
03657                         items.push({
03658                               item: item,
03659                               instance: targetData,
03660                               width: 0, height: 0,
03661                               left: 0, top: 0
03662                         });
03663                   };
03664             };
03665 
03666       },
03667 
03668       refreshPositions: function(fast) {
03669 
03670             //This has to be redone because due to the item being moved out/into the offsetParent, the offsetParent's position will change
03671             if(this.offsetParent && this.helper) {
03672                   this.offset.parent = this._getParentOffset();
03673             }
03674 
03675             for (var i = this.items.length - 1; i >= 0; i--){
03676                   var item = this.items[i];
03677 
03678                   var t = this.options.toleranceElement ? $(this.options.toleranceElement, item.item) : item.item;
03679 
03680                   if (!fast) {
03681                         item.width = t.outerWidth();
03682                         item.height = t.outerHeight();
03683                   }
03684 
03685                   var p = t.offset();
03686                   item.left = p.left;
03687                   item.top = p.top;
03688             };
03689 
03690             if(this.options.custom && this.options.custom.refreshContainers) {
03691                   this.options.custom.refreshContainers.call(this);
03692             } else {
03693                   for (var i = this.containers.length - 1; i >= 0; i--){
03694                         var p = this.containers[i].element.offset();
03695                         this.containers[i].containerCache.left = p.left;
03696                         this.containers[i].containerCache.top = p.top;
03697                         this.containers[i].containerCache.width   = this.containers[i].element.outerWidth();
03698                         this.containers[i].containerCache.height = this.containers[i].element.outerHeight();
03699                   };
03700             }
03701 
03702             return this;
03703       },
03704 
03705       _createPlaceholder: function(that) {
03706 
03707             var self = that || this, o = self.options;
03708 
03709             if(!o.placeholder || o.placeholder.constructor == String) {
03710                   var className = o.placeholder;
03711                   o.placeholder = {
03712                         element: function() {
03713 
03714                               var el = $(document.createElement(self.currentItem[0].nodeName))
03715                                     .addClass(className || self.currentItem[0].className+" ui-sortable-placeholder")
03716                                     .removeClass("ui-sortable-helper")[0];
03717 
03718                               if(!className)
03719                                     el.style.visibility = "hidden";
03720 
03721                               return el;
03722                         },
03723                         update: function(container, p) {
03724 
03725                               // 1. If a className is set as 'placeholder option, we don't force sizes - the class is responsible for that
03726                               // 2. The option 'forcePlaceholderSize can be enabled to force it even if a class name is specified
03727                               if(className && !o.forcePlaceholderSize) return;
03728 
03729                               //If the element doesn't have a actual height by itself (without styles coming from a stylesheet), it receives the inline height from the dragged item
03730                               if(!p.height()) { p.height(self.currentItem.innerHeight() - parseInt(self.currentItem.css('paddingTop')||0, 10) - parseInt(self.currentItem.css('paddingBottom')||0, 10)); };
03731                               if(!p.width()) { p.width(self.currentItem.innerWidth() - parseInt(self.currentItem.css('paddingLeft')||0, 10) - parseInt(self.currentItem.css('paddingRight')||0, 10)); };
03732                         }
03733                   };
03734             }
03735 
03736             //Create the placeholder
03737             self.placeholder = $(o.placeholder.element.call(self.element, self.currentItem));
03738 
03739             //Append it after the actual current item
03740             self.currentItem.after(self.placeholder);
03741 
03742             //Update the size of the placeholder (TODO: Logic to fuzzy, see line 316/317)
03743             o.placeholder.update(self, self.placeholder);
03744 
03745       },
03746 
03747       _contactContainers: function(event) {
03748             
03749             // get innermost container that intersects with item 
03750             var innermostContainer = null, innermostIndex = null;       
03751             
03752             
03753             for (var i = this.containers.length - 1; i >= 0; i--){
03754 
03755                   // never consider a container that's located within the item itself 
03756                   if($.ui.contains(this.currentItem[0], this.containers[i].element[0]))
03757                         continue;
03758 
03759                   if(this._intersectsWith(this.containers[i].containerCache)) {
03760 
03761                         // if we've already found a container and it's more "inner" than this, then continue 
03762                         if(innermostContainer && $.ui.contains(this.containers[i].element[0], innermostContainer.element[0]))
03763                               continue;
03764 
03765                         innermostContainer = this.containers[i]; 
03766                         innermostIndex = i;
03767                               
03768                   } else {
03769                         // container doesn't intersect. trigger "out" event if necessary 
03770                         if(this.containers[i].containerCache.over) {
03771                               this.containers[i]._trigger("out", event, this._uiHash(this));
03772                               this.containers[i].containerCache.over = 0;
03773                         }
03774                   }
03775 
03776             }
03777             
03778             // if no intersecting containers found, return 
03779             if(!innermostContainer) return; 
03780 
03781             // move the item into the container if it's not there already
03782             if(this.containers.length === 1) {
03783                   this.containers[innermostIndex]._trigger("over", event, this._uiHash(this));
03784                   this.containers[innermostIndex].containerCache.over = 1;
03785             } else if(this.currentContainer != this.containers[innermostIndex]) { 
03786 
03787                   //When entering a new container, we will find the item with the least distance and append our item near it 
03788                   var dist = 10000; var itemWithLeastDistance = null; var base = this.positionAbs[this.containers[innermostIndex].floating ? 'left' : 'top']; 
03789                   for (var j = this.items.length - 1; j >= 0; j--) { 
03790                         if(!$.ui.contains(this.containers[innermostIndex].element[0], this.items[j].item[0])) continue; 
03791                         var cur = this.items[j][this.containers[innermostIndex].floating ? 'left' : 'top']; 
03792                         if(Math.abs(cur - base) < dist) { 
03793                               dist = Math.abs(cur - base); itemWithLeastDistance = this.items[j]; 
03794                         } 
03795                   } 
03796 
03797                   if(!itemWithLeastDistance && !this.options.dropOnEmpty) //Check if dropOnEmpty is enabled 
03798                         return; 
03799 
03800                   this.currentContainer = this.containers[innermostIndex]; 
03801                   itemWithLeastDistance ? this._rearrange(event, itemWithLeastDistance, null, true) : this._rearrange(event, null, this.containers[innermostIndex].element, true); 
03802                   this._trigger("change", event, this._uiHash()); 
03803                   this.containers[innermostIndex]._trigger("change", event, this._uiHash(this)); 
03804 
03805                   //Update the placeholder 
03806                   this.options.placeholder.update(this.currentContainer, this.placeholder); 
03807             
03808                   this.containers[innermostIndex]._trigger("over", event, this._uiHash(this)); 
03809                   this.containers[innermostIndex].containerCache.over = 1;
03810             } 
03811       
03812             
03813       },
03814 
03815       _createHelper: function(event) {
03816 
03817             var o = this.options;
03818             var helper = $.isFunction(o.helper) ? $(o.helper.apply(this.element[0], [event, this.currentItem])) : (o.helper == 'clone' ? this.currentItem.clone() : this.currentItem);
03819 
03820             if(!helper.parents('body').length) //Add the helper to the DOM if that didn't happen already
03821                   $(o.appendTo != 'parent' ? o.appendTo : this.currentItem[0].parentNode)[0].appendChild(helper[0]);
03822 
03823             if(helper[0] == this.currentItem[0])
03824                   this._storedCSS = { width: this.currentItem[0].style.width, height: this.currentItem[0].style.height, position: this.currentItem.css("position"), top: this.currentItem.css("top"), left: this.currentItem.css("left") };
03825 
03826             if(helper[0].style.width == '' || o.forceHelperSize) helper.width(this.currentItem.width());
03827             if(helper[0].style.height == '' || o.forceHelperSize) helper.height(this.currentItem.height());
03828 
03829             return helper;
03830 
03831       },
03832 
03833       _adjustOffsetFromHelper: function(obj) {
03834             if (typeof obj == 'string') {
03835                   obj = obj.split(' ');
03836             }
03837             if ($.isArray(obj)) {
03838                   obj = {left: +obj[0], top: +obj[1] || 0};
03839             }
03840             if ('left' in obj) {
03841                   this.offset.click.left = obj.left + this.margins.left;
03842             }
03843             if ('right' in obj) {
03844                   this.offset.click.left = this.helperProportions.width - obj.right + this.margins.left;
03845             }
03846             if ('top' in obj) {
03847                   this.offset.click.top = obj.top + this.margins.top;
03848             }
03849             if ('bottom' in obj) {
03850                   this.offset.click.top = this.helperProportions.height - obj.bottom + this.margins.top;
03851             }
03852       },
03853 
03854       _getParentOffset: function() {
03855 
03856 
03857             //Get the offsetParent and cache its position
03858             this.offsetParent = this.helper.offsetParent();
03859             var po = this.offsetParent.offset();
03860 
03861             // This is a special case where we need to modify a offset calculated on start, since the following happened:
03862             // 1. The position of the helper is absolute, so it's position is calculated based on the next positioned parent
03863             // 2. The actual offset parent is a child of the scroll parent, and the scroll parent isn't the document, which means that
03864             //    the scroll is included in the initial calculation of the offset of the parent, and never recalculated upon drag
03865             if(this.cssPosition == 'absolute' && this.scrollParent[0] != document && $.ui.contains(this.scrollParent[0], this.offsetParent[0])) {
03866                   po.left += this.scrollParent.scrollLeft();
03867                   po.top += this.scrollParent.scrollTop();
03868             }
03869 
03870             if((this.offsetParent[0] == document.body) //This needs to be actually done for all browsers, since pageX/pageY includes this information
03871             || (this.offsetParent[0].tagName && this.offsetParent[0].tagName.toLowerCase() == 'html' && $.browser.msie)) //Ugly IE fix
03872                   po = { top: 0, left: 0 };
03873 
03874             return {
03875                   top: po.top + (parseInt(this.offsetParent.css("borderTopWidth"),10) || 0),
03876                   left: po.left + (parseInt(this.offsetParent.css("borderLeftWidth"),10) || 0)
03877             };
03878 
03879       },
03880 
03881       _getRelativeOffset: function() {
03882 
03883             if(this.cssPosition == "relative") {
03884                   var p = this.currentItem.position();
03885                   return {
03886                         top: p.top - (parseInt(this.helper.css("top"),10) || 0) + this.scrollParent.scrollTop(),
03887                         left: p.left - (parseInt(this.helper.css("left"),10) || 0) + this.scrollParent.scrollLeft()
03888                   };
03889             } else {
03890                   return { top: 0, left: 0 };
03891             }
03892 
03893       },
03894 
03895       _cacheMargins: function() {
03896             this.margins = {
03897                   left: (parseInt(this.currentItem.css("marginLeft"),10) || 0),
03898                   top: (parseInt(this.currentItem.css("marginTop"),10) || 0)
03899             };
03900       },
03901 
03902       _cacheHelperProportions: function() {
03903             this.helperProportions = {
03904                   width: this.helper.outerWidth(),
03905                   height: this.helper.outerHeight()
03906             };
03907       },
03908 
03909       _setContainment: function() {
03910 
03911             var o = this.options;
03912             if(o.containment == 'parent') o.containment = this.helper[0].parentNode;
03913             if(o.containment == 'document' || o.containment == 'window') this.containment = [
03914                   0 - this.offset.relative.left - this.offset.parent.left,
03915                   0 - this.offset.relative.top - this.offset.parent.top,
03916                   $(o.containment == 'document' ? document : window).width() - this.helperProportions.width - this.margins.left,
03917                   ($(o.containment == 'document' ? document : window).height() || document.body.parentNode.scrollHeight) - this.helperProportions.height - this.margins.top
03918             ];
03919 
03920             if(!(/^(document|window|parent)$/).test(o.containment)) {
03921                   var ce = $(o.containment)[0];
03922                   var co = $(o.containment).offset();
03923                   var over = ($(ce).css("overflow") != 'hidden');
03924 
03925                   this.containment = [
03926                         co.left + (parseInt($(ce).css("borderLeftWidth"),10) || 0) + (parseInt($(ce).css("paddingLeft"),10) || 0) - this.margins.left,
03927                         co.top + (parseInt($(ce).css("borderTopWidth"),10) || 0) + (parseInt($(ce).css("paddingTop"),10) || 0) - this.margins.top,
03928                         co.left+(over ? Math.max(ce.scrollWidth,ce.offsetWidth) : ce.offsetWidth) - (parseInt($(ce).css("borderLeftWidth"),10) || 0) - (parseInt($(ce).css("paddingRight"),10) || 0) - this.helperProportions.width - this.margins.left,
03929                         co.top+(over ? Math.max(ce.scrollHeight,ce.offsetHeight) : ce.offsetHeight) - (parseInt($(ce).css("borderTopWidth"),10) || 0) - (parseInt($(ce).css("paddingBottom"),10) || 0) - this.helperProportions.height - this.margins.top
03930                   ];
03931             }
03932 
03933       },
03934 
03935       _convertPositionTo: function(d, pos) {
03936 
03937             if(!pos) pos = this.position;
03938             var mod = d == "absolute" ? 1 : -1;
03939             var o = this.options, scroll = this.cssPosition == 'absolute' && !(this.scrollParent[0] != document && $.ui.contains(this.scrollParent[0], this.offsetParent[0])) ? this.offsetParent : this.scrollParent, scrollIsRootNode = (/(html|body)/i).test(scroll[0].tagName);
03940 
03941             return {
03942                   top: (
03943                         pos.top                                                                                                     // The absolute mouse position
03944                         + this.offset.relative.top * mod                                                          // Only for relative positioned nodes: Relative offset from element to offset parent
03945                         + this.offset.parent.top * mod                                                                  // The offsetParent's offset without borders (offset + border)
03946                         - ($.browser.safari && this.cssPosition == 'fixed' ? 0 : ( this.cssPosition == 'fixed' ? -this.scrollParent.scrollTop() : ( scrollIsRootNode ? 0 : scroll.scrollTop() ) ) * mod)
03947                   ),
03948                   left: (
03949                         pos.left                                                                                              // The absolute mouse position
03950                         + this.offset.relative.left * mod                                                         // Only for relative positioned nodes: Relative offset from element to offset parent
03951                         + this.offset.parent.left * mod                                                                 // The offsetParent's offset without borders (offset + border)
03952                         - ($.browser.safari && this.cssPosition == 'fixed' ? 0 : ( this.cssPosition == 'fixed' ? -this.scrollParent.scrollLeft() : scrollIsRootNode ? 0 : scroll.scrollLeft() ) * mod)
03953                   )
03954             };
03955 
03956       },
03957 
03958       _generatePosition: function(event) {
03959 
03960             var o = this.options, scroll = this.cssPosition == 'absolute' && !(this.scrollParent[0] != document && $.ui.contains(this.scrollParent[0], this.offsetParent[0])) ? this.offsetParent : this.scrollParent, scrollIsRootNode = (/(html|body)/i).test(scroll[0].tagName);
03961 
03962             // This is another very weird special case that only happens for relative elements:
03963             // 1. If the css position is relative
03964             // 2. and the scroll parent is the document or similar to the offset parent
03965             // we have to refresh the relative offset during the scroll so there are no jumps
03966             if(this.cssPosition == 'relative' && !(this.scrollParent[0] != document && this.scrollParent[0] != this.offsetParent[0])) {
03967                   this.offset.relative = this._getRelativeOffset();
03968             }
03969 
03970             var pageX = event.pageX;
03971             var pageY = event.pageY;
03972 
03973             /*
03974              * - Position constraining -
03975              * Constrain the position to a mix of grid, containment.
03976              */
03977 
03978             if(this.originalPosition) { //If we are not dragging yet, we won't check for options
03979 
03980                   if(this.containment) {
03981                         if(event.pageX - this.offset.click.left < this.containment[0]) pageX = this.containment[0] + this.offset.click.left;
03982                         if(event.pageY - this.offset.click.top < this.containment[1]) pageY = this.containment[1] + this.offset.click.top;
03983                         if(event.pageX - this.offset.click.left > this.containment[2]) pageX = this.containment[2] + this.offset.click.left;
03984                         if(event.pageY - this.offset.click.top > this.containment[3]) pageY = this.containment[3] + this.offset.click.top;
03985                   }
03986 
03987                   if(o.grid) {
03988                         var top = this.originalPageY + Math.round((pageY - this.originalPageY) / o.grid[1]) * o.grid[1];
03989                         pageY = this.containment ? (!(top - this.offset.click.top < this.containment[1] || top - this.offset.click.top > this.containment[3]) ? top : (!(top - this.offset.click.top < this.containment[1]) ? top - o.grid[1] : top + o.grid[1])) : top;
03990 
03991                         var left = this.originalPageX + Math.round((pageX - this.originalPageX) / o.grid[0]) * o.grid[0];
03992                         pageX = this.containment ? (!(left - this.offset.click.left < this.containment[0] || left - this.offset.click.left > this.containment[2]) ? left : (!(left - this.offset.click.left < this.containment[0]) ? left - o.grid[0] : left + o.grid[0])) : left;
03993                   }
03994 
03995             }
03996 
03997             return {
03998                   top: (
03999                         pageY                                                                                           // The absolute mouse position
04000                         - this.offset.click.top                                                                         // Click offset (relative to the element)
04001                         - this.offset.relative.top                                                                      // Only for relative positioned nodes: Relative offset from element to offset parent
04002                         - this.offset.parent.top                                                                        // The offsetParent's offset without borders (offset + border)
04003                         + ($.browser.safari && this.cssPosition == 'fixed' ? 0 : ( this.cssPosition == 'fixed' ? -this.scrollParent.scrollTop() : ( scrollIsRootNode ? 0 : scroll.scrollTop() ) ))
04004                   ),
04005                   left: (
04006                         pageX                                                                                           // The absolute mouse position
04007                         - this.offset.click.left                                                                        // Click offset (relative to the element)
04008                         - this.offset.relative.left                                                                     // Only for relative positioned nodes: Relative offset from element to offset parent
04009                         - this.offset.parent.left                                                                       // The offsetParent's offset without borders (offset + border)
04010                         + ($.browser.safari && this.cssPosition == 'fixed' ? 0 : ( this.cssPosition == 'fixed' ? -this.scrollParent.scrollLeft() : scrollIsRootNode ? 0 : scroll.scrollLeft() ))
04011                   )
04012             };
04013 
04014       },
04015 
04016       _rearrange: function(event, i, a, hardRefresh) {
04017 
04018             a ? a[0].appendChild(this.placeholder[0]) : i.item[0].parentNode.insertBefore(this.placeholder[0], (this.direction == 'down' ? i.item[0] : i.item[0].nextSibling));
04019 
04020             //Various things done here to improve the performance:
04021             // 1. we create a setTimeout, that calls refreshPositions
04022             // 2. on the instance, we have a counter variable, that get's higher after every append
04023             // 3. on the local scope, we copy the counter variable, and check in the timeout, if it's still the same
04024             // 4. this lets only the last addition to the timeout stack through
04025             this.counter = this.counter ? ++this.counter : 1;
04026             var self = this, counter = this.counter;
04027 
04028             window.setTimeout(function() {
04029                   if(counter == self.counter) self.refreshPositions(!hardRefresh); //Precompute after each DOM insertion, NOT on mousemove
04030             },0);
04031 
04032       },
04033 
04034       _clear: function(event, noPropagation) {
04035 
04036             this.reverting = false;
04037             // We delay all events that have to be triggered to after the point where the placeholder has been removed and
04038             // everything else normalized again
04039             var delayedTriggers = [], self = this;
04040 
04041             // We first have to update the dom position of the actual currentItem
04042             // Note: don't do it if the current item is already removed (by a user), or it gets reappended (see #4088)
04043             if(!this._noFinalSort && this.currentItem[0].parentNode) this.placeholder.before(this.currentItem);
04044             this._noFinalSort = null;
04045 
04046             if(this.helper[0] == this.currentItem[0]) {
04047                   for(var i in this._storedCSS) {
04048                         if(this._storedCSS[i] == 'auto' || this._storedCSS[i] == 'static') this._storedCSS[i] = '';
04049                   }
04050                   this.currentItem.css(this._storedCSS).removeClass("ui-sortable-helper");
04051             } else {
04052                   this.currentItem.show();
04053             }
04054 
04055             if(this.fromOutside && !noPropagation) delayedTriggers.push(function(event) { this._trigger("receive", event, this._uiHash(this.fromOutside)); });
04056             if((this.fromOutside || this.domPosition.prev != this.currentItem.prev().not(".ui-sortable-helper")[0] || this.domPosition.parent != this.currentItem.parent()[0]) && !noPropagation) delayedTriggers.push(function(event) { this._trigger("update", event, this._uiHash()); }); //Trigger update callback if the DOM position has changed
04057             if(!$.ui.contains(this.element[0], this.currentItem[0])) { //Node was moved out of the current element
04058                   if(!noPropagation) delayedTriggers.push(function(event) { this._trigger("remove", event, this._uiHash()); });
04059                   for (var i = this.containers.length - 1; i >= 0; i--){
04060                         if($.ui.contains(this.containers[i].element[0], this.currentItem[0]) && !noPropagation) {
04061                               delayedTriggers.push((function(c) { return function(event) { c._trigger("receive", event, this._uiHash(this)); };  }).call(this, this.containers[i]));
04062                               delayedTriggers.push((function(c) { return function(event) { c._trigger("update", event, this._uiHash(this));  }; }).call(this, this.containers[i]));
04063                         }
04064                   };
04065             };
04066 
04067             //Post events to containers
04068             for (var i = this.containers.length - 1; i >= 0; i--){
04069                   if(!noPropagation) delayedTriggers.push((function(c) { return function(event) { c._trigger("deactivate", event, this._uiHash(this)); };  }).call(this, this.containers[i]));
04070                   if(this.containers[i].containerCache.over) {
04071                         delayedTriggers.push((function(c) { return function(event) { c._trigger("out", event, this._uiHash(this)); };  }).call(this, this.containers[i]));
04072                         this.containers[i].containerCache.over = 0;
04073                   }
04074             }
04075 
04076             //Do what was originally in plugins
04077             if(this._storedCursor) $('body').css("cursor", this._storedCursor); //Reset cursor
04078             if(this._storedOpacity) this.helper.css("opacity", this._storedOpacity); //Reset opacity
04079             if(this._storedZIndex) this.helper.css("zIndex", this._storedZIndex == 'auto' ? '' : this._storedZIndex); //Reset z-index
04080 
04081             this.dragging = false;
04082             if(this.cancelHelperRemoval) {
04083                   if(!noPropagation) {
04084                         this._trigger("beforeStop", event, this._uiHash());
04085                         for (var i=0; i < delayedTriggers.length; i++) { delayedTriggers[i].call(this, event); }; //Trigger all delayed events
04086                         this._trigger("stop", event, this._uiHash());
04087                   }
04088                   return false;
04089             }
04090 
04091             if(!noPropagation) this._trigger("beforeStop", event, this._uiHash());
04092 
04093             //$(this.placeholder[0]).remove(); would have been the jQuery way - unfortunately, it unbinds ALL events from the original node!
04094             this.placeholder[0].parentNode.removeChild(this.placeholder[0]);
04095 
04096             if(this.helper[0] != this.currentItem[0]) this.helper.remove(); this.helper = null;
04097 
04098             if(!noPropagation) {
04099                   for (var i=0; i < delayedTriggers.length; i++) { delayedTriggers[i].call(this, event); }; //Trigger all delayed events
04100                   this._trigger("stop", event, this._uiHash());
04101             }
04102 
04103             this.fromOutside = false;
04104             return true;
04105 
04106       },
04107 
04108       _trigger: function() {
04109             if ($.Widget.prototype._trigger.apply(this, arguments) === false) {
04110                   this.cancel();
04111             }
04112       },
04113 
04114       _uiHash: function(inst) {
04115             var self = inst || this;
04116             return {
04117                   helper: self.helper,
04118                   placeholder: self.placeholder || $([]),
04119                   position: self.position,
04120                   originalPosition: self.originalPosition,
04121                   offset: self.positionAbs,
04122                   item: self.currentItem,
04123                   sender: inst ? inst.element : null
04124             };
04125       }
04126 
04127 });
04128 
04129 $.extend($.ui.sortable, {
04130       version: "1.8.4"
04131 });
04132 
04133 })(jQuery);
04134 /*
04135  * jQuery UI Accordion 1.8.4
04136  *
04137  * Copyright 2010, AUTHORS.txt (http://jqueryui.com/about)
04138  * Dual licensed under the MIT or GPL Version 2 licenses.
04139  * http://jquery.org/license
04140  *
04141  * http://docs.jquery.com/UI/Accordion
04142  *
04143  * Depends:
04144  *    jquery.ui.core.js
04145  *    jquery.ui.widget.js
04146  */
04147 (function( $, undefined ) {
04148 
04149 $.widget( "ui.accordion", {
04150       options: {
04151             active: 0,
04152             animated: "slide",
04153             autoHeight: true,
04154             clearStyle: false,
04155             collapsible: false,
04156             event: "click",
04157             fillSpace: false,
04158             header: "> li > :first-child,> :not(li):even",
04159             icons: {
04160                   header: "ui-icon-triangle-1-e",
04161                   headerSelected: "ui-icon-triangle-1-s"
04162             },
04163             navigation: false,
04164             navigationFilter: function() {
04165                   return this.href.toLowerCase() === location.href.toLowerCase();
04166             }
04167       },
04168 
04169       _create: function() {
04170             var self = this,
04171                   options = self.options;
04172 
04173             self.running = 0;
04174 
04175             self.element
04176                   .addClass( "ui-accordion ui-widget ui-helper-reset" )
04177                   // in lack of child-selectors in CSS
04178                   // we need to mark top-LIs in a UL-accordion for some IE-fix
04179                   .children( "li" )
04180                         .addClass( "ui-accordion-li-fix" );
04181 
04182             self.headers = self.element.find( options.header )
04183                   .addClass( "ui-accordion-header ui-helper-reset ui-state-default ui-corner-all" )
04184                   .bind( "mouseenter.accordion", function() {
04185                         if ( options.disabled ) {
04186                               return;
04187                         }
04188                         $( this ).addClass( "ui-state-hover" );
04189                   })
04190                   .bind( "mouseleave.accordion", function() {
04191                         if ( options.disabled ) {
04192                               return;
04193                         }
04194                         $( this ).removeClass( "ui-state-hover" );
04195                   })
04196                   .bind( "focus.accordion", function() {
04197                         if ( options.disabled ) {
04198                               return;
04199                         }
04200                         $( this ).addClass( "ui-state-focus" );
04201                   })
04202                   .bind( "blur.accordion", function() {
04203                         if ( options.disabled ) {
04204                               return;
04205                         }
04206                         $( this ).removeClass( "ui-state-focus" );
04207                   });
04208 
04209             self.headers.next()
04210                   .addClass( "ui-accordion-content ui-helper-reset ui-widget-content ui-corner-bottom" );
04211 
04212             if ( options.navigation ) {
04213                   var current = self.element.find( "a" ).filter( options.navigationFilter ).eq( 0 );
04214                   if ( current.length ) {
04215                         var header = current.closest( ".ui-accordion-header" );
04216                         if ( header.length ) {
04217                               // anchor within header
04218                               self.active = header;
04219                         } else {
04220                               // anchor within content
04221                               self.active = current.closest( ".ui-accordion-content" ).prev();
04222                         }
04223                   }
04224             }
04225 
04226             self.active = self._findActive( self.active || options.active )
04227                   .addClass( "ui-state-default ui-state-active" )
04228                   .toggleClass( "ui-corner-all ui-corner-top" );
04229             self.active.next().addClass( "ui-accordion-content-active" );
04230 
04231             self._createIcons();
04232             self.resize();
04233             
04234             // ARIA
04235             self.element.attr( "role", "tablist" );
04236 
04237             self.headers
04238                   .attr( "role", "tab" )
04239                   .bind( "keydown.accordion", function( event ) {
04240                         return self._keydown( event );
04241                   })
04242                   .next()
04243                         .attr( "role", "tabpanel" );
04244 
04245             self.headers
04246                   .not( self.active || "" )
04247                   .attr({
04248                         "aria-expanded": "false",
04249                         tabIndex: -1
04250                   })
04251                   .next()
04252                         .hide();
04253 
04254             // make sure at least one header is in the tab order
04255             if ( !self.active.length ) {
04256                   self.headers.eq( 0 ).attr( "tabIndex", 0 );
04257             } else {
04258                   self.active
04259                         .attr({
04260                               "aria-expanded": "true",
04261                               tabIndex: 0
04262                         });
04263             }
04264 
04265             // only need links in tab order for Safari
04266             if ( !$.browser.safari ) {
04267                   self.headers.find( "a" ).attr( "tabIndex", -1 );
04268             }
04269 
04270             if ( options.event ) {
04271                   self.headers.bind( options.event.split(" ").join(".accordion ") + ".accordion", function(event) {
04272                         self._clickHandler.call( self, event, this );
04273                         event.preventDefault();
04274                   });
04275             }
04276       },
04277 
04278       _createIcons: function() {
04279             var options = this.options;
04280             if ( options.icons ) {
04281                   $( "<span></span>" )
04282                         .addClass( "ui-icon " + options.icons.header )
04283                         .prependTo( this.headers );
04284                   this.active.children( ".ui-icon" )
04285                         .toggleClass(options.icons.header)
04286                         .toggleClass(options.icons.headerSelected);
04287                   this.element.addClass( "ui-accordion-icons" );
04288             }
04289       },
04290 
04291       _destroyIcons: function() {
04292             this.headers.children( ".ui-icon" ).remove();
04293             this.element.removeClass( "ui-accordion-icons" );
04294       },
04295 
04296       destroy: function() {
04297             var options = this.options;
04298 
04299             this.element
04300                   .removeClass( "ui-accordion ui-widget ui-helper-reset" )
04301                   .removeAttr( "role" );
04302 
04303             this.headers
04304                   .unbind( ".accordion" )
04305                   .removeClass( "ui-accordion-header ui-accordion-disabled ui-helper-reset ui-state-default ui-corner-all ui-state-active ui-state-disabled ui-corner-top" )
04306                   .removeAttr( "role" )
04307                   .removeAttr( "aria-expanded" )
04308                   .removeAttr( "tabIndex" );
04309 
04310             this.headers.find( "a" ).removeAttr( "tabIndex" );
04311             this._destroyIcons();
04312             var contents = this.headers.next()
04313                   .css( "display", "" )
04314                   .removeAttr( "role" )
04315                   .removeClass( "ui-helper-reset ui-widget-content ui-corner-bottom ui-accordion-content ui-accordion-content-active ui-accordion-disabled ui-state-disabled" );
04316             if ( options.autoHeight || options.fillHeight ) {
04317                   contents.css( "height", "" );
04318             }
04319 
04320             return $.Widget.prototype.destroy.call( this );
04321       },
04322 
04323       _setOption: function( key, value ) {
04324             $.Widget.prototype._setOption.apply( this, arguments );
04325                   
04326             if ( key == "active" ) {
04327                   this.activate( value );
04328             }
04329             if ( key == "icons" ) {
04330                   this._destroyIcons();
04331                   if ( value ) {
04332                         this._createIcons();
04333                   }
04334             }
04335             // #5332 - opacity doesn't cascade to positioned elements in IE
04336             // so we need to add the disabled class to the headers and panels
04337             if ( key == "disabled" ) {
04338                   this.headers.add(this.headers.next())
04339                         [ value ? "addClass" : "removeClass" ](
04340                               "ui-accordion-disabled ui-state-disabled" );
04341             }
04342       },
04343 
04344       _keydown: function( event ) {
04345             if ( this.options.disabled || event.altKey || event.ctrlKey ) {
04346                   return;
04347             }
04348 
04349             var keyCode = $.ui.keyCode,
04350                   length = this.headers.length,
04351                   currentIndex = this.headers.index( event.target ),
04352                   toFocus = false;
04353 
04354             switch ( event.keyCode ) {
04355                   case keyCode.RIGHT:
04356                   case keyCode.DOWN:
04357                         toFocus = this.headers[ ( currentIndex + 1 ) % length ];
04358                         break;
04359                   case keyCode.LEFT:
04360                   case keyCode.UP:
04361                         toFocus = this.headers[ ( currentIndex - 1 + length ) % length ];
04362                         break;
04363                   case keyCode.SPACE:
04364                   case keyCode.ENTER:
04365                         this._clickHandler( { target: event.target }, event.target );
04366                         event.preventDefault();
04367             }
04368 
04369             if ( toFocus ) {
04370                   $( event.target ).attr( "tabIndex", -1 );
04371                   $( toFocus ).attr( "tabIndex", 0 );
04372                   toFocus.focus();
04373                   return false;
04374             }
04375 
04376             return true;
04377       },
04378 
04379       resize: function() {
04380             var options = this.options,
04381                   maxHeight;
04382 
04383             if ( options.fillSpace ) {
04384                   if ( $.browser.msie ) {
04385                         var defOverflow = this.element.parent().css( "overflow" );
04386                         this.element.parent().css( "overflow", "hidden");
04387                   }
04388                   maxHeight = this.element.parent().height();
04389                   if ($.browser.msie) {
04390                         this.element.parent().css( "overflow", defOverflow );
04391                   }
04392 
04393                   this.headers.each(function() {
04394                         maxHeight -= $( this ).outerHeight( true );
04395                   });
04396 
04397                   this.headers.next()
04398                         .each(function() {
04399                               $( this ).height( Math.max( 0, maxHeight -
04400                                     $( this ).innerHeight() + $( this ).height() ) );
04401                         })
04402                         .css( "overflow", "auto" );
04403             } else if ( options.autoHeight ) {
04404                   maxHeight = 0;
04405                   this.headers.next()
04406                         .each(function() {
04407                               maxHeight = Math.max( maxHeight, $( this ).height( "" ).height() );
04408                         })
04409                         .height( maxHeight );
04410             }
04411 
04412             return this;
04413       },
04414 
04415       activate: function( index ) {
04416             // TODO this gets called on init, changing the option without an explicit call for that
04417             this.options.active = index;
04418             // call clickHandler with custom event
04419             var active = this._findActive( index )[ 0 ];
04420             this._clickHandler( { target: active }, active );
04421 
04422             return this;
04423       },
04424 
04425       _findActive: function( selector ) {
04426             return selector
04427                   ? typeof selector === "number"
04428                         ? this.headers.filter( ":eq(" + selector + ")" )
04429                         : this.headers.not( this.headers.not( selector ) )
04430                   : selector === false
04431                         ? $( [] )
04432                         : this.headers.filter( ":eq(0)" );
04433       },
04434 
04435       // TODO isn't event.target enough? why the separate target argument?
04436       _clickHandler: function( event, target ) {
04437             var options = this.options;
04438             if ( options.disabled ) {
04439                   return;
04440             }
04441 
04442             // called only when using activate(false) to close all parts programmatically
04443             if ( !event.target ) {
04444                   if ( !options.collapsible ) {
04445                         return;
04446                   }
04447                   this.active
04448                         .removeClass( "ui-state-active ui-corner-top" )
04449                         .addClass( "ui-state-default ui-corner-all" )
04450                         .children( ".ui-icon" )
04451                               .removeClass( options.icons.headerSelected )
04452                               .addClass( options.icons.header );
04453                   this.active.next().addClass( "ui-accordion-content-active" );
04454                   var toHide = this.active.next(),
04455                         data = {
04456                               options: options,
04457                               newHeader: $( [] ),
04458                               oldHeader: options.active,
04459                               newContent: $( [] ),
04460                               oldContent: toHide
04461                         },
04462                         toShow = ( this.active = $( [] ) );
04463                   this._toggle( toShow, toHide, data );
04464                   return;
04465             }
04466 
04467             // get the click target
04468             var clicked = $( event.currentTarget || target ),
04469                   clickedIsActive = clicked[0] === this.active[0];
04470 
04471             // TODO the option is changed, is that correct?
04472             // TODO if it is correct, shouldn't that happen after determining that the click is valid?
04473             options.active = options.collapsible && clickedIsActive ?
04474                   false :
04475                   this.headers.index( clicked );
04476 
04477             // if animations are still active, or the active header is the target, ignore click
04478             if ( this.running || ( !options.collapsible && clickedIsActive ) ) {
04479                   return;
04480             }
04481 
04482             // switch classes
04483             this.active
04484                   .removeClass( "ui-state-active ui-corner-top" )
04485                   .addClass( "ui-state-default ui-corner-all" )
04486                   .children( ".ui-icon" )
04487                         .removeClass( options.icons.headerSelected )
04488                         .addClass( options.icons.header );
04489             if ( !clickedIsActive ) {
04490                   clicked
04491                         .removeClass( "ui-state-default ui-corner-all" )
04492                         .addClass( "ui-state-active ui-corner-top" )
04493                         .children( ".ui-icon" )
04494                               .removeClass( options.icons.header )
04495                               .addClass( options.icons.headerSelected );
04496                   clicked
04497                         .next()
04498                         .addClass( "ui-accordion-content-active" );
04499             }
04500 
04501             // find elements to show and hide
04502             var toShow = clicked.next(),
04503                   toHide = this.active.next(),
04504                   data = {
04505                         options: options,
04506                         newHeader: clickedIsActive && options.collapsible ? $([]) : clicked,
04507                         oldHeader: this.active,
04508                         newContent: clickedIsActive && options.collapsible ? $([]) : toShow,
04509                         oldContent: toHide
04510                   },
04511                   down = this.headers.index( this.active[0] ) > this.headers.index( clicked[0] );
04512 
04513             this.active = clickedIsActive ? $([]) : clicked;
04514             this._toggle( toShow, toHide, data, clickedIsActive, down );
04515 
04516             return;
04517       },
04518 
04519       _toggle: function( toShow, toHide, data, clickedIsActive, down ) {
04520             var self = this,
04521                   options = self.options;
04522 
04523             self.toShow = toShow;
04524             self.toHide = toHide;
04525             self.data = data;
04526 
04527             var complete = function() {
04528                   if ( !self ) {
04529                         return;
04530                   }
04531                   return self._completed.apply( self, arguments );
04532             };
04533 
04534             // trigger changestart event
04535             self._trigger( "changestart", null, self.data );
04536 
04537             // count elements to animate
04538             self.running = toHide.size() === 0 ? toShow.size() : toHide.size();
04539 
04540             if ( options.animated ) {
04541                   var animOptions = {};
04542 
04543                   if ( options.collapsible && clickedIsActive ) {
04544                         animOptions = {
04545                               toShow: $( [] ),
04546                               toHide: toHide,
04547                               complete: complete,
04548                               down: down,
04549                               autoHeight: options.autoHeight || options.fillSpace
04550                         };
04551                   } else {
04552                         animOptions = {
04553                               toShow: toShow,
04554                               toHide: toHide,
04555                               complete: complete,
04556                               down: down,
04557                               autoHeight: options.autoHeight || options.fillSpace
04558                         };
04559                   }
04560 
04561                   if ( !options.proxied ) {
04562                         options.proxied = options.animated;
04563                   }
04564 
04565                   if ( !options.proxiedDuration ) {
04566                         options.proxiedDuration = options.duration;
04567                   }
04568 
04569                   options.animated = $.isFunction( options.proxied ) ?
04570                         options.proxied( animOptions ) :
04571                         options.proxied;
04572 
04573                   options.duration = $.isFunction( options.proxiedDuration ) ?
04574                         options.proxiedDuration( animOptions ) :
04575                         options.proxiedDuration;
04576 
04577                   var animations = $.ui.accordion.animations,
04578                         duration = options.duration,
04579                         easing = options.animated;
04580 
04581                   if ( easing && !animations[ easing ] && !$.easing[ easing ] ) {
04582                         easing = "slide";
04583                   }
04584                   if ( !animations[ easing ] ) {
04585                         animations[ easing ] = function( options ) {
04586                               this.slide( options, {
04587                                     easing: easing,
04588                                     duration: duration || 700
04589                               });
04590                         };
04591                   }
04592 
04593                   animations[ easing ]( animOptions );
04594             } else {
04595                   if ( options.collapsible && clickedIsActive ) {
04596                         toShow.toggle();
04597                   } else {
04598                         toHide.hide();
04599                         toShow.show();
04600                   }
04601 
04602                   complete( true );
04603             }
04604 
04605             // TODO assert that the blur and focus triggers are really necessary, remove otherwise
04606             toHide.prev()
04607                   .attr({
04608                         "aria-expanded": "false",
04609                         tabIndex: -1
04610                   })
04611                   .blur();
04612             toShow.prev()
04613                   .attr({
04614                         "aria-expanded": "true",
04615                         tabIndex: 0
04616                   })
04617                   .focus();
04618       },
04619 
04620       _completed: function( cancel ) {
04621             this.running = cancel ? 0 : --this.running;
04622             if ( this.running ) {
04623                   return;
04624             }
04625 
04626             if ( this.options.clearStyle ) {
04627                   this.toShow.add( this.toHide ).css({
04628                         height: "",
04629                         overflow: ""
04630                   });
04631             }
04632 
04633             // other classes are removed before the animation; this one needs to stay until completed
04634             this.toHide.removeClass( "ui-accordion-content-active" );
04635 
04636             this._trigger( "change", null, this.data );
04637       }
04638 });
04639 
04640 $.extend( $.ui.accordion, {
04641       version: "1.8.4",
04642       animations: {
04643             slide: function( options, additions ) {
04644                   options = $.extend({
04645                         easing: "swing",
04646                         duration: 300
04647                   }, options, additions );
04648                   if ( !options.toHide.size() ) {
04649                         options.toShow.animate({
04650                               height: "show",
04651                               paddingTop: "show",
04652                               paddingBottom: "show"
04653                         }, options );
04654                         return;
04655                   }
04656                   if ( !options.toShow.size() ) {
04657                         options.toHide.animate({
04658                               height: "hide",
04659                               paddingTop: "hide",
04660                               paddingBottom: "hide"
04661                         }, options );
04662                         return;
04663                   }
04664                   var overflow = options.toShow.css( "overflow" ),
04665                         percentDone = 0,
04666                         showProps = {},
04667                         hideProps = {},
04668                         fxAttrs = [ "height", "paddingTop", "paddingBottom" ],
04669                         originalWidth;
04670                   // fix width before calculating height of hidden element
04671                   var s = options.toShow;
04672                   originalWidth = s[0].style.width;
04673                   s.width( parseInt( s.parent().width(), 10 )
04674                         - parseInt( s.css( "paddingLeft" ), 10 )
04675                         - parseInt( s.css( "paddingRight" ), 10 )
04676                         - ( parseInt( s.css( "borderLeftWidth" ), 10 ) || 0 )
04677                         - ( parseInt( s.css( "borderRightWidth" ), 10) || 0 ) );
04678 
04679                   $.each( fxAttrs, function( i, prop ) {
04680                         hideProps[ prop ] = "hide";
04681 
04682                         var parts = ( "" + $.css( options.toShow[0], prop ) ).match( /^([\d+-.]+)(.*)$/ );
04683                         showProps[ prop ] = {
04684                               value: parts[ 1 ],
04685                               unit: parts[ 2 ] || "px"
04686                         };
04687                   });
04688                   options.toShow.css({ height: 0, overflow: "hidden" }).show();
04689                   options.toHide
04690                         .filter( ":hidden" )
04691                               .each( options.complete )
04692                         .end()
04693                         .filter( ":visible" )
04694                         .animate( hideProps, {
04695                         step: function( now, settings ) {
04696                               // only calculate the percent when animating height
04697                               // IE gets very inconsistent results when animating elements
04698                               // with small values, which is common for padding
04699                               if ( settings.prop == "height" ) {
04700                                     percentDone = ( settings.end - settings.start === 0 ) ? 0 :
04701                                           ( settings.now - settings.start ) / ( settings.end - settings.start );
04702                               }
04703 
04704                               options.toShow[ 0 ].style[ settings.prop ] =
04705                                     ( percentDone * showProps[ settings.prop ].value )
04706                                     + showProps[ settings.prop ].unit;
04707                         },
04708                         duration: options.duration,
04709                         easing: options.easing,
04710                         complete: function() {
04711                               if ( !options.autoHeight ) {
04712                                     options.toShow.css( "height", "" );
04713                               }
04714                               options.toShow.css({
04715                                     width: originalWidth,
04716                                     overflow: overflow
04717                               });
04718                               options.complete();
04719                         }
04720                   });
04721             },
04722             bounceslide: function( options ) {
04723                   this.slide( options, {
04724                         easing: options.down ? "easeOutBounce" : "swing",
04725                         duration: options.down ? 1000 : 200
04726                   });
04727             }
04728       }
04729 });
04730 
04731 })( jQuery );
04732 /*
04733  * jQuery UI Autocomplete 1.8.4
04734  *
04735  * Copyright 2010, AUTHORS.txt (http://jqueryui.com/about)
04736  * Dual licensed under the MIT or GPL Version 2 licenses.
04737  * http://jquery.org/license
04738  *
04739  * http://docs.jquery.com/UI/Autocomplete
04740  *
04741  * Depends:
04742  *    jquery.ui.core.js
04743  *    jquery.ui.widget.js
04744  *    jquery.ui.position.js
04745  */
04746 (function( $, undefined ) {
04747 
04748 $.widget( "ui.autocomplete", {
04749       options: {
04750             appendTo: "body",
04751             delay: 300,
04752             minLength: 1,
04753             position: {
04754                   my: "left top",
04755                   at: "left bottom",
04756                   collision: "none"
04757             },
04758             source: null
04759       },
04760       _create: function() {
04761             var self = this,
04762                   doc = this.element[ 0 ].ownerDocument;
04763             this.element
04764                   .addClass( "ui-autocomplete-input" )
04765                   .attr( "autocomplete", "off" )
04766                   // TODO verify these actually work as intended
04767                   .attr({
04768                         role: "textbox",
04769                         "aria-autocomplete": "list",
04770                         "aria-haspopup": "true"
04771                   })
04772                   .bind( "keydown.autocomplete", function( event ) {
04773                         if ( self.options.disabled ) {
04774                               return;
04775                         }
04776 
04777                         var keyCode = $.ui.keyCode;
04778                         switch( event.keyCode ) {
04779                         case keyCode.PAGE_UP:
04780                               self._move( "previousPage", event );
04781                               break;
04782                         case keyCode.PAGE_DOWN:
04783                               self._move( "nextPage", event );
04784                               break;
04785                         case keyCode.UP:
04786                               self._move( "previous", event );
04787                               // prevent moving cursor to beginning of text field in some browsers
04788                               event.preventDefault();
04789                               break;
04790                         case keyCode.DOWN:
04791                               self._move( "next", event );
04792                               // prevent moving cursor to end of text field in some browsers
04793                               event.preventDefault();
04794                               break;
04795                         case keyCode.ENTER:
04796                         case keyCode.NUMPAD_ENTER:
04797                               // when menu is open or has focus
04798                               if ( self.menu.element.is( ":visible" ) ) {
04799                                     event.preventDefault();
04800                               }
04801                               //passthrough - ENTER and TAB both select the current element
04802                         case keyCode.TAB:
04803                               if ( !self.menu.active ) {
04804                                     return;
04805                               }
04806                               self.menu.select( event );
04807                               break;
04808                         case keyCode.ESCAPE:
04809                               self.element.val( self.term );
04810                               self.close( event );
04811                               break;
04812                         default:
04813                               // keypress is triggered before the input value is changed
04814                               clearTimeout( self.searching );
04815                               self.searching = setTimeout(function() {
04816                                     // only search if the value has changed
04817                                     if ( self.term != self.element.val() ) {
04818                                           self.selectedItem = null;
04819                                           self.search( null, event );
04820                                     }
04821                               }, self.options.delay );
04822                               break;
04823                         }
04824                   })
04825                   .bind( "focus.autocomplete", function() {
04826                         if ( self.options.disabled ) {
04827                               return;
04828                         }
04829 
04830                         self.selectedItem = null;
04831                         self.previous = self.element.val();
04832                   })
04833                   .bind( "blur.autocomplete", function( event ) {
04834                         if ( self.options.disabled ) {
04835                               return;
04836                         }
04837 
04838                         clearTimeout( self.searching );
04839                         // clicks on the menu (or a button to trigger a search) will cause a blur event
04840                         self.closing = setTimeout(function() {
04841                               self.close( event );
04842                               self._change( event );
04843                         }, 150 );
04844                   });
04845             this._initSource();
04846             this.response = function() {
04847                   return self._response.apply( self, arguments );
04848             };
04849             this.menu = $( "<ul></ul>" )
04850                   .addClass( "ui-autocomplete" )
04851                   .appendTo( $( this.options.appendTo || "body", doc )[0] )
04852                   // prevent the close-on-blur in case of a "slow" click on the menu (long mousedown)
04853                   .mousedown(function( event ) {
04854                         // clicking on the scrollbar causes focus to shift to the body
04855                         // but we can't detect a mouseup or a click immediately afterward
04856                         // so we have to track the next mousedown and close the menu if
04857                         // the user clicks somewhere outside of the autocomplete
04858                         var menuElement = self.menu.element[ 0 ];
04859                         if ( event.target === menuElement ) {
04860                               setTimeout(function() {
04861                                     $( document ).one( 'mousedown', function( event ) {
04862                                           if ( event.target !== self.element[ 0 ] &&
04863                                                 event.target !== menuElement &&
04864                                                 !$.ui.contains( menuElement, event.target ) ) {
04865                                                 self.close();
04866                                           }
04867                                     });
04868                               }, 1 );
04869                         }
04870 
04871                         // use another timeout to make sure the blur-event-handler on the input was already triggered
04872                         setTimeout(function() {
04873                               clearTimeout( self.closing );
04874                         }, 13);
04875                   })
04876                   .menu({
04877                         focus: function( event, ui ) {
04878                               var item = ui.item.data( "item.autocomplete" );
04879                               if ( false !== self._trigger( "focus", null, { item: item } ) ) {
04880                                     // use value to match what will end up in the input, if it was a key event
04881                                     if ( /^key/.test(event.originalEvent.type) ) {
04882                                           self.element.val( item.value );
04883                                     }
04884                               }
04885                         },
04886                         selected: function( event, ui ) {
04887                               var item = ui.item.data( "item.autocomplete" ),
04888                                     previous = self.previous;
04889 
04890                               // only trigger when focus was lost (click on menu)
04891                               if ( self.element[0] !== doc.activeElement ) {
04892                                     self.element.focus();
04893                                     self.previous = previous;
04894                               }
04895 
04896                               if ( false !== self._trigger( "select", event, { item: item } ) ) {
04897                                     self.element.val( item.value );
04898                               }
04899 
04900                               self.close( event );
04901                               self.selectedItem = item;
04902                         },
04903                         blur: function( event, ui ) {
04904                               // don't set the value of the text field if it's already correct
04905                               // this prevents moving the cursor unnecessarily
04906                               if ( self.menu.element.is(":visible") &&
04907                                     ( self.element.val() !== self.term ) ) {
04908                                     self.element.val( self.term );
04909                               }
04910                         }
04911                   })
