04912                   .zIndex( this.element.zIndex() + 1 )
04913                   // workaround for jQuery bug #5781 http://dev.jquery.com/ticket/5781
04914                   .css({ top: 0, left: 0 })
04915                   .hide()
04916                   .data( "menu" );
04917             if ( $.fn.bgiframe ) {
04918                    this.menu.element.bgiframe();
04919             }
04920       },
04921 
04922       destroy: function() {
04923             this.element
04924                   .removeClass( "ui-autocomplete-input" )
04925                   .removeAttr( "autocomplete" )
04926                   .removeAttr( "role" )
04927                   .removeAttr( "aria-autocomplete" )
04928                   .removeAttr( "aria-haspopup" );
04929             this.menu.element.remove();
04930             $.Widget.prototype.destroy.call( this );
04931       },
04932 
04933       _setOption: function( key, value ) {
04934             $.Widget.prototype._setOption.apply( this, arguments );
04935             if ( key === "source" ) {
04936                   this._initSource();
04937             }
04938             if ( key === "appendTo" ) {
04939                   this.menu.element.appendTo( $( value || "body", this.element[0].ownerDocument )[0] )
04940             }
04941       },
04942 
04943       _initSource: function() {
04944             var array,
04945                   url;
04946             if ( $.isArray(this.options.source) ) {
04947                   array = this.options.source;
04948                   this.source = function( request, response ) {
04949                         response( $.ui.autocomplete.filter(array, request.term) );
04950                   };
04951             } else if ( typeof this.options.source === "string" ) {
04952                   url = this.options.source;
04953                   this.source = function( request, response ) {
04954                         $.getJSON( url, request, response );
04955                   };
04956             } else {
04957                   this.source = this.options.source;
04958             }
04959       },
04960 
04961       search: function( value, event ) {
04962             value = value != null ? value : this.element.val();
04963             if ( value.length < this.options.minLength ) {
04964                   return this.close( event );
04965             }
04966 
04967             clearTimeout( this.closing );
04968             if ( this._trigger("search") === false ) {
04969                   return;
04970             }
04971 
04972             return this._search( value );
04973       },
04974 
04975       _search: function( value ) {
04976             this.term = this.element
04977                   .addClass( "ui-autocomplete-loading" )
04978                   // always save the actual value, not the one passed as an argument
04979                   .val();
04980 
04981             this.source( { term: value }, this.response );
04982       },
04983 
04984       _response: function( content ) {
04985             if ( content.length ) {
04986                   content = this._normalize( content );
04987                   this._suggest( content );
04988                   this._trigger( "open" );
04989             } else {
04990                   this.close();
04991             }
04992             this.element.removeClass( "ui-autocomplete-loading" );
04993       },
04994 
04995       close: function( event ) {
04996             clearTimeout( this.closing );
04997             if ( this.menu.element.is(":visible") ) {
04998                   this._trigger( "close", event );
04999                   this.menu.element.hide();
05000                   this.menu.deactivate();
05001             }
05002       },
05003       
05004       _change: function( event ) {
05005             if ( this.previous !== this.element.val() ) {
05006                   this._trigger( "change", event, { item: this.selectedItem } );
05007             }
05008       },
05009 
05010       _normalize: function( items ) {
05011             // assume all items have the right format when the first item is complete
05012             if ( items.length && items[0].label && items[0].value ) {
05013                   return items;
05014             }
05015             return $.map( items, function(item) {
05016                   if ( typeof item === "string" ) {
05017                         return {
05018                               label: item,
05019                               value: item
05020                         };
05021                   }
05022                   return $.extend({
05023                         label: item.label || item.value,
05024                         value: item.value || item.label
05025                   }, item );
05026             });
05027       },
05028 
05029       _suggest: function( items ) {
05030             var ul = this.menu.element
05031                         .empty()
05032                         .zIndex( this.element.zIndex() + 1 ),
05033                   menuWidth,
05034                   textWidth;
05035             this._renderMenu( ul, items );
05036             // TODO refresh should check if the active item is still in the dom, removing the need for a manual deactivate
05037             this.menu.deactivate();
05038             this.menu.refresh();
05039             this.menu.element.show().position( $.extend({
05040                   of: this.element
05041             }, this.options.position ));
05042 
05043             menuWidth = ul.width( "" ).outerWidth();
05044             textWidth = this.element.outerWidth();
05045             ul.outerWidth( Math.max( menuWidth, textWidth ) );
05046       },
05047 
05048       _renderMenu: function( ul, items ) {
05049             var self = this;
05050             $.each( items, function( index, item ) {
05051                   self._renderItem( ul, item );
05052             });
05053       },
05054 
05055       _renderItem: function( ul, item) {
05056             return $( "<li></li>" )
05057                   .data( "item.autocomplete", item )
05058                   .append( $( "<a></a>" ).text( item.label ) )
05059                   .appendTo( ul );
05060       },
05061 
05062       _move: function( direction, event ) {
05063             if ( !this.menu.element.is(":visible") ) {
05064                   this.search( null, event );
05065                   return;
05066             }
05067             if ( this.menu.first() && /^previous/.test(direction) ||
05068                         this.menu.last() && /^next/.test(direction) ) {
05069                   this.element.val( this.term );
05070                   this.menu.deactivate();
05071                   return;
05072             }
05073             this.menu[ direction ]( event );
05074       },
05075 
05076       widget: function() {
05077             return this.menu.element;
05078       }
05079 });
05080 
05081 $.extend( $.ui.autocomplete, {
05082       escapeRegex: function( value ) {
05083             return value.replace(/[-[\]{}()*+?.,\\^$|#\s]/g, "\\$&");
05084       },
05085       filter: function(array, term) {
05086             var matcher = new RegExp( $.ui.autocomplete.escapeRegex(term), "i" );
05087             return $.grep( array, function(value) {
05088                   return matcher.test( value.label || value.value || value );
05089             });
05090       }
05091 });
05092 
05093 }( jQuery ));
05094 
05095 /*
05096  * jQuery UI Menu (not officially released)
05097  * 
05098  * This widget isn't yet finished and the API is subject to change. We plan to finish
05099  * it for the next release. You're welcome to give it a try anyway and give us feedback,
05100  * as long as you're okay with migrating your code later on. We can help with that, too.
05101  *
05102  * Copyright 2010, AUTHORS.txt (http://jqueryui.com/about)
05103  * Dual licensed under the MIT or GPL Version 2 licenses.
05104  * http://jquery.org/license
05105  *
05106  * http://docs.jquery.com/UI/Menu
05107  *
05108  * Depends:
05109  *    jquery.ui.core.js
05110  *  jquery.ui.widget.js
05111  */
05112 (function($) {
05113 
05114 $.widget("ui.menu", {
05115       _create: function() {
05116             var self = this;
05117             this.element
05118                   .addClass("ui-menu ui-widget ui-widget-content ui-corner-all")
05119                   .attr({
05120                         role: "listbox",
05121                         "aria-activedescendant": "ui-active-menuitem"
05122                   })
05123                   .click(function( event ) {
05124                         if ( !$( event.target ).closest( ".ui-menu-item a" ).length ) {
05125                               return;
05126                         }
05127                         // temporary
05128                         event.preventDefault();
05129                         self.select( event );
05130                   });
05131             this.refresh();
05132       },
05133       
05134       refresh: function() {
05135             var self = this;
05136 
05137             // don't refresh list items that are already adapted
05138             var items = this.element.children("li:not(.ui-menu-item):has(a)")
05139                   .addClass("ui-menu-item")
05140                   .attr("role", "menuitem");
05141             
05142             items.children("a")
05143                   .addClass("ui-corner-all")
05144                   .attr("tabindex", -1)
05145                   // mouseenter doesn't work with event delegation
05146                   .mouseenter(function( event ) {
05147                         self.activate( event, $(this).parent() );
05148                   })
05149                   .mouseleave(function() {
05150                         self.deactivate();
05151                   });
05152       },
05153 
05154       activate: function( event, item ) {
05155             this.deactivate();
05156             if (this.hasScroll()) {
05157                   var offset = item.offset().top - this.element.offset().top,
05158                         scroll = this.element.attr("scrollTop"),
05159                         elementHeight = this.element.height();
05160                   if (offset < 0) {
05161                         this.element.attr("scrollTop", scroll + offset);
05162                   } else if (offset > elementHeight) {
05163                         this.element.attr("scrollTop", scroll + offset - elementHeight + item.height());
05164                   }
05165             }
05166             this.active = item.eq(0)
05167                   .children("a")
05168                         .addClass("ui-state-hover")
05169                         .attr("id", "ui-active-menuitem")
05170                   .end();
05171             this._trigger("focus", event, { item: item });
05172       },
05173 
05174       deactivate: function() {
05175             if (!this.active) { return; }
05176 
05177             this.active.children("a")
05178                   .removeClass("ui-state-hover")
05179                   .removeAttr("id");
05180             this._trigger("blur");
05181             this.active = null;
05182       },
05183 
05184       next: function(event) {
05185             this.move("next", ".ui-menu-item:first", event);
05186       },
05187 
05188       previous: function(event) {
05189             this.move("prev", ".ui-menu-item:last", event);
05190       },
05191 
05192       first: function() {
05193             return this.active && !this.active.prevAll(".ui-menu-item").length;
05194       },
05195 
05196       last: function() {
05197             return this.active && !this.active.nextAll(".ui-menu-item").length;
05198       },
05199 
05200       move: function(direction, edge, event) {
05201             if (!this.active) {
05202                   this.activate(event, this.element.children(edge));
05203                   return;
05204             }
05205             var next = this.active[direction + "All"](".ui-menu-item").eq(0);
05206             if (next.length) {
05207                   this.activate(event, next);
05208             } else {
05209                   this.activate(event, this.element.children(edge));
05210             }
05211       },
05212 
05213       // TODO merge with previousPage
05214       nextPage: function(event) {
05215             if (this.hasScroll()) {
05216                   // TODO merge with no-scroll-else
05217                   if (!this.active || this.last()) {
05218                         this.activate(event, this.element.children(":first"));
05219                         return;
05220                   }
05221                   var base = this.active.offset().top,
05222                         height = this.element.height(),
05223                         result = this.element.children("li").filter(function() {
05224                               var close = $(this).offset().top - base - height + $(this).height();
05225                               // TODO improve approximation
05226                               return close < 10 && close > -10;
05227                         });
05228 
05229                   // TODO try to catch this earlier when scrollTop indicates the last page anyway
05230                   if (!result.length) {
05231                         result = this.element.children(":last");
05232                   }
05233                   this.activate(event, result);
05234             } else {
05235                   this.activate(event, this.element.children(!this.active || this.last() ? ":first" : ":last"));
05236             }
05237       },
05238 
05239       // TODO merge with nextPage
05240       previousPage: function(event) {
05241             if (this.hasScroll()) {
05242                   // TODO merge with no-scroll-else
05243                   if (!this.active || this.first()) {
05244                         this.activate(event, this.element.children(":last"));
05245                         return;
05246                   }
05247 
05248                   var base = this.active.offset().top,
05249                         height = this.element.height();
05250                         result = this.element.children("li").filter(function() {
05251                               var close = $(this).offset().top - base + height - $(this).height();
05252                               // TODO improve approximation
05253                               return close < 10 && close > -10;
05254                         });
05255 
05256                   // TODO try to catch this earlier when scrollTop indicates the last page anyway
05257                   if (!result.length) {
05258                         result = this.element.children(":first");
05259                   }
05260                   this.activate(event, result);
05261             } else {
05262                   this.activate(event, this.element.children(!this.active || this.first() ? ":last" : ":first"));
05263             }
05264       },
05265 
05266       hasScroll: function() {
05267             return this.element.height() < this.element.attr("scrollHeight");
05268       },
05269 
05270       select: function( event ) {
05271             this._trigger("selected", event, { item: this.active });
05272       }
05273 });
05274 
05275 }(jQuery));
05276 /*
05277  * jQuery UI Button 1.8.4
05278  *
05279  * Copyright 2010, AUTHORS.txt (http://jqueryui.com/about)
05280  * Dual licensed under the MIT or GPL Version 2 licenses.
05281  * http://jquery.org/license
05282  *
05283  * http://docs.jquery.com/UI/Button
05284  *
05285  * Depends:
05286  *    jquery.ui.core.js
05287  *    jquery.ui.widget.js
05288  */
05289 (function( $, undefined ) {
05290 
05291 var lastActive,
05292       baseClasses = "ui-button ui-widget ui-state-default ui-corner-all",
05293       stateClasses = "ui-state-hover ui-state-active ",
05294       typeClasses = "ui-button-icons-only ui-button-icon-only ui-button-text-icons ui-button-text-icon-primary ui-button-text-icon-secondary ui-button-text-only",
05295       formResetHandler = function( event ) {
05296             $( ":ui-button", event.target.form ).each(function() {
05297                   var inst = $( this ).data( "button" );
05298                   setTimeout(function() {
05299                         inst.refresh();
05300                   }, 1 );
05301             });
05302       },
05303       radioGroup = function( radio ) {
05304             var name = radio.name,
05305                   form = radio.form,
05306                   radios = $( [] );
05307             if ( name ) {
05308                   if ( form ) {
05309                         radios = $( form ).find( "[name='" + name + "']" );
05310                   } else {
05311                         radios = $( "[name='" + name + "']", radio.ownerDocument )
05312                               .filter(function() {
05313                                     return !this.form;
05314                               });
05315                   }
05316             }
05317             return radios;
05318       };
05319 
05320 $.widget( "ui.button", {
05321       options: {
05322             text: true,
05323             label: null,
05324             icons: {
05325                   primary: null,
05326                   secondary: null
05327             }
05328       },
05329       _create: function() {
05330             this.element.closest( "form" )
05331                   .unbind( "reset.button" )
05332                   .bind( "reset.button", formResetHandler );
05333 
05334             this._determineButtonType();
05335             this.hasTitle = !!this.buttonElement.attr( "title" );
05336 
05337             var self = this,
05338                   options = this.options,
05339                   toggleButton = this.type === "checkbox" || this.type === "radio",
05340                   hoverClass = "ui-state-hover" + ( !toggleButton ? " ui-state-active" : "" ),
05341                   focusClass = "ui-state-focus";
05342 
05343             if ( options.label === null ) {
05344                   options.label = this.buttonElement.html();
05345             }
05346 
05347             if ( this.element.is( ":disabled" ) ) {
05348                   options.disabled = true;
05349             }
05350 
05351             this.buttonElement
05352                   .addClass( baseClasses )
05353                   .attr( "role", "button" )
05354                   .bind( "mouseenter.button", function() {
05355                         if ( options.disabled ) {
05356                               return;
05357                         }
05358                         $( this ).addClass( "ui-state-hover" );
05359                         if ( this === lastActive ) {
05360                               $( this ).addClass( "ui-state-active" );
05361                         }
05362                   })
05363                   .bind( "mouseleave.button", function() {
05364                         if ( options.disabled ) {
05365                               return;
05366                         }
05367                         $( this ).removeClass( hoverClass );
05368                   })
05369                   .bind( "focus.button", function() {
05370                         // no need to check disabled, focus won't be triggered anyway
05371                         $( this ).addClass( focusClass );
05372                   })
05373                   .bind( "blur.button", function() {
05374                         $( this ).removeClass( focusClass );
05375                   });
05376 
05377             if ( toggleButton ) {
05378                   this.element.bind( "change.button", function() {
05379                         self.refresh();
05380                   });
05381             }
05382 
05383             if ( this.type === "checkbox" ) {
05384                   this.buttonElement.bind( "click.button", function() {
05385                         if ( options.disabled ) {
05386                               return false;
05387                         }
05388                         $( this ).toggleClass( "ui-state-active" );
05389                         self.buttonElement.attr( "aria-pressed", self.element[0].checked );
05390                   });
05391             } else if ( this.type === "radio" ) {
05392                   this.buttonElement.bind( "click.button", function() {
05393                         if ( options.disabled ) {
05394                               return false;
05395                         }
05396                         $( this ).addClass( "ui-state-active" );
05397                         self.buttonElement.attr( "aria-pressed", true );
05398 
05399                         var radio = self.element[ 0 ];
05400                         radioGroup( radio )
05401                               .not( radio )
05402                               .map(function() {
05403                                     return $( this ).button( "widget" )[ 0 ];
05404                               })
05405                               .removeClass( "ui-state-active" )
05406                               .attr( "aria-pressed", false );
05407                   });
05408             } else {
05409                   this.buttonElement
05410                         .bind( "mousedown.button", function() {
05411                               if ( options.disabled ) {
05412                                     return false;
05413                               }
05414                               $( this ).addClass( "ui-state-active" );
05415                               lastActive = this;
05416                               $( document ).one( "mouseup", function() {
05417                                     lastActive = null;
05418                               });
05419                         })
05420                         .bind( "mouseup.button", function() {
05421                               if ( options.disabled ) {
05422                                     return false;
05423                               }
05424                               $( this ).removeClass( "ui-state-active" );
05425                         })
05426                         .bind( "keydown.button", function(event) {
05427                               if ( options.disabled ) {
05428                                     return false;
05429                               }
05430                               if ( event.keyCode == $.ui.keyCode.SPACE || event.keyCode == $.ui.keyCode.ENTER ) {
05431                                     $( this ).addClass( "ui-state-active" );
05432                               }
05433                         })
05434                         .bind( "keyup.button", function() {
05435                               $( this ).removeClass( "ui-state-active" );
05436                         });
05437 
05438                   if ( this.buttonElement.is("a") ) {
05439                         this.buttonElement.keyup(function(event) {
05440                               if ( event.keyCode === $.ui.keyCode.SPACE ) {
05441                                     // TODO pass through original event correctly (just as 2nd argument doesn't work)
05442                                     $( this ).click();
05443                               }
05444                         });
05445                   }
05446             }
05447 
05448             // TODO: pull out $.Widget's handling for the disabled option into
05449             // $.Widget.prototype._setOptionDisabled so it's easy to proxy and can
05450             // be overridden by individual plugins
05451             this._setOption( "disabled", options.disabled );
05452       },
05453 
05454       _determineButtonType: function() {
05455             
05456             if ( this.element.is(":checkbox") ) {
05457                   this.type = "checkbox";
05458             } else {
05459                   if ( this.element.is(":radio") ) {
05460                         this.type = "radio";
05461                   } else {
05462                         if ( this.element.is("input") ) {
05463                               this.type = "input";
05464                         } else {
05465                               this.type = "button";
05466                         }
05467                   }
05468             }
05469             
05470             if ( this.type === "checkbox" || this.type === "radio" ) {
05471                   // we don't search against the document in case the element
05472                   // is disconnected from the DOM
05473                   this.buttonElement = this.element.parents().last()
05474                         .find( "label[for=" + this.element.attr("id") + "]" );
05475                   this.element.addClass( "ui-helper-hidden-accessible" );
05476 
05477                   var checked = this.element.is( ":checked" );
05478                   if ( checked ) {
05479                         this.buttonElement.addClass( "ui-state-active" );
05480                   }
05481                   this.buttonElement.attr( "aria-pressed", checked );
05482             } else {
05483                   this.buttonElement = this.element;
05484             }
05485       },
05486 
05487       widget: function() {
05488             return this.buttonElement;
05489       },
05490 
05491       destroy: function() {
05492             this.element
05493                   .removeClass( "ui-helper-hidden-accessible" );
05494             this.buttonElement
05495                   .removeClass( baseClasses + " " + stateClasses + " " + typeClasses )
05496                   .removeAttr( "role" )
05497                   .removeAttr( "aria-pressed" )
05498                   .html( this.buttonElement.find(".ui-button-text").html() );
05499 
05500             if ( !this.hasTitle ) {
05501                   this.buttonElement.removeAttr( "title" );
05502             }
05503 
05504             $.Widget.prototype.destroy.call( this );
05505       },
05506 
05507       _setOption: function( key, value ) {
05508             $.Widget.prototype._setOption.apply( this, arguments );
05509             if ( key === "disabled" ) {
05510                   if ( value ) {
05511                         this.element.attr( "disabled", true );
05512                   } else {
05513                         this.element.removeAttr( "disabled" );
05514                   }
05515             }
05516             this._resetButton();
05517       },
05518 
05519       refresh: function() {
05520             var isDisabled = this.element.is( ":disabled" );
05521             if ( isDisabled !== this.options.disabled ) {
05522                   this._setOption( "disabled", isDisabled );
05523             }
05524             if ( this.type === "radio" ) {
05525                   radioGroup( this.element[0] ).each(function() {
05526                         if ( $( this ).is( ":checked" ) ) {
05527                               $( this ).button( "widget" )
05528                                     .addClass( "ui-state-active" )
05529                                     .attr( "aria-pressed", true );
05530                         } else {
05531                               $( this ).button( "widget" )
05532                                     .removeClass( "ui-state-active" )
05533                                     .attr( "aria-pressed", false );
05534                         }
05535                   });
05536             } else if ( this.type === "checkbox" ) {
05537                   if ( this.element.is( ":checked" ) ) {
05538                         this.buttonElement
05539                               .addClass( "ui-state-active" )
05540                               .attr( "aria-pressed", true );
05541                   } else {
05542                         this.buttonElement
05543                               .removeClass( "ui-state-active" )
05544                               .attr( "aria-pressed", false );
05545                   }
05546             }
05547       },
05548 
05549       _resetButton: function() {
05550             if ( this.type === "input" ) {
05551                   if ( this.options.label ) {
05552                         this.element.val( this.options.label );
05553                   }
05554                   return;
05555             }
05556             var buttonElement = this.buttonElement.removeClass( typeClasses ),
05557                   buttonText = $( "<span></span>" )
05558                         .addClass( "ui-button-text" )
05559                         .html( this.options.label )
05560                         .appendTo( buttonElement.empty() )
05561                         .text(),
05562                   icons = this.options.icons,
05563                   multipleIcons = icons.primary && icons.secondary;
05564             if ( icons.primary || icons.secondary ) {
05565                   buttonElement.addClass( "ui-button-text-icon" +
05566                         ( multipleIcons ? "s" : ( icons.primary ? "-primary" : "-secondary" ) ) );
05567                   if ( icons.primary ) {
05568                         buttonElement.prepend( "<span class='ui-button-icon-primary ui-icon " + icons.primary + "'></span>" );
05569                   }
05570                   if ( icons.secondary ) {
05571                         buttonElement.append( "<span class='ui-button-icon-secondary ui-icon " + icons.secondary + "'></span>" );
05572                   }
05573                   if ( !this.options.text ) {
05574                         buttonElement
05575                               .addClass( multipleIcons ? "ui-button-icons-only" : "ui-button-icon-only" )
05576                               .removeClass( "ui-button-text-icons ui-button-text-icon-primary ui-button-text-icon-secondary" );
05577                         if ( !this.hasTitle ) {
05578                               buttonElement.attr( "title", buttonText );
05579                         }
05580                   }
05581             } else {
05582                   buttonElement.addClass( "ui-button-text-only" );
05583             }
05584       }
05585 });
05586 
05587 $.widget( "ui.buttonset", {
05588       _create: function() {
05589             this.element.addClass( "ui-buttonset" );
05590             this._init();
05591       },
05592       
05593       _init: function() {
05594             this.refresh();
05595       },
05596 
05597       _setOption: function( key, value ) {
05598             if ( key === "disabled" ) {
05599                   this.buttons.button( "option", key, value );
05600             }
05601 
05602             $.Widget.prototype._setOption.apply( this, arguments );
05603       },
05604       
05605       refresh: function() {
05606             this.buttons = this.element.find( ":button, :submit, :reset, :checkbox, :radio, a, :data(button)" )
05607                   .filter( ":ui-button" )
05608                         .button( "refresh" )
05609                   .end()
05610                   .not( ":ui-button" )
05611                         .button()
05612                   .end()
05613                   .map(function() {
05614                         return $( this ).button( "widget" )[ 0 ];
05615                   })
05616                         .removeClass( "ui-corner-all ui-corner-left ui-corner-right" )
05617                         .filter( ":first" )
05618                               .addClass( "ui-corner-left" )
05619                         .end()
05620                         .filter( ":last" )
05621                               .addClass( "ui-corner-right" )
05622                         .end()
05623                   .end();
05624       },
05625 
05626       destroy: function() {
05627             this.element.removeClass( "ui-buttonset" );
05628             this.buttons
05629                   .map(function() {
05630                         return $( this ).button( "widget" )[ 0 ];
05631                   })
05632                         .removeClass( "ui-corner-left ui-corner-right" )
05633                   .end()
05634                   .button( "destroy" );
05635 
05636             $.Widget.prototype.destroy.call( this );
05637       }
05638 });
05639 
05640 }( jQuery ) );
05641 /*
05642  * jQuery UI Dialog 1.8.4
05643  *
05644  * Copyright 2010, AUTHORS.txt (http://jqueryui.com/about)
05645  * Dual licensed under the MIT or GPL Version 2 licenses.
05646  * http://jquery.org/license
05647  *
05648  * http://docs.jquery.com/UI/Dialog
05649  *
05650  * Depends:
05651  *    jquery.ui.core.js
05652  *    jquery.ui.widget.js
05653  *  jquery.ui.button.js
05654  *    jquery.ui.draggable.js
05655  *    jquery.ui.mouse.js
05656  *    jquery.ui.position.js
05657  *    jquery.ui.resizable.js
05658  */
05659 (function( $, undefined ) {
05660 
05661 var uiDialogClasses =
05662       'ui-dialog ' +
05663       'ui-widget ' +
05664       'ui-widget-content ' +
05665       'ui-corner-all ';
05666 
05667 $.widget("ui.dialog", {
05668       options: {
05669             autoOpen: true,
05670             buttons: {},
05671             closeOnEscape: true,
05672             closeText: 'close',
05673             dialogClass: '',
05674             draggable: true,
05675             hide: null,
05676             height: 'auto',
05677             maxHeight: false,
05678             maxWidth: false,
05679             minHeight: 150,
05680             minWidth: 150,
05681             modal: false,
05682             position: {
05683                   my: 'center',
05684                   at: 'center',
05685                   of: window,
05686                   collision: 'fit',
05687                   // ensure that the titlebar is never outside the document
05688                   using: function(pos) {
05689                         var topOffset = $(this).css(pos).offset().top;
05690                         if (topOffset < 0) {
05691                               $(this).css('top', pos.top - topOffset);
05692                         }
05693                   }
05694             },
05695             resizable: true,
05696             show: null,
05697             stack: true,
05698             title: '',
05699             width: 300,
05700             zIndex: 1000
05701       },
05702 
05703       _create: function() {
05704             this.originalTitle = this.element.attr('title');
05705             // #5742 - .attr() might return a DOMElement
05706             if ( typeof this.originalTitle !== "string" ) {
05707                   this.originalTitle = "";
05708             }
05709 
05710             var self = this,
05711                   options = self.options,
05712 
05713                   title = options.title || self.originalTitle || '&#160;',
05714                   titleId = $.ui.dialog.getTitleId(self.element),
05715 
05716                   uiDialog = (self.uiDialog = $('<div></div>'))
05717                         .appendTo(document.body)
05718                         .hide()
05719                         .addClass(uiDialogClasses + options.dialogClass)
05720                         .css({
05721                               zIndex: options.zIndex
05722                         })
05723                         // setting tabIndex makes the div focusable
05724                         // setting outline to 0 prevents a border on focus in Mozilla
05725                         .attr('tabIndex', -1).css('outline', 0).keydown(function(event) {
05726                               if (options.closeOnEscape && event.keyCode &&
05727                                     event.keyCode === $.ui.keyCode.ESCAPE) {
05728                                     
05729                                     self.close(event);
05730                                     event.preventDefault();
05731                               }
05732                         })
05733                         .attr({
05734                               role: 'dialog',
05735                               'aria-labelledby': titleId
05736                         })
05737                         .mousedown(function(event) {
05738                               self.moveToTop(false, event);
05739                         }),
05740 
05741                   uiDialogContent = self.element
05742                         .show()
05743                         .removeAttr('title')
05744                         .addClass(
05745                               'ui-dialog-content ' +
05746                               'ui-widget-content')
05747                         .appendTo(uiDialog),
05748 
05749                   uiDialogTitlebar = (self.uiDialogTitlebar = $('<div></div>'))
05750                         .addClass(
05751                               'ui-dialog-titlebar ' +
05752                               'ui-widget-header ' +
05753                               'ui-corner-all ' +
05754                               'ui-helper-clearfix'
05755                         )
05756                         .prependTo(uiDialog),
05757 
05758                   uiDialogTitlebarClose = $('<a href="#"></a>')
05759                         .addClass(
05760                               'ui-dialog-titlebar-close ' +
05761                               'ui-corner-all'
05762                         )
05763                         .attr('role', 'button')
05764                         .hover(
05765                               function() {
05766                                     uiDialogTitlebarClose.addClass('ui-state-hover');
05767                               },
05768                               function() {
05769                                     uiDialogTitlebarClose.removeClass('ui-state-hover');
05770                               }
05771                         )
05772                         .focus(function() {
05773                               uiDialogTitlebarClose.addClass('ui-state-focus');
05774                         })
05775                         .blur(function() {
05776                               uiDialogTitlebarClose.removeClass('ui-state-focus');
05777                         })
05778                         .click(function(event) {
05779                               self.close(event);
05780                               return false;
05781                         })
05782                         .appendTo(uiDialogTitlebar),
05783 
05784                   uiDialogTitlebarCloseText = (self.uiDialogTitlebarCloseText = $('<span></span>'))
05785                         .addClass(
05786                               'ui-icon ' +
05787                               'ui-icon-closethick'
05788                         )
05789                         .text(options.closeText)
05790                         .appendTo(uiDialogTitlebarClose),
05791 
05792                   uiDialogTitle = $('<span></span>')
05793                         .addClass('ui-dialog-title')
05794                         .attr('id', titleId)
05795                         .html(title)
05796                         .prependTo(uiDialogTitlebar);
05797 
05798             //handling of deprecated beforeclose (vs beforeClose) option
05799             //Ticket #4669 http://dev.jqueryui.com/ticket/4669
05800             //TODO: remove in 1.9pre
05801             if ($.isFunction(options.beforeclose) && !$.isFunction(options.beforeClose)) {
05802                   options.beforeClose = options.beforeclose;
05803             }
05804 
05805             uiDialogTitlebar.find("*").add(uiDialogTitlebar).disableSelection();
05806 
05807             if (options.draggable && $.fn.draggable) {
05808                   self._makeDraggable();
05809             }
05810             if (options.resizable && $.fn.resizable) {
05811                   self._makeResizable();
05812             }
05813 
05814             self._createButtons(options.buttons);
05815             self._isOpen = false;
05816 
05817             if ($.fn.bgiframe) {
05818                   uiDialog.bgiframe();
05819             }
05820       },
05821 
05822       _init: function() {
05823             if ( this.options.autoOpen ) {
05824                   this.open();
05825             }
05826       },
05827 
05828       destroy: function() {
05829             var self = this;
05830             
05831             if (self.overlay) {
05832                   self.overlay.destroy();
05833             }
05834             self.uiDialog.hide();
05835             self.element
05836                   .unbind('.dialog')
05837                   .removeData('dialog')
05838                   .removeClass('ui-dialog-content ui-widget-content')
05839                   .hide().appendTo('body');
05840             self.uiDialog.remove();
05841 
05842             if (self.originalTitle) {
05843                   self.element.attr('title', self.originalTitle);
05844             }
05845 
05846             return self;
05847       },
05848 
05849       widget: function() {
05850             return this.uiDialog;
05851       },
05852 
05853       close: function(event) {
05854             var self = this,
05855                   maxZ;
05856             
05857             if (false === self._trigger('beforeClose', event)) {
05858                   return;
05859             }
05860 
05861             if (self.overlay) {
05862                   self.overlay.destroy();
05863             }
05864             self.uiDialog.unbind('keypress.ui-dialog');
05865 
05866             self._isOpen = false;
05867 
05868             if (self.options.hide) {
05869                   self.uiDialog.hide(self.options.hide, function() {
05870                         self._trigger('close', event);
05871                   });
05872             } else {
05873                   self.uiDialog.hide();
05874                   self._trigger('close', event);
05875             }
05876 
05877             $.ui.dialog.overlay.resize();
05878 
05879             // adjust the maxZ to allow other modal dialogs to continue to work (see #4309)
05880             if (self.options.modal) {
05881                   maxZ = 0;
05882                   $('.ui-dialog').each(function() {
05883                         if (this !== self.uiDialog[0]) {
05884                               maxZ = Math.max(maxZ, $(this).css('z-index'));
05885                         }
05886                   });
05887                   $.ui.dialog.maxZ = maxZ;
05888             }
05889 
05890             return self;
05891       },
05892 
05893       isOpen: function() {
05894             return this._isOpen;
05895       },
05896 
05897       // the force parameter allows us to move modal dialogs to their correct
05898       // position on open
05899       moveToTop: function(force, event) {
05900             var self = this,
05901                   options = self.options,
05902                   saveScroll;
05903 
05904             if ((options.modal && !force) ||
05905                   (!options.stack && !options.modal)) {
05906                   return self._trigger('focus', event);
05907             }
05908 
05909             if (options.zIndex > $.ui.dialog.maxZ) {
05910                   $.ui.dialog.maxZ = options.zIndex;
05911             }
05912             if (self.overlay) {
05913                   $.ui.dialog.maxZ += 1;
05914                   self.overlay.$el.css('z-index', $.ui.dialog.overlay.maxZ = $.ui.dialog.maxZ);
05915             }
05916 
05917             //Save and then restore scroll since Opera 9.5+ resets when parent z-Index is changed.
05918             //  http://ui.jquery.com/bugs/ticket/3193
05919             saveScroll = { scrollTop: self.element.attr('scrollTop'), scrollLeft: self.element.attr('scrollLeft') };
05920             $.ui.dialog.maxZ += 1;
05921             self.uiDialog.css('z-index', $.ui.dialog.maxZ);
05922             self.element.attr(saveScroll);
05923             self._trigger('focus', event);
05924 
05925             return self;
05926       },
05927 
05928       open: function() {
05929             if (this._isOpen) { return; }
05930 
05931             var self = this,
05932                   options = self.options,
05933                   uiDialog = self.uiDialog;
05934 
05935             self.overlay = options.modal ? new $.ui.dialog.overlay(self) : null;
05936             if (uiDialog.next().length) {
05937                   uiDialog.appendTo('body');
05938             }
05939             self._size();
05940             self._position(options.position);
05941             uiDialog.show(options.show);
05942             self.moveToTop(true);
05943 
05944             // prevent tabbing out of modal dialogs
05945             if (options.modal) {
05946                   uiDialog.bind('keypress.ui-dialog', function(event) {
05947                         if (event.keyCode !== $.ui.keyCode.TAB) {
05948                               return;
05949                         }
05950 
05951                         var tabbables = $(':tabbable', this),
05952                               first = tabbables.filter(':first'),
05953                               last  = tabbables.filter(':last');
05954 
05955                         if (event.target === last[0] && !event.shiftKey) {
05956                               first.focus(1);
05957                               return false;
05958                         } else if (event.target === first[0] && event.shiftKey) {
05959                               last.focus(1);
05960                               return false;
05961                         }
05962                   });
05963             }
05964 
05965             // set focus to the first tabbable element in the content area or the first button
05966             // if there are no tabbable elements, set focus on the dialog itself
05967             $(self.element.find(':tabbable').get().concat(
05968                   uiDialog.find('.ui-dialog-buttonpane :tabbable').get().concat(
05969                         uiDialog.get()))).eq(0).focus();
05970 
05971             self._trigger('open');
05972             self._isOpen = true;
05973 
05974             return self;
05975       },
05976 
05977       _createButtons: function(buttons) {
05978             var self = this,
05979                   hasButtons = false,
05980                   uiDialogButtonPane = $('<div></div>')
05981                         .addClass(
05982                               'ui-dialog-buttonpane ' +
05983                               'ui-widget-content ' +
05984                               'ui-helper-clearfix'
05985                         ),
05986                   uiButtonSet = $( "<div></div>" )
05987                         .addClass( "ui-dialog-buttonset" )
05988                         .appendTo( uiDialogButtonPane );
05989 
05990             // if we already have a button pane, remove it
05991             self.uiDialog.find('.ui-dialog-buttonpane').remove();
05992 
05993             if (typeof buttons === 'object' && buttons !== null) {
05994                   $.each(buttons, function() {
05995                         return !(hasButtons = true);
05996                   });
05997             }
05998             if (hasButtons) {
05999                   $.each(buttons, function(name, fn) {
06000                         var button = $('<button type="button"></button>')
06001                               .text(name)
06002                               .click(function() { fn.apply(self.element[0], arguments); })
06003                               .appendTo(uiButtonSet);
06004                         if ($.fn.button) {
06005                               button.button();
06006                         }
06007                   });
06008                   uiDialogButtonPane.appendTo(self.uiDialog);
06009             }
06010       },
06011 
06012       _makeDraggable: function() {
06013             var self = this,
06014                   options = self.options,
06015                   doc = $(document),
06016                   heightBeforeDrag;
06017 
06018             function filteredUi(ui) {
06019                   return {
06020                         position: ui.position,
06021                         offset: ui.offset
06022                   };
06023             }
06024 
06025             self.uiDialog.draggable({
06026                   cancel: '.ui-dialog-content, .ui-dialog-titlebar-close',
06027                   handle: '.ui-dialog-titlebar',
06028                   containment: 'document',
06029                   start: function(event, ui) {
06030                         heightBeforeDrag = options.height === "auto" ? "auto" : $(this).height();
06031                         $(this).height($(this).height()).addClass("ui-dialog-dragging");
06032                         self._trigger('dragStart', event, filteredUi(ui));
06033                   },
06034                   drag: function(event, ui) {
06035                         self._trigger('drag', event, filteredUi(ui));
06036                   },
06037                   stop: function(event, ui) {
06038                         options.position = [ui.position.left - doc.scrollLeft(),
06039                               ui.position.top - doc.scrollTop()];
06040                         $(this).removeClass("ui-dialog-dragging").height(heightBeforeDrag);
06041                         self._trigger('dragStop', event, filteredUi(ui));
06042                         $.ui.dialog.overlay.resize();
06043                   }
06044             });
06045       },
06046 
06047       _makeResizable: function(handles) {
06048             handles = (handles === undefined ? this.options.resizable : handles);
06049             var self = this,
06050                   options = self.options,
06051                   // .ui-resizable has position: relative defined in the stylesheet
06052                   // but dialogs have to use absolute or fixed positioning
06053                   position = self.uiDialog.css('position'),
06054                   resizeHandles = (typeof handles === 'string' ?
06055                         handles     :
06056                         'n,e,s,w,se,sw,ne,nw'
06057                   );
06058 
06059             function filteredUi(ui) {
06060                   return {
06061                         originalPosition: ui.originalPosition,
06062                         originalSize: ui.originalSize,
06063                         position: ui.position,
06064                         size: ui.size
06065                   };
06066             }
06067 
06068             self.uiDialog.resizable({
06069                   cancel: '.ui-dialog-content',
06070                   containment: 'document',
06071                   alsoResize: self.element,
06072                   maxWidth: options.maxWidth,
06073                   maxHeight: options.maxHeight,
06074                   minWidth: options.minWidth,
06075                   minHeight: self._minHeight(),
06076                   handles: resizeHandles,
06077                   start: function(event, ui) {
06078                         $(this).addClass("ui-dialog-resizing");
06079                         self._trigger('resizeStart', event, filteredUi(ui));
06080                   },
06081                   resize: function(event, ui) {
06082                         self._trigger('resize', event, filteredUi(ui));
06083                   },
06084                   stop: function(event, ui) {
06085                         $(this).removeClass("ui-dialog-resizing");
06086                         options.height = $(this).height();
06087                         options.width = $(this).width();
06088                         self._trigger('resizeStop', event, filteredUi(ui));
06089                         $.ui.dialog.overlay.resize();
06090                   }
06091             })
06092             .css('position', position)
06093             .find('.ui-resizable-se').addClass('ui-icon ui-icon-grip-diagonal-se');
06094       },
06095 
06096       _minHeight: function() {
06097             var options = this.options;
06098 
06099             if (options.height === 'auto') {
06100                   return options.minHeight;
06101             } else {
06102                   return Math.min(options.minHeight, options.height);
06103             }
06104       },
06105 
06106       _position: function(position) {
06107             var myAt = [],
06108                   offset = [0, 0],
06109                   isVisible;
06110 
06111             if (position) {
06112                   // deep extending converts arrays to objects in jQuery <= 1.3.2 :-(
06113       //          if (typeof position == 'string' || $.isArray(position)) {
06114       //                myAt = $.isArray(position) ? position : position.split(' ');
06115 
06116                   if (typeof position === 'string' || (typeof position === 'object' && '0' in position)) {
06117                         myAt = position.split ? position.split(' ') : [position[0], position[1]];
06118                         if (myAt.length === 1) {
06119                               myAt[1] = myAt[0];
06120                         }
06121 
06122                         $.each(['left', 'top'], function(i, offsetPosition) {
06123                               if (+myAt[i] === myAt[i]) {
06124                                     offset[i] = myAt[i];
06125                                     myAt[i] = offsetPosition;
06126                               }
06127                         });
06128 
06129                         position = {
06130                               my: myAt.join(" "),
06131                               at: myAt.join(" "),
06132                               offset: offset.join(" ")
06133                         };
06134                   } 
06135 
06136                   position = $.extend({}, $.ui.dialog.prototype.options.position, position);
06137             } else {
06138                   position = $.ui.dialog.prototype.options.position;
06139             }
06140 
06141             // need to show the dialog to get the actual offset in the position plugin
06142             isVisible = this.uiDialog.is(':visible');
06143             if (!isVisible) {
06144                   this.uiDialog.show();
06145             }
06146             this.uiDialog
06147                   // workaround for jQuery bug #5781 http://dev.jquery.com/ticket/5781
06148                   .css({ top: 0, left: 0 })
06149                   .position(position);
06150             if (!isVisible) {
06151                   this.uiDialog.hide();
06152             }
06153       },
06154 
06155       _setOption: function(key, value){
06156             var self = this,
06157                   uiDialog = self.uiDialog,
06158                   isResizable = uiDialog.is(':data(resizable)'),
06159                   resize = false;
06160 
06161             switch (key) {
06162                   //handling of deprecated beforeclose (vs beforeClose) option
06163                   //Ticket #4669 http://dev.jqueryui.com/ticket/4669
06164                   //TODO: remove in 1.9pre
06165                   case "beforeclose":
06166                         key = "beforeClose";
06167                         break;
06168                   case "buttons":
06169                         self._createButtons(value);
06170                         resize = true;
06171                         break;
06172                   case "closeText":
06173                         // convert whatever was passed in to a string, for text() to not throw up
06174                         self.uiDialogTitlebarCloseText.text("" + value);
06175                         break;
06176                   case "dialogClass":
06177                         uiDialog
06178                               .removeClass(self.options.dialogClass)
06179                               .addClass(uiDialogClasses + value);
06180                         break;
06181                   case "disabled":
06182                         if (value) {
06183                               uiDialog.addClass('ui-dialog-disabled');
06184                         } else {
06185                               uiDialog.removeClass('ui-dialog-disabled');
06186                         }
06187                         break;
06188                   case "draggable":
06189                         if (value) {
06190                               self._makeDraggable();
06191                         } else {
06192                               uiDialog.draggable('destroy');
06193                         }
06194                         break;
06195                   case "height":
06196                         resize = true;
06197                         break;
06198                   case "maxHeight":
06199                         if (isResizable) {
06200                               uiDialog.resizable('option', 'maxHeight', value);
06201                         }
06202                         resize = true;
06203                         break;
06204                   case "maxWidth":
06205                         if (isResizable) {
06206                               uiDialog.resizable('option', 'maxWidth', value);
06207                         }
06208                         resize = true;
06209                         break;
06210                   case "minHeight":
06211                         if (isResizable) {
06212                               uiDialog.resizable('option', 'minHeight', value);
06213                         }
06214                         resize = true;
06215                         break;
06216                   case "minWidth":
06217                         if (isResizable) {
06218                               uiDialog.resizable('option', 'minWidth', value);
06219                         }
06220                         resize = true;
06221                         break;
06222                   case "position":
06223                         self._position(value);
06224                         break;
06225                   case "resizable":
06226                         // currently resizable, becoming non-resizable
06227                         if (isResizable && !value) {
06228                               uiDialog.resizable('destroy');
06229                         }
06230 
06231                         // currently resizable, changing handles
06232                         if (isResizable && typeof value === 'string') {
06233                               uiDialog.resizable('option', 'handles', value);
06234                         }
06235 
06236                         // currently non-resizable, becoming resizable
06237                         if (!isResizable && value !== false) {
06238                               self._makeResizable(value);
06239                         }
06240                         break;
06241                   case "title":
06242                         // convert whatever was passed in o a string, for html() to not throw up
06243                         $(".ui-dialog-title", self.uiDialogTitlebar).html("" + (value || '&#160;'));
06244                         break;
06245                   case "width":
06246                         resize = true;
06247                         break;
06248             }
06249 
06250             $.Widget.prototype._setOption.apply(self, arguments);
06251             if (resize) {
06252                   self._size();
06253             }
06254       },
06255 
06256       _size: function() {
06257             /* If the user has resized the dialog, the .ui-dialog and .ui-dialog-content
06258              * divs will both have width and height set, so we need to reset them
06259              */
06260             var options = this.options,
06261                   nonContentHeight;
06262 
06263             // reset content sizing
06264             // hide for non content measurement because height: 0 doesn't work in IE quirks mode (see #4350)
06265             this.element.css({
06266                   width: 'auto',
06267                   minHeight: 0,
06268                   height: 0
06269             });
06270 
06271             if (options.minWidth > options.width) {
06272                   options.width = options.minWidth;
06273             }
06274 
06275             // reset wrapper sizing
06276             // determine the height of all the non-content elements
06277             nonContentHeight = this.uiDialog.css({
06278                         height: 'auto',
06279                         width: options.width
06280                   })
06281                   .height();
06282 
06283             this.element
06284                   .css(options.height === 'auto' ? {
06285                               minHeight: Math.max(options.minHeight - nonContentHeight, 0),
06286                               height: 'auto'
06287                         } : {
06288                               minHeight: 0,
06289                               height: Math.max(options.height - nonContentHeight, 0)                        
06290                   })
06291                   .show();
06292 
06293             if (this.uiDialog.is(':data(resizable)')) {
06294                   this.uiDialog.resizable('option', 'minHeight', this._minHeight());
06295             }
06296       }
06297 });
06298 
06299 $.extend($.ui.dialog, {
06300       version: "1.8.4",
06301 
06302       uuid: 0,
06303       maxZ: 0,
06304 
06305       getTitleId: function($el) {
06306             var id = $el.attr('id');
06307             if (!id) {
06308                   this.uuid += 1;
06309                   id = this.uuid;
06310             }
06311             return 'ui-dialog-title-' + id;
06312       },
06313 
06314       overlay: function(dialog) {
06315             this.$el = $.ui.dialog.overlay.create(dialog);
06316       }
06317 });
06318 
06319 $.extend($.ui.dialog.overlay, {
06320       instances: [],
06321       // reuse old instances due to IE memory leak with alpha transparency (see #5185)
06322       oldInstances: [],
06323       maxZ: 0,
06324       events: $.map('focus,mousedown,mouseup,keydown,keypress,click'.split(','),
06325             function(event) { return event + '.dialog-overlay'; }).join(' '),
06326       create: function(dialog) {
06327             if (this.instances.length === 0) {
06328                   // prevent use of anchors and inputs
06329                   // we use a setTimeout in case the overlay is created from an
06330                   // event that we're going to be cancelling (see #2804)
06331                   setTimeout(function() {
06332                         // handle $(el).dialog().dialog('close') (see #4065)
06333                         if ($.ui.dialog.overlay.instances.length) {
06334                               $(document).bind($.ui.dialog.overlay.events, function(event) {
06335                                     // stop events if the z-index of the target is < the z-index of the overlay
06336                                     return ($(event.target).zIndex() >= $.ui.dialog.overlay.maxZ);
06337                               });
06338                         }
06339                   }, 1);
06340 
06341                   // allow closing by pressing the escape key
06342                   $(document).bind('keydown.dialog-overlay', function(event) {
06343                         if (dialog.options.closeOnEscape && event.keyCode &&
06344                               event.keyCode === $.ui.keyCode.ESCAPE) {
06345                               
06346                               dialog.close(event);
06347                               event.preventDefault();
06348                         }
06349                   });
06350 
06351                   // handle window resize
06352                   $(window).bind('resize.dialog-overlay', $.ui.dialog.overlay.resize);
06353             }
06354 
06355             var $el = (this.oldInstances.pop() || $('<div></div>').addClass('ui-widget-overlay'))
06356                   .appendTo(document.body)
06357                   .css({
06358                         width: this.width(),
06359                         height: this.height()
06360                   });
06361 
06362             if ($.fn.bgiframe) {
06363                   $el.bgiframe();
06364             }
06365 
06366             this.instances.push($el);
06367             return $el;
06368       },
06369 
06370       destroy: function($el) {
06371             this.oldInstances.push(this.instances.splice($.inArray($el, this.instances), 1)[0]);
06372 
06373             if (this.instances.length === 0) {
06374                   $([document, window]).unbind('.dialog-overlay');
06375             }
06376 
06377             $el.remove();
06378             
06379             // adjust the maxZ to allow other modal dialogs to continue to work (see #4309)
06380             var maxZ = 0;
06381             $.each(this.instances, function() {
06382                   maxZ = Math.max(maxZ, this.css('z-index'));
06383             });
06384             this.maxZ = maxZ;
06385       },
06386 
06387       height: function() {
06388             var scrollHeight,
06389                   offsetHeight;
06390             // handle IE 6
06391             if ($.browser.msie && $.browser.version < 7) {
06392                   scrollHeight = Math.max(
06393                         document.documentElement.scrollHeight,
06394                         document.body.scrollHeight
06395                   );
06396                   offsetHeight = Math.max(
06397                         document.documentElement.offsetHeight,
06398                         document.body.offsetHeight
06399                   );
06400 
06401                   if (scrollHeight < offsetHeight) {
06402                         return $(window).height() + 'px';
06403                   } else {
06404                         return scrollHeight + 'px';
06405                   }
06406             // handle "good" browsers
06407             } else {
06408                   return $(document).height() + 'px';
06409             }
06410       },
06411 
06412       width: function() {
06413             var scrollWidth,
06414                   offsetWidth;
06415             // handle IE 6
06416             if ($.browser.msie && $.browser.version < 7) {
06417                   scrollWidth = Math.max(
06418                         document.documentElement.scrollWidth,
06419                         document.body.scrollWidth
06420                   );
06421                   offsetWidth = Math.max(
06422                         document.documentElement.offsetWidth,
06423                         document.body.offsetWidth
06424                   );
06425 
06426                   if (scrollWidth < offsetWidth) {
06427                         return $(window).width() + 'px';
06428                   } else {
06429                         return scrollWidth + 'px';
06430                   }
06431             // handle "good" browsers
06432             } else {
06433                   return $(document).width() + 'px';
06434             }
06435       },
06436 
06437       resize: function() {
06438             /* If the dialog is draggable and the user drags it past the
06439              * right edge of the window, the document becomes wider so we
06440              * need to stretch the overlay. If the user then drags the
06441              * dialog back to the left, the document will become narrower,
06442              * so we need to shrink the overlay to the appropriate size.
06443              * This is handled by shrinking the overlay before setting it
06444              * to the full document size.
06445              */
06446             var $overlays = $([]);
06447             $.each($.ui.dialog.overlay.instances, function() {
06448                   $overlays = $overlays.add(this);
06449             });
06450 
06451             $overlays.css({
06452                   width: 0,
06453                   height: 0
06454             }).css({
06455                   width: $.ui.dialog.overlay.width(),
06456                   height: $.ui.dialog.overlay.height()
06457             });
06458       }
06459 });
06460 
06461 $.extend($.ui.dialog.overlay.prototype, {
06462       destroy: function() {
06463             $.ui.dialog.overlay.destroy(this.$el);
06464       }
06465 });
06466 
06467 }(jQuery));
06468 /*
06469  * jQuery UI Slider 1.8.4
06470  *
06471  * Copyright 2010, AUTHORS.txt (http://jqueryui.com/about)
06472  * Dual licensed under the MIT or GPL Version 2 licenses.
06473  * http://jquery.org/license
06474  *
06475  * http://docs.jquery.com/UI/Slider
06476  *
06477  * Depends:
06478  *    jquery.ui.core.js
06479  *    jquery.ui.mouse.js
06480  *    jquery.ui.widget.js
06481  */
06482 (function( $, undefined ) {
06483 
06484 // number of pages in a slider
06485 // (how many times can you page up/down to go through the whole range)
06486 var numPages = 5;
06487 
06488 $.widget( "ui.slider", $.ui.mouse, {
06489 
06490       widgetEventPrefix: "slide",
06491 
06492       options: {
06493             animate: false,
06494             distance: 0,
06495             max: 100,
06496             min: 0,
06497             orientation: "horizontal",
06498             range: false,
06499             step: 1,
06500             value: 0,
06501             values: null
06502       },
06503 
06504       _create: function() {
06505             var self = this,
06506                   o = this.options;
06507 
06508             this._keySliding = false;
06509             this._mouseSliding = false;
06510             this._animateOff = true;
06511             this._handleIndex = null;
06512             this._detectOrientation();
06513             this._mouseInit();
06514 
06515             this.element
06516                   .addClass( "ui-slider" +
06517                         " ui-slider-" + this.orientation +
06518                         " ui-widget" +
06519                         " ui-widget-content" +
06520                         " ui-corner-all" );
06521             
06522             if ( o.disabled ) {
06523                   this.element.addClass( "ui-slider-disabled ui-disabled" );
06524             }
06525 
06526             this.range = $([]);
06527 
06528             if ( o.range ) {
06529                   if ( o.range === true ) {
06530                         this.range = $( "<div></div>" );
06531                         if ( !o.values ) {
06532                               o.values = [ this._valueMin(), this._valueMin() ];
06533                         }
06534                         if ( o.values.length && o.values.length !== 2 ) {
06535                               o.values = [ o.values[0], o.values[0] ];
06536                         }
06537                   } else {
06538                         this.range = $( "<div></div>" );
06539                   }
06540 
06541                   this.range
06542                         .appendTo( this.element )
06543                         .addClass( "ui-slider-range" );
06544 
06545                   if ( o.range === "min" || o.range === "max" ) {
06546                         this.range.addClass( "ui-slider-range-" + o.range );
06547                   }
06548 
06549                   // note: this isn't the most fittingly semantic framework class for this element,
06550                   // but worked best visually with a variety of themes
06551                   this.range.addClass( "ui-widget-header" );
06552             }
06553 
06554             if ( $( ".ui-slider-handle", this.element ).length === 0 ) {
06555                   $( "<a href='#'></a>" )
06556                         .appendTo( this.element )
06557                         .addClass( "ui-slider-handle" );
06558             }
06559 
06560             if ( o.values && o.values.length ) {
06561                   while ( $(".ui-slider-handle", this.element).length < o.values.length ) {
06562                         $( "<a href='#'></a>" )
06563                               .appendTo( this.element )
06564                               .addClass( "ui-slider-handle" );
06565                   }
06566             }
06567 
06568             this.handles = $( ".ui-slider-handle", this.element )
06569                   .addClass( "ui-state-default" +
06570                         " ui-corner-all" );
06571 
06572             this.handle = this.handles.eq( 0 );
06573 
06574             this.handles.add( this.range ).filter( "a" )
06575                   .click(function( event ) {
06576                         event.preventDefault();
06577                   })
06578                   .hover(function() {
06579                         if ( !o.disabled ) {
06580                               $( this ).addClass( "ui-state-hover" );
06581                         }
06582                   }, function() {
06583                         $( this ).removeClass( "ui-state-hover" );
06584                   })
06585                   .focus(function() {
06586                         if ( !o.disabled ) {
06587                               $( ".ui-slider .ui-state-focus" ).removeClass( "ui-state-focus" );
06588                               $( this ).addClass( "ui-state-focus" );
06589                         } else {
06590                               $( this ).blur();
06591                         }
06592                   })
06593                   .blur(function() {
06594                         $( this ).removeClass( "ui-state-focus" );
06595                   });
06596 
06597             this.handles.each(function( i ) {
06598                   $( this ).data( "index.ui-slider-handle", i );
06599             });
06600 
06601             this.handles
06602                   .keydown(function( event ) {
06603                         var ret = true,
06604                               index = $( this ).data( "index.ui-slider-handle" ),
06605                               allowed,
06606                               curVal,
06607                               newVal,
06608                               step;
06609       
06610                         if ( self.options.disabled ) {
06611                               return;
06612                         }
06613       
06614                         switch ( event.keyCode ) {
06615                               case $.ui.keyCode.HOME:
06616                               case $.ui.keyCode.END:
06617                               case $.ui.keyCode.PAGE_UP:
06618                               case $.ui.keyCode.PAGE_DOWN:
06619                               case $.ui.keyCode.UP:
06620                               case $.ui.keyCode.RIGHT:
06621                               case $.ui.keyCode.DOWN:
06622                               case $.ui.keyCode.LEFT:
06623                                     ret = false;
06624                                     if ( !self._keySliding ) {
06625                                           self._keySliding = true;
06626                                           $( this ).addClass( "ui-state-active" );
06627                                           allowed = self._start( event, index );
06628                                           if ( allowed === false ) {
06629                                                 return;
06630                                           }
06631                                     }
06632                                     break;
06633                         }
06634       
06635                         step = self.options.step;
06636                         if ( self.options.values && self.options.values.length ) {
06637                               curVal = newVal = self.values( index );
06638                         } else {
06639                               curVal = newVal = self.value();
06640                         }
06641       
06642                         switch ( event.keyCode ) {
06643                               case $.ui.keyCode.HOME:
06644                                     newVal = self._valueMin();
06645                                     break;
06646                               case $.ui.keyCode.END:
06647                                     newVal = self._valueMax();
06648                                     break;
06649                               case $.ui.keyCode.PAGE_UP:
06650                                     newVal = self._trimAlignValue( curVal + ( (self._valueMax() - self._valueMin()) / numPages ) );
06651                                     break;
06652                               case $.ui.keyCode.PAGE_DOWN:
06653                                     newVal = self._trimAlignValue( curVal - ( (self._valueMax() - self._valueMin()) / numPages ) );
06654                                     break;
06655                               case $.ui.keyCode.UP:
06656                               case $.ui.keyCode.RIGHT:
06657                                     if ( curVal === self._valueMax() ) {
06658                                           return;
06659                                     }
06660                                     newVal = self._trimAlignValue( curVal + step );
06661                                     break;
06662                               case $.ui.keyCode.DOWN:
06663                               case $.ui.keyCode.LEFT:
06664                                     if ( curVal === self._valueMin() ) {
06665                                           return;
06666                                     }
06667                                     newVal = self._trimAlignValue( curVal - step );
06668                                     break;
06669                         }
06670       
06671                         self._slide( event, index, newVal );
06672       
06673                         return ret;
06674       
06675                   })
06676                   .keyup(function( event ) {
06677                         var index = $( this ).data( "index.ui-slider-handle" );
06678       
06679                         if ( self._keySliding ) {
06680                               self._keySliding = false;
06681                               self._stop( event, index );
06682                               self._change( event, index );
06683                               $( this ).removeClass( "ui-state-active" );
06684                         }
06685       
06686                   });
06687 
06688             this._refreshValue();
06689 
06690             this._animateOff = false;
06691       },
06692 
06693       destroy: function() {
06694             this.handles.remove();
06695             this.range.remove();
06696 
06697             this.element
06698                   .removeClass( "ui-slider" +
06699                         " ui-slider-horizontal" +
06700                         " ui-slider-vertical" +
06701                         " ui-slider-disabled" +
06702                         " ui-widget" +
06703                         " ui-widget-content" +
06704                         " ui-corner-all" )
06705                   .removeData( "slider" )
06706                   .unbind( ".slider" );
06707 
06708             this._mouseDestroy();
06709 
06710             return this;
06711       },
06712 
06713       _mouseCapture: function( event ) {
06714             var o = this.options,
06715                   position,
06716                   normValue,
06717                   distance,
06718                   closestHandle,
06719                   self,
06720                   index,
06721                   allowed,
06722                   offset,
06723                   mouseOverHandle;
06724 
06725             if ( o.disabled ) {
06726                   return false;
06727             }
06728 
06729             this.elementSize = {
