06730                   width: this.element.outerWidth(),
06731                   height: this.element.outerHeight()
06732             };
06733             this.elementOffset = this.element.offset();
06734 
06735             position = { x: event.pageX, y: event.pageY };
06736             normValue = this._normValueFromMouse( position );
06737             distance = this._valueMax() - this._valueMin() + 1;
06738             self = this;
06739             this.handles.each(function( i ) {
06740                   var thisDistance = Math.abs( normValue - self.values(i) );
06741                   if ( distance > thisDistance ) {
06742                         distance = thisDistance;
06743                         closestHandle = $( this );
06744                         index = i;
06745                   }
06746             });
06747 
06748             // workaround for bug #3736 (if both handles of a range are at 0,
06749             // the first is always used as the one with least distance,
06750             // and moving it is obviously prevented by preventing negative ranges)
06751             if( o.range === true && this.values(1) === o.min ) {
06752                   index += 1;
06753                   closestHandle = $( this.handles[index] );
06754             }
06755 
06756             allowed = this._start( event, index );
06757             if ( allowed === false ) {
06758                   return false;
06759             }
06760             this._mouseSliding = true;
06761 
06762             self._handleIndex = index;
06763 
06764             closestHandle
06765                   .addClass( "ui-state-active" )
06766                   .focus();
06767             
06768             offset = closestHandle.offset();
06769             mouseOverHandle = !$( event.target ).parents().andSelf().is( ".ui-slider-handle" );
06770             this._clickOffset = mouseOverHandle ? { left: 0, top: 0 } : {
06771                   left: event.pageX - offset.left - ( closestHandle.width() / 2 ),
06772                   top: event.pageY - offset.top -
06773                         ( closestHandle.height() / 2 ) -
06774                         ( parseInt( closestHandle.css("borderTopWidth"), 10 ) || 0 ) -
06775                         ( parseInt( closestHandle.css("borderBottomWidth"), 10 ) || 0) +
06776                         ( parseInt( closestHandle.css("marginTop"), 10 ) || 0)
06777             };
06778 
06779             this._slide( event, index, normValue );
06780             this._animateOff = true;
06781             return true;
06782       },
06783 
06784       _mouseStart: function( event ) {
06785             return true;
06786       },
06787 
06788       _mouseDrag: function( event ) {
06789             var position = { x: event.pageX, y: event.pageY },
06790                   normValue = this._normValueFromMouse( position );
06791             
06792             this._slide( event, this._handleIndex, normValue );
06793 
06794             return false;
06795       },
06796 
06797       _mouseStop: function( event ) {
06798             this.handles.removeClass( "ui-state-active" );
06799             this._mouseSliding = false;
06800 
06801             this._stop( event, this._handleIndex );
06802             this._change( event, this._handleIndex );
06803 
06804             this._handleIndex = null;
06805             this._clickOffset = null;
06806             this._animateOff = false;
06807 
06808             return false;
06809       },
06810       
06811       _detectOrientation: function() {
06812             this.orientation = ( this.options.orientation === "vertical" ) ? "vertical" : "horizontal";
06813       },
06814 
06815       _normValueFromMouse: function( position ) {
06816             var pixelTotal,
06817                   pixelMouse,
06818                   percentMouse,
06819                   valueTotal,
06820                   valueMouse;
06821 
06822             if ( this.orientation === "horizontal" ) {
06823                   pixelTotal = this.elementSize.width;
06824                   pixelMouse = position.x - this.elementOffset.left - ( this._clickOffset ? this._clickOffset.left : 0 );
06825             } else {
06826                   pixelTotal = this.elementSize.height;
06827                   pixelMouse = position.y - this.elementOffset.top - ( this._clickOffset ? this._clickOffset.top : 0 );
06828             }
06829 
06830             percentMouse = ( pixelMouse / pixelTotal );
06831             if ( percentMouse > 1 ) {
06832                   percentMouse = 1;
06833             }
06834             if ( percentMouse < 0 ) {
06835                   percentMouse = 0;
06836             }
06837             if ( this.orientation === "vertical" ) {
06838                   percentMouse = 1 - percentMouse;
06839             }
06840 
06841             valueTotal = this._valueMax() - this._valueMin();
06842             valueMouse = this._valueMin() + percentMouse * valueTotal;
06843 
06844             return this._trimAlignValue( valueMouse );
06845       },
06846 
06847       _start: function( event, index ) {
06848             var uiHash = {
06849                   handle: this.handles[ index ],
06850                   value: this.value()
06851             };
06852             if ( this.options.values && this.options.values.length ) {
06853                   uiHash.value = this.values( index );
06854                   uiHash.values = this.values();
06855             }
06856             return this._trigger( "start", event, uiHash );
06857       },
06858 
06859       _slide: function( event, index, newVal ) {
06860             var otherVal,
06861                   newValues,
06862                   allowed;
06863 
06864             if ( this.options.values && this.options.values.length ) {
06865                   otherVal = this.values( index ? 0 : 1 );
06866 
06867                   if ( ( this.options.values.length === 2 && this.options.range === true ) && 
06868                               ( ( index === 0 && newVal > otherVal) || ( index === 1 && newVal < otherVal ) )
06869                         ) {
06870                         newVal = otherVal;
06871                   }
06872 
06873                   if ( newVal !== this.values( index ) ) {
06874                         newValues = this.values();
06875                         newValues[ index ] = newVal;
06876                         // A slide can be canceled by returning false from the slide callback
06877                         allowed = this._trigger( "slide", event, {
06878                               handle: this.handles[ index ],
06879                               value: newVal,
06880                               values: newValues
06881                         } );
06882                         otherVal = this.values( index ? 0 : 1 );
06883                         if ( allowed !== false ) {
06884                               this.values( index, newVal, true );
06885                         }
06886                   }
06887             } else {
06888                   if ( newVal !== this.value() ) {
06889                         // A slide can be canceled by returning false from the slide callback
06890                         allowed = this._trigger( "slide", event, {
06891                               handle: this.handles[ index ],
06892                               value: newVal
06893                         } );
06894                         if ( allowed !== false ) {
06895                               this.value( newVal );
06896                         }
06897                   }
06898             }
06899       },
06900 
06901       _stop: function( event, index ) {
06902             var uiHash = {
06903                   handle: this.handles[ index ],
06904                   value: this.value()
06905             };
06906             if ( this.options.values && this.options.values.length ) {
06907                   uiHash.value = this.values( index );
06908                   uiHash.values = this.values();
06909             }
06910 
06911             this._trigger( "stop", event, uiHash );
06912       },
06913 
06914       _change: function( event, index ) {
06915             if ( !this._keySliding && !this._mouseSliding ) {
06916                   var uiHash = {
06917                         handle: this.handles[ index ],
06918                         value: this.value()
06919                   };
06920                   if ( this.options.values && this.options.values.length ) {
06921                         uiHash.value = this.values( index );
06922                         uiHash.values = this.values();
06923                   }
06924 
06925                   this._trigger( "change", event, uiHash );
06926             }
06927       },
06928 
06929       value: function( newValue ) {
06930             if ( arguments.length ) {
06931                   this.options.value = this._trimAlignValue( newValue );
06932                   this._refreshValue();
06933                   this._change( null, 0 );
06934             }
06935 
06936             return this._value();
06937       },
06938 
06939       values: function( index, newValue ) {
06940             var vals,
06941                   newValues,
06942                   i;
06943 
06944             if ( arguments.length > 1 ) {
06945                   this.options.values[ index ] = this._trimAlignValue( newValue );
06946                   this._refreshValue();
06947                   this._change( null, index );
06948             }
06949 
06950             if ( arguments.length ) {
06951                   if ( $.isArray( arguments[ 0 ] ) ) {
06952                         vals = this.options.values;
06953                         newValues = arguments[ 0 ];
06954                         for ( i = 0; i < vals.length; i += 1 ) {
06955                               vals[ i ] = this._trimAlignValue( newValues[ i ] );
06956                               this._change( null, i );
06957                         }
06958                         this._refreshValue();
06959                   } else {
06960                         if ( this.options.values && this.options.values.length ) {
06961                               return this._values( index );
06962                         } else {
06963                               return this.value();
06964                         }
06965                   }
06966             } else {
06967                   return this._values();
06968             }
06969       },
06970 
06971       _setOption: function( key, value ) {
06972             var i,
06973                   valsLength = 0;
06974 
06975             if ( $.isArray( this.options.values ) ) {
06976                   valsLength = this.options.values.length;
06977             }
06978 
06979             $.Widget.prototype._setOption.apply( this, arguments );
06980 
06981             switch ( key ) {
06982                   case "disabled":
06983                         if ( value ) {
06984                               this.handles.filter( ".ui-state-focus" ).blur();
06985                               this.handles.removeClass( "ui-state-hover" );
06986                               this.handles.attr( "disabled", "disabled" );
06987                               this.element.addClass( "ui-disabled" );
06988                         } else {
06989                               this.handles.removeAttr( "disabled" );
06990                               this.element.removeClass( "ui-disabled" );
06991                         }
06992                         break;
06993                   case "orientation":
06994                         this._detectOrientation();
06995                         this.element
06996                               .removeClass( "ui-slider-horizontal ui-slider-vertical" )
06997                               .addClass( "ui-slider-" + this.orientation );
06998                         this._refreshValue();
06999                         break;
07000                   case "value":
07001                         this._animateOff = true;
07002                         this._refreshValue();
07003                         this._change( null, 0 );
07004                         this._animateOff = false;
07005                         break;
07006                   case "values":
07007                         this._animateOff = true;
07008                         this._refreshValue();
07009                         for ( i = 0; i < valsLength; i += 1 ) {
07010                               this._change( null, i );
07011                         }
07012                         this._animateOff = false;
07013                         break;
07014             }
07015       },
07016 
07017       //internal value getter
07018       // _value() returns value trimmed by min and max, aligned by step
07019       _value: function() {
07020             var val = this.options.value;
07021             val = this._trimAlignValue( val );
07022 
07023             return val;
07024       },
07025 
07026       //internal values getter
07027       // _values() returns array of values trimmed by min and max, aligned by step
07028       // _values( index ) returns single value trimmed by min and max, aligned by step
07029       _values: function( index ) {
07030             var val,
07031                   vals,
07032                   i;
07033 
07034             if ( arguments.length ) {
07035                   val = this.options.values[ index ];
07036                   val = this._trimAlignValue( val );
07037 
07038                   return val;
07039             } else {
07040                   // .slice() creates a copy of the array
07041                   // this copy gets trimmed by min and max and then returned
07042                   vals = this.options.values.slice();
07043                   for ( i = 0; i < vals.length; i+= 1) {
07044                         vals[ i ] = this._trimAlignValue( vals[ i ] );
07045                   }
07046 
07047                   return vals;
07048             }
07049       },
07050       
07051       // returns the step-aligned value that val is closest to, between (inclusive) min and max
07052       _trimAlignValue: function( val ) {
07053             if ( val < this._valueMin() ) {
07054                   return this._valueMin();
07055             }
07056             if ( val > this._valueMax() ) {
07057                   return this._valueMax();
07058             }
07059             var step = ( this.options.step > 0 ) ? this.options.step : 1,
07060                   valModStep = val % step,
07061                   alignValue = val - valModStep;
07062 
07063             if ( Math.abs(valModStep) * 2 >= step ) {
07064                   alignValue += ( valModStep > 0 ) ? step : ( -step );
07065             }
07066 
07067             // Since JavaScript has problems with large floats, round
07068             // the final value to 5 digits after the decimal point (see #4124)
07069             return parseFloat( alignValue.toFixed(5) );
07070       },
07071 
07072       _valueMin: function() {
07073             return this.options.min;
07074       },
07075 
07076       _valueMax: function() {
07077             return this.options.max;
07078       },
07079       
07080       _refreshValue: function() {
07081             var oRange = this.options.range,
07082                   o = this.options,
07083                   self = this,
07084                   animate = ( !this._animateOff ) ? o.animate : false,
07085                   valPercent,
07086                   _set = {},
07087                   lastValPercent,
07088                   value,
07089                   valueMin,
07090                   valueMax;
07091 
07092             if ( this.options.values && this.options.values.length ) {
07093                   this.handles.each(function( i, j ) {
07094                         valPercent = ( self.values(i) - self._valueMin() ) / ( self._valueMax() - self._valueMin() ) * 100;
07095                         _set[ self.orientation === "horizontal" ? "left" : "bottom" ] = valPercent + "%";
07096                         $( this ).stop( 1, 1 )[ animate ? "animate" : "css" ]( _set, o.animate );
07097                         if ( self.options.range === true ) {
07098                               if ( self.orientation === "horizontal" ) {
07099                                     if ( i === 0 ) {
07100                                           self.range.stop( 1, 1 )[ animate ? "animate" : "css" ]( { left: valPercent + "%" }, o.animate );
07101                                     }
07102                                     if ( i === 1 ) {
07103                                           self.range[ animate ? "animate" : "css" ]( { width: ( valPercent - lastValPercent ) + "%" }, { queue: false, duration: o.animate } );
07104                                     }
07105                               } else {
07106                                     if ( i === 0 ) {
07107                                           self.range.stop( 1, 1 )[ animate ? "animate" : "css" ]( { bottom: ( valPercent ) + "%" }, o.animate );
07108                                     }
07109                                     if ( i === 1 ) {
07110                                           self.range[ animate ? "animate" : "css" ]( { height: ( valPercent - lastValPercent ) + "%" }, { queue: false, duration: o.animate } );
07111                                     }
07112                               }
07113                         }
07114                         lastValPercent = valPercent;
07115                   });
07116             } else {
07117                   value = this.value();
07118                   valueMin = this._valueMin();
07119                   valueMax = this._valueMax();
07120                   valPercent = ( valueMax !== valueMin ) ?
07121                               ( value - valueMin ) / ( valueMax - valueMin ) * 100 :
07122                               0;
07123                   _set[ self.orientation === "horizontal" ? "left" : "bottom" ] = valPercent + "%";
07124                   this.handle.stop( 1, 1 )[ animate ? "animate" : "css" ]( _set, o.animate );
07125 
07126                   if ( oRange === "min" && this.orientation === "horizontal" ) {
07127                         this.range.stop( 1, 1 )[ animate ? "animate" : "css" ]( { width: valPercent + "%" }, o.animate );
07128                   }
07129                   if ( oRange === "max" && this.orientation === "horizontal" ) {
07130                         this.range[ animate ? "animate" : "css" ]( { width: ( 100 - valPercent ) + "%" }, { queue: false, duration: o.animate } );
07131                   }
07132                   if ( oRange === "min" && this.orientation === "vertical" ) {
07133                         this.range.stop( 1, 1 )[ animate ? "animate" : "css" ]( { height: valPercent + "%" }, o.animate );
07134                   }
07135                   if ( oRange === "max" && this.orientation === "vertical" ) {
07136                         this.range[ animate ? "animate" : "css" ]( { height: ( 100 - valPercent ) + "%" }, { queue: false, duration: o.animate } );
07137                   }
07138             }
07139       }
07140 
07141 });
07142 
07143 $.extend( $.ui.slider, {
07144       version: "1.8.4"
07145 });
07146 
07147 }(jQuery));
07148 /*
07149  * jQuery UI Tabs 1.8.4
07150  *
07151  * Copyright 2010, AUTHORS.txt (http://jqueryui.com/about)
07152  * Dual licensed under the MIT or GPL Version 2 licenses.
07153  * http://jquery.org/license
07154  *
07155  * http://docs.jquery.com/UI/Tabs
07156  *
07157  * Depends:
07158  *    jquery.ui.core.js
07159  *    jquery.ui.widget.js
07160  */
07161 (function( $, undefined ) {
07162 
07163 var tabId = 0,
07164       listId = 0;
07165 
07166 function getNextTabId() {
07167       return ++tabId;
07168 }
07169 
07170 function getNextListId() {
07171       return ++listId;
07172 }
07173 
07174 $.widget( "ui.tabs", {
07175       options: {
07176             add: null,
07177             ajaxOptions: null,
07178             cache: false,
07179             cookie: null, // e.g. { expires: 7, path: '/', domain: 'jquery.com', secure: true }
07180             collapsible: false,
07181             disable: null,
07182             disabled: [],
07183             enable: null,
07184             event: "click",
07185             fx: null, // e.g. { height: 'toggle', opacity: 'toggle', duration: 200 }
07186             idPrefix: "ui-tabs-",
07187             load: null,
07188             panelTemplate: "<div></div>",
07189             remove: null,
07190             select: null,
07191             show: null,
07192             spinner: "<em>Loading&#8230;</em>",
07193             tabTemplate: "<li><a href='#{href}'><span>#{label}</span></a></li>"
07194       },
07195 
07196       _create: function() {
07197             this._tabify( true );
07198       },
07199 
07200       _setOption: function( key, value ) {
07201             if ( key == "selected" ) {
07202                   if (this.options.collapsible && value == this.options.selected ) {
07203                         return;
07204                   }
07205                   this.select( value );
07206             } else {
07207                   this.options[ key ] = value;
07208                   this._tabify();
07209             }
07210       },
07211 
07212       _tabId: function( a ) {
07213             return a.title && a.title.replace( /\s/g, "_" ).replace( /[^A-Za-z0-9\-_:\.]/g, "" ) ||
07214                   this.options.idPrefix + getNextTabId();
07215       },
07216 
07217       _sanitizeSelector: function( hash ) {
07218             // we need this because an id may contain a ":"
07219             return hash.replace( /:/g, "\\:" );
07220       },
07221 
07222       _cookie: function() {
07223             var cookie = this.cookie ||
07224                   ( this.cookie = this.options.cookie.name || "ui-tabs-" + getNextListId() );
07225             return $.cookie.apply( null, [ cookie ].concat( $.makeArray( arguments ) ) );
07226       },
07227 
07228       _ui: function( tab, panel ) {
07229             return {
07230                   tab: tab,
07231                   panel: panel,
07232                   index: this.anchors.index( tab )
07233             };
07234       },
07235 
07236       _cleanup: function() {
07237             // restore all former loading tabs labels
07238             this.lis.filter( ".ui-state-processing" )
07239                   .removeClass( "ui-state-processing" )
07240                   .find( "span:data(label.tabs)" )
07241                         .each(function() {
07242                               var el = $( this );
07243                               el.html( el.data( "label.tabs" ) ).removeData( "label.tabs" );
07244                         });
07245       },
07246 
07247       _tabify: function( init ) {
07248             var self = this,
07249                   o = this.options,
07250                   fragmentId = /^#.+/; // Safari 2 reports '#' for an empty hash
07251 
07252             this.list = this.element.find( "ol,ul" ).eq( 0 );
07253             this.lis = $( "li:has(a[href])", this.list );
07254             this.anchors = this.lis.map(function() {
07255                   return $( "a", this )[ 0 ];
07256             });
07257             this.panels = $( [] );
07258 
07259             this.anchors.each(function( i, a ) {
07260                   var href = $( a ).attr( "href" );
07261                   // For dynamically created HTML that contains a hash as href IE < 8 expands
07262                   // such href to the full page url with hash and then misinterprets tab as ajax.
07263                   // Same consideration applies for an added tab with a fragment identifier
07264                   // since a[href=#fragment-identifier] does unexpectedly not match.
07265                   // Thus normalize href attribute...
07266                   var hrefBase = href.split( "#" )[ 0 ],
07267                         baseEl;
07268                   if ( hrefBase && ( hrefBase === location.toString().split( "#" )[ 0 ] ||
07269                               ( baseEl = $( "base" )[ 0 ]) && hrefBase === baseEl.href ) ) {
07270                         href = a.hash;
07271                         a.href = href;
07272                   }
07273 
07274                   // inline tab
07275                   if ( fragmentId.test( href ) ) {
07276                         self.panels = self.panels.add( self._sanitizeSelector( href ) );
07277                   // remote tab
07278                   // prevent loading the page itself if href is just "#"
07279                   } else if ( href !== "#" ) {
07280                         // required for restore on destroy
07281                         $.data( a, "href.tabs", href );
07282 
07283                         // TODO until #3808 is fixed strip fragment identifier from url
07284                         // (IE fails to load from such url)
07285                         $.data( a, "load.tabs", href.replace( /#.*$/, "" ) );
07286 
07287                         var id = self._tabId( a );
07288                         a.href = "#" + id;
07289                         var $panel = $( "#" + id );
07290                         if ( !$panel.length ) {
07291                               $panel = $( o.panelTemplate )
07292                                     .attr( "id", id )
07293                                     .addClass( "ui-tabs-panel ui-widget-content ui-corner-bottom" )
07294                                     .insertAfter( self.panels[ i - 1 ] || self.list );
07295                               $panel.data( "destroy.tabs", true );
07296                         }
07297                         self.panels = self.panels.add( $panel );
07298                   // invalid tab href
07299                   } else {
07300                         o.disabled.push( i );
07301                   }
07302             });
07303 
07304             // initialization from scratch
07305             if ( init ) {
07306                   // attach necessary classes for styling
07307                   this.element.addClass( "ui-tabs ui-widget ui-widget-content ui-corner-all" );
07308                   this.list.addClass( "ui-tabs-nav ui-helper-reset ui-helper-clearfix ui-widget-header ui-corner-all" );
07309                   this.lis.addClass( "ui-state-default ui-corner-top" );
07310                   this.panels.addClass( "ui-tabs-panel ui-widget-content ui-corner-bottom" );
07311 
07312                   // Selected tab
07313                   // use "selected" option or try to retrieve:
07314                   // 1. from fragment identifier in url
07315                   // 2. from cookie
07316                   // 3. from selected class attribute on <li>
07317                   if ( o.selected === undefined ) {
07318                         if ( location.hash ) {
07319                               this.anchors.each(function( i, a ) {
07320                                     if ( a.hash == location.hash ) {
07321                                           o.selected = i;
07322                                           return false;
07323                                     }
07324                               });
07325                         }
07326                         if ( typeof o.selected !== "number" && o.cookie ) {
07327                               o.selected = parseInt( self._cookie(), 10 );
07328                         }
07329                         if ( typeof o.selected !== "number" && this.lis.filter( ".ui-tabs-selected" ).length ) {
07330                               o.selected = this.lis.index( this.lis.filter( ".ui-tabs-selected" ) );
07331                         }
07332                         o.selected = o.selected || ( this.lis.length ? 0 : -1 );
07333                   } else if ( o.selected === null ) { // usage of null is deprecated, TODO remove in next release
07334                         o.selected = -1;
07335                   }
07336 
07337                   // sanity check - default to first tab...
07338                   o.selected = ( ( o.selected >= 0 && this.anchors[ o.selected ] ) || o.selected < 0 )
07339                         ? o.selected
07340                         : 0;
07341 
07342                   // Take disabling tabs via class attribute from HTML
07343                   // into account and update option properly.
07344                   // A selected tab cannot become disabled.
07345                   o.disabled = $.unique( o.disabled.concat(
07346                         $.map( this.lis.filter( ".ui-state-disabled" ), function( n, i ) {
07347                               return self.lis.index( n );
07348                         })
07349                   ) ).sort();
07350 
07351                   if ( $.inArray( o.selected, o.disabled ) != -1 ) {
07352                         o.disabled.splice( $.inArray( o.selected, o.disabled ), 1 );
07353                   }
07354 
07355                   // highlight selected tab
07356                   this.panels.addClass( "ui-tabs-hide" );
07357                   this.lis.removeClass( "ui-tabs-selected ui-state-active" );
07358                   // check for length avoids error when initializing empty list
07359                   if ( o.selected >= 0 && this.anchors.length ) {
07360                         this.panels.eq( o.selected ).removeClass( "ui-tabs-hide" );
07361                         this.lis.eq( o.selected ).addClass( "ui-tabs-selected ui-state-active" );
07362 
07363                         // seems to be expected behavior that the show callback is fired
07364                         self.element.queue( "tabs", function() {
07365                               self._trigger( "show", null,
07366                                     self._ui( self.anchors[ o.selected ], self.panels[ o.selected ] ) );
07367                         });
07368 
07369                         this.load( o.selected );
07370                   }
07371 
07372                   // clean up to avoid memory leaks in certain versions of IE 6
07373                   // TODO: namespace this event
07374                   $( window ).bind( "unload", function() {
07375                         self.lis.add( self.anchors ).unbind( ".tabs" );
07376                         self.lis = self.anchors = self.panels = null;
07377                   });
07378             // update selected after add/remove
07379             } else {
07380                   o.selected = this.lis.index( this.lis.filter( ".ui-tabs-selected" ) );
07381             }
07382 
07383             // update collapsible
07384             // TODO: use .toggleClass()
07385             this.element[ o.collapsible ? "addClass" : "removeClass" ]( "ui-tabs-collapsible" );
07386 
07387             // set or update cookie after init and add/remove respectively
07388             if ( o.cookie ) {
07389                   this._cookie( o.selected, o.cookie );
07390             }
07391 
07392             // disable tabs
07393             for ( var i = 0, li; ( li = this.lis[ i ] ); i++ ) {
07394                   $( li )[ $.inArray( i, o.disabled ) != -1 &&
07395                         // TODO: use .toggleClass()
07396                         !$( li ).hasClass( "ui-tabs-selected" ) ? "addClass" : "removeClass" ]( "ui-state-disabled" );
07397             }
07398 
07399             // reset cache if switching from cached to not cached
07400             if ( o.cache === false ) {
07401                   this.anchors.removeData( "cache.tabs" );
07402             }
07403 
07404             // remove all handlers before, tabify may run on existing tabs after add or option change
07405             this.lis.add( this.anchors ).unbind( ".tabs" );
07406 
07407             if ( o.event !== "mouseover" ) {
07408                   var addState = function( state, el ) {
07409                         if ( el.is( ":not(.ui-state-disabled)" ) ) {
07410                               el.addClass( "ui-state-" + state );
07411                         }
07412                   };
07413                   var removeState = function( state, el ) {
07414                         el.removeClass( "ui-state-" + state );
07415                   };
07416                   this.lis.bind( "mouseover.tabs" , function() {
07417                         addState( "hover", $( this ) );
07418                   });
07419                   this.lis.bind( "mouseout.tabs", function() {
07420                         removeState( "hover", $( this ) );
07421                   });
07422                   this.anchors.bind( "focus.tabs", function() {
07423                         addState( "focus", $( this ).closest( "li" ) );
07424                   });
07425                   this.anchors.bind( "blur.tabs", function() {
07426                         removeState( "focus", $( this ).closest( "li" ) );
07427                   });
07428             }
07429 
07430             // set up animations
07431             var hideFx, showFx;
07432             if ( o.fx ) {
07433                   if ( $.isArray( o.fx ) ) {
07434                         hideFx = o.fx[ 0 ];
07435                         showFx = o.fx[ 1 ];
07436                   } else {
07437                         hideFx = showFx = o.fx;
07438                   }
07439             }
07440 
07441             // Reset certain styles left over from animation
07442             // and prevent IE's ClearType bug...
07443             function resetStyle( $el, fx ) {
07444                   $el.css( "display", "" );
07445                   if ( !$.support.opacity && fx.opacity ) {
07446                         $el[ 0 ].style.removeAttribute( "filter" );
07447                   }
07448             }
07449 
07450             // Show a tab...
07451             var showTab = showFx
07452                   ? function( clicked, $show ) {
07453                         $( clicked ).closest( "li" ).addClass( "ui-tabs-selected ui-state-active" );
07454                         $show.hide().removeClass( "ui-tabs-hide" ) // avoid flicker that way
07455                               .animate( showFx, showFx.duration || "normal", function() {
07456                                     resetStyle( $show, showFx );
07457                                     self._trigger( "show", null, self._ui( clicked, $show[ 0 ] ) );
07458                               });
07459                   }
07460                   : function( clicked, $show ) {
07461                         $( clicked ).closest( "li" ).addClass( "ui-tabs-selected ui-state-active" );
07462                         $show.removeClass( "ui-tabs-hide" );
07463                         self._trigger( "show", null, self._ui( clicked, $show[ 0 ] ) );
07464                   };
07465 
07466             // Hide a tab, $show is optional...
07467             var hideTab = hideFx
07468                   ? function( clicked, $hide ) {
07469                         $hide.animate( hideFx, hideFx.duration || "normal", function() {
07470                               self.lis.removeClass( "ui-tabs-selected ui-state-active" );
07471                               $hide.addClass( "ui-tabs-hide" );
07472                               resetStyle( $hide, hideFx );
07473                               self.element.dequeue( "tabs" );
07474                         });
07475                   }
07476                   : function( clicked, $hide, $show ) {
07477                         self.lis.removeClass( "ui-tabs-selected ui-state-active" );
07478                         $hide.addClass( "ui-tabs-hide" );
07479                         self.element.dequeue( "tabs" );
07480                   };
07481 
07482             // attach tab event handler, unbind to avoid duplicates from former tabifying...
07483             this.anchors.bind( o.event + ".tabs", function() {
07484                   var el = this,
07485                         $li = $(el).closest( "li" ),
07486                         $hide = self.panels.filter( ":not(.ui-tabs-hide)" ),
07487                         $show = $( self._sanitizeSelector( el.hash ) );
07488 
07489                   // If tab is already selected and not collapsible or tab disabled or
07490                   // or is already loading or click callback returns false stop here.
07491                   // Check if click handler returns false last so that it is not executed
07492                   // for a disabled or loading tab!
07493                   if ( ( $li.hasClass( "ui-tabs-selected" ) && !o.collapsible) ||
07494                         $li.hasClass( "ui-state-disabled" ) ||
07495                         $li.hasClass( "ui-state-processing" ) ||
07496                         self._trigger( "select", null, self._ui( this, $show[ 0 ] ) ) === false ) {
07497                         this.blur();
07498                         return false;
07499                   }
07500 
07501                   o.selected = self.anchors.index( this );
07502 
07503                   self.abort();
07504 
07505                   // if tab may be closed
07506                   if ( o.collapsible ) {
07507                         if ( $li.hasClass( "ui-tabs-selected" ) ) {
07508                               o.selected = -1;
07509 
07510                               if ( o.cookie ) {
07511                                     self._cookie( o.selected, o.cookie );
07512                               }
07513 
07514                               self.element.queue( "tabs", function() {
07515                                     hideTab( el, $hide );
07516                               }).dequeue( "tabs" );
07517 
07518                               this.blur();
07519                               return false;
07520                         } else if ( !$hide.length ) {
07521                               if ( o.cookie ) {
07522                                     self._cookie( o.selected, o.cookie );
07523                               }
07524 
07525                               self.element.queue( "tabs", function() {
07526                                     showTab( el, $show );
07527                               });
07528 
07529                               // TODO make passing in node possible, see also http://dev.jqueryui.com/ticket/3171
07530                               self.load( self.anchors.index( this ) );
07531 
07532                               this.blur();
07533                               return false;
07534                         }
07535                   }
07536 
07537                   if ( o.cookie ) {
07538                         self._cookie( o.selected, o.cookie );
07539                   }
07540 
07541                   // show new tab
07542                   if ( $show.length ) {
07543                         if ( $hide.length ) {
07544                               self.element.queue( "tabs", function() {
07545                                     hideTab( el, $hide );
07546                               });
07547                         }
07548                         self.element.queue( "tabs", function() {
07549                               showTab( el, $show );
07550                         });
07551 
07552                         self.load( self.anchors.index( this ) );
07553                   } else {
07554                         throw "jQuery UI Tabs: Mismatching fragment identifier.";
07555                   }
07556 
07557                   // Prevent IE from keeping other link focussed when using the back button
07558                   // and remove dotted border from clicked link. This is controlled via CSS
07559                   // in modern browsers; blur() removes focus from address bar in Firefox
07560                   // which can become a usability and annoying problem with tabs('rotate').
07561                   if ( $.browser.msie ) {
07562                         this.blur();
07563                   }
07564             });
07565 
07566             // disable click in any case
07567             this.anchors.bind( "click.tabs", function(){
07568                   return false;
07569             });
07570       },
07571 
07572     _getIndex: function( index ) {
07573             // meta-function to give users option to provide a href string instead of a numerical index.
07574             // also sanitizes numerical indexes to valid values.
07575             if ( typeof index == "string" ) {
07576                   index = this.anchors.index( this.anchors.filter( "[href$=" + index + "]" ) );
07577             }
07578 
07579             return index;
07580       },
07581 
07582       destroy: function() {
07583             var o = this.options;
07584 
07585             this.abort();
07586 
07587             this.element
07588                   .unbind( ".tabs" )
07589                   .removeClass( "ui-tabs ui-widget ui-widget-content ui-corner-all ui-tabs-collapsible" )
07590                   .removeData( "tabs" );
07591 
07592             this.list.removeClass( "ui-tabs-nav ui-helper-reset ui-helper-clearfix ui-widget-header ui-corner-all" );
07593 
07594             this.anchors.each(function() {
07595                   var href = $.data( this, "href.tabs" );
07596                   if ( href ) {
07597                         this.href = href;
07598                   }
07599                   var $this = $( this ).unbind( ".tabs" );
07600                   $.each( [ "href", "load", "cache" ], function( i, prefix ) {
07601                         $this.removeData( prefix + ".tabs" );
07602                   });
07603             });
07604 
07605             this.lis.unbind( ".tabs" ).add( this.panels ).each(function() {
07606                   if ( $.data( this, "destroy.tabs" ) ) {
07607                         $( this ).remove();
07608                   } else {
07609                         $( this ).removeClass([
07610                               "ui-state-default",
07611                               "ui-corner-top",
07612                               "ui-tabs-selected",
07613                               "ui-state-active",
07614                               "ui-state-hover",
07615                               "ui-state-focus",
07616                               "ui-state-disabled",
07617                               "ui-tabs-panel",
07618                               "ui-widget-content",
07619                               "ui-corner-bottom",
07620                               "ui-tabs-hide"
07621                         ].join( " " ) );
07622                   }
07623             });
07624 
07625             if ( o.cookie ) {
07626                   this._cookie( null, o.cookie );
07627             }
07628 
07629             return this;
07630       },
07631 
07632       add: function( url, label, index ) {
07633             if ( index === undefined ) {
07634                   index = this.anchors.length;
07635             }
07636 
07637             var self = this,
07638                   o = this.options,
07639                   $li = $( o.tabTemplate.replace( /#\{href\}/g, url ).replace( /#\{label\}/g, label ) ),
07640                   id = !url.indexOf( "#" ) ? url.replace( "#", "" ) : this._tabId( $( "a", $li )[ 0 ] );
07641 
07642             $li.addClass( "ui-state-default ui-corner-top" ).data( "destroy.tabs", true );
07643 
07644             // try to find an existing element before creating a new one
07645             var $panel = $( "#" + id );
07646             if ( !$panel.length ) {
07647                   $panel = $( o.panelTemplate )
07648                         .attr( "id", id )
07649                         .data( "destroy.tabs", true );
07650             }
07651             $panel.addClass( "ui-tabs-panel ui-widget-content ui-corner-bottom ui-tabs-hide" );
07652 
07653             if ( index >= this.lis.length ) {
07654                   $li.appendTo( this.list );
07655                   $panel.appendTo( this.list[ 0 ].parentNode );
07656             } else {
07657                   $li.insertBefore( this.lis[ index ] );
07658                   $panel.insertBefore( this.panels[ index ] );
07659             }
07660 
07661             o.disabled = $.map( o.disabled, function( n, i ) {
07662                   return n >= index ? ++n : n;
07663             });
07664 
07665             this._tabify();
07666 
07667             if ( this.anchors.length == 1 ) {
07668                   o.selected = 0;
07669                   $li.addClass( "ui-tabs-selected ui-state-active" );
07670                   $panel.removeClass( "ui-tabs-hide" );
07671                   this.element.queue( "tabs", function() {
07672                         self._trigger( "show", null, self._ui( self.anchors[ 0 ], self.panels[ 0 ] ) );
07673                   });
07674 
07675                   this.load( 0 );
07676             }
07677 
07678             this._trigger( "add", null, this._ui( this.anchors[ index ], this.panels[ index ] ) );
07679             return this;
07680       },
07681 
07682       remove: function( index ) {
07683             index = this._getIndex( index );
07684             var o = this.options,
07685                   $li = this.lis.eq( index ).remove(),
07686                   $panel = this.panels.eq( index ).remove();
07687 
07688             // If selected tab was removed focus tab to the right or
07689             // in case the last tab was removed the tab to the left.
07690             if ( $li.hasClass( "ui-tabs-selected" ) && this.anchors.length > 1) {
07691                   this.select( index + ( index + 1 < this.anchors.length ? 1 : -1 ) );
07692             }
07693 
07694             o.disabled = $.map(
07695                   $.grep( o.disabled, function(n, i) {
07696                         return n != index;
07697                   }),
07698                   function( n, i ) {
07699                         return n >= index ? --n : n;
07700                   });
07701 
07702             this._tabify();
07703 
07704             this._trigger( "remove", null, this._ui( $li.find( "a" )[ 0 ], $panel[ 0 ] ) );
07705             return this;
07706       },
07707 
07708       enable: function( index ) {
07709             index = this._getIndex( index );
07710             var o = this.options;
07711             if ( $.inArray( index, o.disabled ) == -1 ) {
07712                   return;
07713             }
07714 
07715             this.lis.eq( index ).removeClass( "ui-state-disabled" );
07716             o.disabled = $.grep( o.disabled, function( n, i ) {
07717                   return n != index;
07718             });
07719 
07720             this._trigger( "enable", null, this._ui( this.anchors[ index ], this.panels[ index ] ) );
07721             return this;
07722       },
07723 
07724       disable: function( index ) {
07725             index = this._getIndex( index );
07726             var self = this, o = this.options;
07727             // cannot disable already selected tab
07728             if ( index != o.selected ) {
07729                   this.lis.eq( index ).addClass( "ui-state-disabled" );
07730 
07731                   o.disabled.push( index );
07732                   o.disabled.sort();
07733 
07734                   this._trigger( "disable", null, this._ui( this.anchors[ index ], this.panels[ index ] ) );
07735             }
07736 
07737             return this;
07738       },
07739 
07740       select: function( index ) {
07741             index = this._getIndex( index );
07742             if ( index == -1 ) {
07743                   if ( this.options.collapsible && this.options.selected != -1 ) {
07744                         index = this.options.selected;
07745                   } else {
07746                         return this;
07747                   }
07748             }
07749             this.anchors.eq( index ).trigger( this.options.event + ".tabs" );
07750             return this;
07751       },
07752 
07753       load: function( indexÂ ) {
07754             index = this._getIndex( index );
07755             var self = this,
07756                   o = this.options,
07757                   a = this.anchors.eq( index )[ 0 ],
07758                   url = $.data( a, "load.tabs" );
07759 
07760             this.abort();
07761 
07762             // not remote or from cache
07763             if ( !url || this.element.queue( "tabs" ).length !== 0 && $.data( a, "cache.tabs" ) ) {
07764                   this.element.dequeue( "tabs" );
07765                   return;
07766             }
07767 
07768             // load remote from here on
07769             this.lis.eq( index ).addClass( "ui-state-processing" );
07770 
07771             if ( o.spinner ) {
07772                   var span = $( "span", a );
07773                   span.data( "label.tabs", span.html() ).html( o.spinner );
07774             }
07775 
07776             this.xhr = $.ajax( $.extend( {}, o.ajaxOptions, {
07777                   url: url,
07778                   success: function( r, s ) {
07779                         $( self._sanitizeSelector( a.hash ) ).html( r );
07780 
07781                         // take care of tab labels
07782                         self._cleanup();
07783 
07784                         if ( o.cache ) {
07785                               $.data( a, "cache.tabs", true );
07786                         }
07787 
07788                         self._trigger( "load", null, self._ui( self.anchors[ index ], self.panels[ index ] ) );
07789                         try {
07790                               o.ajaxOptions.success( r, s );
07791                         }
07792                         catch ( e ) {}
07793                   },
07794                   error: function( xhr, s, e ) {
07795                         // take care of tab labels
07796                         self._cleanup();
07797 
07798                         self._trigger( "load", null, self._ui( self.anchors[ index ], self.panels[ index ] ) );
07799                         try {
07800                               // Passing index avoid a race condition when this method is
07801                               // called after the user has selected another tab.
07802                               // Pass the anchor that initiated this request allows
07803                               // loadError to manipulate the tab content panel via $(a.hash)
07804                               o.ajaxOptions.error( xhr, s, index, a );
07805                         }
07806                         catch ( e ) {}
07807                   }
07808             } ) );
07809 
07810             // last, so that load event is fired before show...
07811             self.element.dequeue( "tabs" );
07812 
07813             return this;
07814       },
07815 
07816       abort: function() {
07817             // stop possibly running animations
07818             this.element.queue( [] );
07819             this.panels.stop( false, true );
07820 
07821             // "tabs" queue must not contain more than two elements,
07822             // which are the callbacks for the latest clicked tab...
07823             this.element.queue( "tabs", this.element.queue( "tabs" ).splice( -2, 2 ) );
07824 
07825             // terminate pending requests from other tabs
07826             if ( this.xhr ) {
07827                   this.xhr.abort();
07828                   delete this.xhr;
07829             }
07830 
07831             // take care of tab labels
07832             this._cleanup();
07833             return this;
07834       },
07835 
07836       url: function( index, url ) {
07837             this.anchors.eq( index ).removeData( "cache.tabs" ).data( "load.tabs", url );
07838             return this;
07839       },
07840 
07841       length: function() {
07842             return this.anchors.length;
07843       }
07844 });
07845 
07846 $.extend( $.ui.tabs, {
07847       version: "1.8.4"
07848 });
07849 
07850 /*
07851  * Tabs Extensions
07852  */
07853 
07854 /*
07855  * Rotate
07856  */
07857 $.extend( $.ui.tabs.prototype, {
07858       rotation: null,
07859       rotate: function( ms, continuing ) {
07860             var self = this,
07861                   o = this.options;
07862 
07863             var rotate = self._rotate || ( self._rotate = function( e ) {
07864                   clearTimeout( self.rotation );
07865                   self.rotation = setTimeout(function() {
07866                         var t = o.selected;
07867                         self.select( ++t < self.anchors.length ? t : 0 );
07868                   }, ms );
07869                   
07870                   if ( e ) {
07871                         e.stopPropagation();
07872                   }
07873             });
07874 
07875             var stop = self._unrotate || ( self._unrotate = !continuing
07876                   ? function(e) {
07877                         if (e.clientX) { // in case of a true click
07878                               self.rotate(null);
07879                         }
07880                   }
07881                   : function( e ) {
07882                         t = o.selected;
07883                         rotate();
07884                   });
07885 
07886             // start rotation
07887             if ( ms ) {
07888                   this.element.bind( "tabsshow", rotate );
07889                   this.anchors.bind( o.event + ".tabs", stop );
07890                   rotate();
07891             // stop rotation
07892             } else {
07893                   clearTimeout( self.rotation );
07894                   this.element.unbind( "tabsshow", rotate );
07895                   this.anchors.unbind( o.event + ".tabs", stop );
07896                   delete this._rotate;
07897                   delete this._unrotate;
07898             }
07899 
07900             return this;
07901       }
07902 });
07903 
07904 })( jQuery );
07905 /*
07906  * jQuery UI Datepicker 1.8.4
07907  *
07908  * Copyright 2010, AUTHORS.txt (http://jqueryui.com/about)
07909  * Dual licensed under the MIT or GPL Version 2 licenses.
07910  * http://jquery.org/license
07911  *
07912  * http://docs.jquery.com/UI/Datepicker
07913  *
07914  * Depends:
07915  *    jquery.ui.core.js
07916  */
07917 (function( $, undefined ) {
07918 
07919 $.extend($.ui, { datepicker: { version: "1.8.4" } });
07920 
07921 var PROP_NAME = 'datepicker';
07922 var dpuuid = new Date().getTime();
07923 
07924 /* Date picker manager.
07925    Use the singleton instance of this class, $.datepicker, to interact with the date picker.
07926    Settings for (groups of) date pickers are maintained in an instance object,
07927    allowing multiple different settings on the same page. */
07928 
07929 function Datepicker() {
07930       this.debug = false; // Change this to true to start debugging
07931       this._curInst = null; // The current instance in use
07932       this._keyEvent = false; // If the last event was a key event
07933       this._disabledInputs = []; // List of date picker inputs that have been disabled
07934       this._datepickerShowing = false; // True if the popup picker is showing , false if not
07935       this._inDialog = false; // True if showing within a "dialog", false if not
07936       this._mainDivId = 'ui-datepicker-div'; // The ID of the main datepicker division
07937       this._inlineClass = 'ui-datepicker-inline'; // The name of the inline marker class
07938       this._appendClass = 'ui-datepicker-append'; // The name of the append marker class
07939       this._triggerClass = 'ui-datepicker-trigger'; // The name of the trigger marker class
07940       this._dialogClass = 'ui-datepicker-dialog'; // The name of the dialog marker class
07941       this._disableClass = 'ui-datepicker-disabled'; // The name of the disabled covering marker class
07942       this._unselectableClass = 'ui-datepicker-unselectable'; // The name of the unselectable cell marker class
07943       this._currentClass = 'ui-datepicker-current-day'; // The name of the current day marker class
07944       this._dayOverClass = 'ui-datepicker-days-cell-over'; // The name of the day hover marker class
07945       this.regional = []; // Available regional settings, indexed by language code
07946       this.regional[''] = { // Default regional settings
07947             closeText: 'Done', // Display text for close link
07948             prevText: 'Prev', // Display text for previous month link
07949             nextText: 'Next', // Display text for next month link
07950             currentText: 'Today', // Display text for current month link
07951             monthNames: ['January','February','March','April','May','June',
07952                   'July','August','September','October','November','December'], // Names of months for drop-down and formatting
07953             monthNamesShort: ['Jan', 'Feb', 'Mar', 'Apr', 'May', 'Jun', 'Jul', 'Aug', 'Sep', 'Oct', 'Nov', 'Dec'], // For formatting
07954             dayNames: ['Sunday', 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday'], // For formatting
07955             dayNamesShort: ['Sun', 'Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri', 'Sat'], // For formatting
07956             dayNamesMin: ['Su','Mo','Tu','We','Th','Fr','Sa'], // Column headings for days starting at Sunday
07957             weekHeader: 'Wk', // Column header for week of the year
07958             dateFormat: 'mm/dd/yy', // See format options on parseDate
07959             firstDay: 0, // The first day of the week, Sun = 0, Mon = 1, ...
07960             isRTL: false, // True if right-to-left language, false if left-to-right
07961             showMonthAfterYear: false, // True if the year select precedes month, false for month then year
07962             yearSuffix: '' // Additional text to append to the year in the month headers
07963       };
07964       this._defaults = { // Global defaults for all the date picker instances
07965             showOn: 'focus', // 'focus' for popup on focus,
07966                   // 'button' for trigger button, or 'both' for either
07967             showAnim: 'fadeIn', // Name of jQuery animation for popup
07968             showOptions: {}, // Options for enhanced animations
07969             defaultDate: null, // Used when field is blank: actual date,
07970                   // +/-number for offset from today, null for today
07971             appendText: '', // Display text following the input box, e.g. showing the format
07972             buttonText: '...', // Text for trigger button
07973             buttonImage: '', // URL for trigger button image
07974             buttonImageOnly: false, // True if the image appears alone, false if it appears on a button
07975             hideIfNoPrevNext: false, // True to hide next/previous month links
07976                   // if not applicable, false to just disable them
07977             navigationAsDateFormat: false, // True if date formatting applied to prev/today/next links
07978             gotoCurrent: false, // True if today link goes back to current selection instead
07979             changeMonth: false, // True if month can be selected directly, false if only prev/next
07980             changeYear: false, // True if year can be selected directly, false if only prev/next
07981             yearRange: 'c-10:c+10', // Range of years to display in drop-down,
07982                   // either relative to today's year (-nn:+nn), relative to currently displayed year
07983                   // (c-nn:c+nn), absolute (nnnn:nnnn), or a combination of the above (nnnn:-n)
07984             showOtherMonths: false, // True to show dates in other months, false to leave blank
07985             selectOtherMonths: false, // True to allow selection of dates in other months, false for unselectable
07986             showWeek: false, // True to show week of the year, false to not show it
07987             calculateWeek: this.iso8601Week, // How to calculate the week of the year,
07988                   // takes a Date and returns the number of the week for it
07989             shortYearCutoff: '+10', // Short year values < this are in the current century,
07990                   // > this are in the previous century,
07991                   // string value starting with '+' for current year + value
07992             minDate: null, // The earliest selectable date, or null for no limit
07993             maxDate: null, // The latest selectable date, or null for no limit
07994             duration: 'fast', // Duration of display/closure
07995             beforeShowDay: null, // Function that takes a date and returns an array with
07996                   // [0] = true if selectable, false if not, [1] = custom CSS class name(s) or '',
07997                   // [2] = cell title (optional), e.g. $.datepicker.noWeekends
07998             beforeShow: null, // Function that takes an input field and
07999                   // returns a set of custom settings for the date picker
08000             onSelect: null, // Define a callback function when a date is selected
08001             onChangeMonthYear: null, // Define a callback function when the month or year is changed
08002             onClose: null, // Define a callback function when the datepicker is closed
08003             numberOfMonths: 1, // Number of months to show at a time
08004             showCurrentAtPos: 0, // The position in multipe months at which to show the current month (starting at 0)
08005             stepMonths: 1, // Number of months to step back/forward
08006             stepBigMonths: 12, // Number of months to step back/forward for the big links
08007             altField: '', // Selector for an alternate field to store selected dates into
08008             altFormat: '', // The date format to use for the alternate field
08009             constrainInput: true, // The input is constrained by the current date format
08010             showButtonPanel: false, // True to show button panel, false to not show it
08011             autoSize: false // True to size the input for the date format, false to leave as is
08012       };
08013       $.extend(this._defaults, this.regional['']);
08014       this.dpDiv = $('<div id="' + this._mainDivId + '" class="ui-datepicker ui-widget ui-widget-content ui-helper-clearfix ui-corner-all ui-helper-hidden-accessible"></div>');
08015 }
08016 
08017 $.extend(Datepicker.prototype, {
08018       /* Class name added to elements to indicate already configured with a date picker. */
08019       markerClassName: 'hasDatepicker',
08020 
08021       /* Debug logging (if enabled). */
08022       log: function () {
08023             if (this.debug)
08024                   console.log.apply('', arguments);
08025       },
08026       
08027       // TODO rename to "widget" when switching to widget factory
08028       _widgetDatepicker: function() {
08029             return this.dpDiv;
08030       },
08031 
08032       /* Override the default settings for all instances of the date picker.
08033          @param  settings  object - the new settings to use as defaults (anonymous object)
08034          @return the manager object */
08035       setDefaults: function(settings) {
08036             extendRemove(this._defaults, settings || {});
08037             return this;
08038       },
08039 
08040       /* Attach the date picker to a jQuery selection.
08041          @param  target    element - the target input field or division or span
08042          @param  settings  object - the new settings to use for this date picker instance (anonymous) */
08043       _attachDatepicker: function(target, settings) {
08044             // check for settings on the control itself - in namespace 'date:'
08045             var inlineSettings = null;
08046             for (var attrName in this._defaults) {
08047                   var attrValue = target.getAttribute('date:' + attrName);
08048                   if (attrValue) {
08049                         inlineSettings = inlineSettings || {};
08050                         try {
08051                               inlineSettings[attrName] = eval(attrValue);
08052                         } catch (err) {
08053                               inlineSettings[attrName] = attrValue;
08054                         }
08055                   }
08056             }
08057             var nodeName = target.nodeName.toLowerCase();
08058             var inline = (nodeName == 'div' || nodeName == 'span');
08059             if (!target.id) {
08060                   this.uuid += 1;
08061                   target.id = 'dp' + this.uuid;
08062             }
08063             var inst = this._newInst($(target), inline);
08064             inst.settings = $.extend({}, settings || {}, inlineSettings || {});
08065             if (nodeName == 'input') {
08066                   this._connectDatepicker(target, inst);
08067             } else if (inline) {
08068                   this._inlineDatepicker(target, inst);
08069             }
08070       },
08071 
08072       /* Create a new instance object. */
08073       _newInst: function(target, inline) {
08074             var id = target[0].id.replace(/([^A-Za-z0-9_])/g, '\\\\$1'); // escape jQuery meta chars
08075             return {id: id, input: target, // associated target
08076                   selectedDay: 0, selectedMonth: 0, selectedYear: 0, // current selection
08077                   drawMonth: 0, drawYear: 0, // month being drawn
08078                   inline: inline, // is datepicker inline or not
08079                   dpDiv: (!inline ? this.dpDiv : // presentation div
08080                   $('<div class="' + this._inlineClass + ' ui-datepicker ui-widget ui-widget-content ui-helper-clearfix ui-corner-all"></div>'))};
08081       },
08082 
08083       /* Attach the date picker to an input field. */
08084       _connectDatepicker: function(target, inst) {
08085             var input = $(target);
08086             inst.append = $([]);
08087             inst.trigger = $([]);
08088             if (input.hasClass(this.markerClassName))
08089                   return;
08090             this._attachments(input, inst);
08091             input.addClass(this.markerClassName).keydown(this._doKeyDown).
08092                   keypress(this._doKeyPress).keyup(this._doKeyUp).
08093                   bind("setData.datepicker", function(event, key, value) {
08094                         inst.settings[key] = value;
08095                   }).bind("getData.datepicker", function(event, key) {
08096                         return this._get(inst, key);
08097                   });
08098             this._autoSize(inst);
08099             $.data(target, PROP_NAME, inst);
08100       },
08101 
08102       /* Make attachments based on settings. */
08103       _attachments: function(input, inst) {
08104             var appendText = this._get(inst, 'appendText');
08105             var isRTL = this._get(inst, 'isRTL');
08106             if (inst.append)
08107                   inst.append.remove();
08108             if (appendText) {
08109                   inst.append = $('<span class="' + this._appendClass + '">' + appendText + '</span>');
08110                   input[isRTL ? 'before' : 'after'](inst.append);
08111             }
08112             input.unbind('focus', this._showDatepicker);
08113             if (inst.trigger)
08114                   inst.trigger.remove();
08115             var showOn = this._get(inst, 'showOn');
08116             if (showOn == 'focus' || showOn == 'both') // pop-up date picker when in the marked field
08117                   input.focus(this._showDatepicker);
08118             if (showOn == 'button' || showOn == 'both') { // pop-up date picker when button clicked
08119                   var buttonText = this._get(inst, 'buttonText');
08120                   var buttonImage = this._get(inst, 'buttonImage');
08121                   inst.trigger = $(this._get(inst, 'buttonImageOnly') ?
08122                         $('<img/>').addClass(this._triggerClass).
08123                               attr({ src: buttonImage, alt: buttonText, title: buttonText }) :
08124                         $('<button type="button"></button>').addClass(this._triggerClass).
08125                               html(buttonImage == '' ? buttonText : $('<img/>').attr(
08126                               { src:buttonImage, alt:buttonText, title:buttonText })));
08127                   input[isRTL ? 'before' : 'after'](inst.trigger);
08128                   inst.trigger.click(function() {
08129                         if ($.datepicker._datepickerShowing && $.datepicker._lastInput == input[0])
08130                               $.datepicker._hideDatepicker();
08131                         else
08132                               $.datepicker._showDatepicker(input[0]);
08133                         return false;
08134                   });
08135             }
08136       },
08137 
08138       /* Apply the maximum length for the date format. */
08139       _autoSize: function(inst) {
08140             if (this._get(inst, 'autoSize') && !inst.inline) {
08141                   var date = new Date(2009, 12 - 1, 20); // Ensure double digits
08142                   var dateFormat = this._get(inst, 'dateFormat');
08143                   if (dateFormat.match(/[DM]/)) {
08144                         var findMax = function(names) {
08145                               var max = 0;
08146                               var maxI = 0;
08147                               for (var i = 0; i < names.length; i++) {
08148                                     if (names[i].length > max) {
08149                                           max = names[i].length;
08150                                           maxI = i;
08151                                     }
08152                               }
08153                               return maxI;
08154                         };
08155                         date.setMonth(findMax(this._get(inst, (dateFormat.match(/MM/) ?
08156                               'monthNames' : 'monthNamesShort'))));
08157                         date.setDate(findMax(this._get(inst, (dateFormat.match(/DD/) ?
08158                               'dayNames' : 'dayNamesShort'))) + 20 - date.getDay());
08159                   }
08160                   inst.input.attr('size', this._formatDate(inst, date).length);
08161             }
08162       },
08163 
08164       /* Attach an inline date picker to a div. */
08165       _inlineDatepicker: function(target, inst) {
08166             var divSpan = $(target);
08167             if (divSpan.hasClass(this.markerClassName))
08168                   return;
08169             divSpan.addClass(this.markerClassName).append(inst.dpDiv).
08170                   bind("setData.datepicker", function(event, key, value){
08171                         inst.settings[key] = value;
08172                   }).bind("getData.datepicker", function(event, key){
08173                         return this._get(inst, key);
08174                   });
08175             $.data(target, PROP_NAME, inst);
08176             this._setDate(inst, this._getDefaultDate(inst), true);
08177             this._updateDatepicker(inst);
08178             this._updateAlternate(inst);
08179       },
08180 
08181       /* Pop-up the date picker in a "dialog" box.
08182          @param  input     element - ignored
08183          @param  date      string or Date - the initial date to display
08184          @param  onSelect  function - the function to call when a date is selected
08185          @param  settings  object - update the dialog date picker instance's settings (anonymous object)
08186          @param  pos       int[2] - coordinates for the dialog's position within the screen or
08187                            event - with x/y coordinates or
08188                            leave empty for default (screen centre)
08189          @return the manager object */
08190       _dialogDatepicker: function(input, date, onSelect, settings, pos) {
08191             var inst = this._dialogInst; // internal instance
08192             if (!inst) {
08193                   this.uuid += 1;
08194                   var id = 'dp' + this.uuid;
08195                   this._dialogInput = $('<input type="text" id="' + id +
08196                         '" style="position: absolute; top: -100px; width: 0px; z-index: -10;"/>');
08197                   this._dialogInput.keydown(this._doKeyDown);
08198                   $('body').append(this._dialogInput);
08199                   inst = this._dialogInst = this._newInst(this._dialogInput, false);
08200                   inst.settings = {};
08201                   $.data(this._dialogInput[0], PROP_NAME, inst);
08202             }
08203             extendRemove(inst.settings, settings || {});
08204             date = (date && date.constructor == Date ? this._formatDate(inst, date) : date);
08205             this._dialogInput.val(date);
08206 
08207             this._pos = (pos ? (pos.length ? pos : [pos.pageX, pos.pageY]) : null);
08208             if (!this._pos) {
08209                   var browserWidth = document.documentElement.clientWidth;
08210                   var browserHeight = document.documentElement.clientHeight;
08211                   var scrollX = document.documentElement.scrollLeft || document.body.scrollLeft;
08212                   var scrollY = document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop;
08213                   this._pos = // should use actual width/height below
08214                         [(browserWidth / 2) - 100 + scrollX, (browserHeight / 2) - 150 + scrollY];
08215             }
08216 
08217             // move input on screen for focus, but hidden behind dialog
08218             this._dialogInput.css('left', (this._pos[0] + 20) + 'px').css('top', this._pos[1] + 'px');
08219             inst.settings.onSelect = onSelect;
08220             this._inDialog = true;
08221             this.dpDiv.addClass(this._dialogClass);
08222             this._showDatepicker(this._dialogInput[0]);
08223             if ($.blockUI)
08224                   $.blockUI(this.dpDiv);
08225             $.data(this._dialogInput[0], PROP_NAME, inst);
08226             return this;
08227       },
08228 
08229       /* Detach a datepicker from its control.
08230          @param  target    element - the target input field or division or span */
08231       _destroyDatepicker: function(target) {
08232             var $target = $(target);
08233             var inst = $.data(target, PROP_NAME);
08234             if (!$target.hasClass(this.markerClassName)) {
08235                   return;
08236             }
08237             var nodeName = target.nodeName.toLowerCase();
08238             $.removeData(target, PROP_NAME);
08239             if (nodeName == 'input') {
08240                   inst.append.remove();
08241                   inst.trigger.remove();
08242                   $target.removeClass(this.markerClassName).
08243                         unbind('focus', this._showDatepicker).
08244                         unbind('keydown', this._doKeyDown).
08245                         unbind('keypress', this._doKeyPress).
08246                         unbind('keyup', this._doKeyUp);
08247             } else if (nodeName == 'div' || nodeName == 'span')
08248                   $target.removeClass(this.markerClassName).empty();
08249       },
08250 
08251       /* Enable the date picker to a jQuery selection.
08252          @param  target    element - the target input field or division or span */
08253       _enableDatepicker: function(target) {
08254             var $target = $(target);
08255             var inst = $.data(target, PROP_NAME);
08256             if (!$target.hasClass(this.markerClassName)) {
08257                   return;
08258             }
08259             var nodeName = target.nodeName.toLowerCase();
08260             if (nodeName == 'input') {
08261                   target.disabled = false;
08262                   inst.trigger.filter('button').
08263                         each(function() { this.disabled = false; }).end().
08264                         filter('img').css({opacity: '1.0', cursor: ''});
08265             }
08266             else if (nodeName == 'div' || nodeName == 'span') {
08267                   var inline = $target.children('.' + this._inlineClass);
08268                   inline.children().removeClass('ui-state-disabled');
08269             }
08270             this._disabledInputs = $.map(this._disabledInputs,
08271                   function(value) { return (value == target ? null : value); }); // delete entry
08272       },
08273 
08274       /* Disable the date picker to a jQuery selection.
08275          @param  target    element - the target input field or division or span */
08276       _disableDatepicker: function(target) {
08277             var $target = $(target);
08278             var inst = $.data(target, PROP_NAME);
08279             if (!$target.hasClass(this.markerClassName)) {
08280                   return;
08281             }
08282             var nodeName = target.nodeName.toLowerCase();
08283             if (nodeName == 'input') {
08284                   target.disabled = true;
08285                   inst.trigger.filter('button').
08286                         each(function() { this.disabled = true; }).end().
08287                         filter('img').css({opacity: '0.5', cursor: 'default'});
08288             }
08289             else if (nodeName == 'div' || nodeName == 'span') {
08290                   var inline = $target.children('.' + this._inlineClass);
08291                   inline.children().addClass('ui-state-disabled');
08292             }
08293             this._disabledInputs = $.map(this._disabledInputs,
08294                   function(value) { return (value == target ? null : value); }); // delete entry
08295             this._disabledInputs[this._disabledInputs.length] = target;
08296       },
08297 
08298       /* Is the first field in a jQuery collection disabled as a datepicker?
08299          @param  target    element - the target input field or division or span
08300          @return boolean - true if disabled, false if enabled */
08301       _isDisabledDatepicker: function(target) {
08302             if (!target) {
08303                   return false;
08304             }
08305             for (var i = 0; i < this._disabledInputs.length; i++) {
08306                   if (this._disabledInputs[i] == target)
08307                         return true;
08308             }
08309             return false;
08310       },
08311 
08312       /* Retrieve the instance data for the target control.
08313          @param  target  element - the target input field or division or span
08314          @return  object - the associated instance data
08315          @throws  error if a jQuery problem getting data */
08316       _getInst: function(target) {
08317             try {
08318                   return $.data(target, PROP_NAME);
08319             }
08320             catch (err) {
08321                   throw 'Missing instance data for this datepicker';
08322             }
08323       },
08324 
08325       /* Update or retrieve the settings for a date picker attached to an input field or division.
08326          @param  target  element - the target input field or division or span
08327          @param  name    object - the new settings to update or
08328                          string - the name of the setting to change or retrieve,
08329                          when retrieving also 'all' for all instance settings or
