08330                          'defaults' for all global defaults
08331          @param  value   any - the new value for the setting
08332                          (omit if above is an object or to retrieve a value) */
08333       _optionDatepicker: function(target, name, value) {
08334             var inst = this._getInst(target);
08335             if (arguments.length == 2 && typeof name == 'string') {
08336                   return (name == 'defaults' ? $.extend({}, $.datepicker._defaults) :
08337                         (inst ? (name == 'all' ? $.extend({}, inst.settings) :
08338                         this._get(inst, name)) : null));
08339             }
08340             var settings = name || {};
08341             if (typeof name == 'string') {
08342                   settings = {};
08343                   settings[name] = value;
08344             }
08345             if (inst) {
08346                   if (this._curInst == inst) {
08347                         this._hideDatepicker();
08348                   }
08349                   var date = this._getDateDatepicker(target, true);
08350                   extendRemove(inst.settings, settings);
08351                   this._attachments($(target), inst);
08352                   this._autoSize(inst);
08353                   this._setDateDatepicker(target, date);
08354                   this._updateDatepicker(inst);
08355             }
08356       },
08357 
08358       // change method deprecated
08359       _changeDatepicker: function(target, name, value) {
08360             this._optionDatepicker(target, name, value);
08361       },
08362 
08363       /* Redraw the date picker attached to an input field or division.
08364          @param  target  element - the target input field or division or span */
08365       _refreshDatepicker: function(target) {
08366             var inst = this._getInst(target);
08367             if (inst) {
08368                   this._updateDatepicker(inst);
08369             }
08370       },
08371 
08372       /* Set the dates for a jQuery selection.
08373          @param  target   element - the target input field or division or span
08374          @param  date     Date - the new date */
08375       _setDateDatepicker: function(target, date) {
08376             var inst = this._getInst(target);
08377             if (inst) {
08378                   this._setDate(inst, date);
08379                   this._updateDatepicker(inst);
08380                   this._updateAlternate(inst);
08381             }
08382       },
08383 
08384       /* Get the date(s) for the first entry in a jQuery selection.
08385          @param  target     element - the target input field or division or span
08386          @param  noDefault  boolean - true if no default date is to be used
08387          @return Date - the current date */
08388       _getDateDatepicker: function(target, noDefault) {
08389             var inst = this._getInst(target);
08390             if (inst && !inst.inline)
08391                   this._setDateFromField(inst, noDefault);
08392             return (inst ? this._getDate(inst) : null);
08393       },
08394 
08395       /* Handle keystrokes. */
08396       _doKeyDown: function(event) {
08397             var inst = $.datepicker._getInst(event.target);
08398             var handled = true;
08399             var isRTL = inst.dpDiv.is('.ui-datepicker-rtl');
08400             inst._keyEvent = true;
08401             if ($.datepicker._datepickerShowing)
08402                   switch (event.keyCode) {
08403                         case 9: $.datepicker._hideDatepicker();
08404                                     handled = false;
08405                                     break; // hide on tab out
08406                         case 13: var sel = $('td.' + $.datepicker._dayOverClass, inst.dpDiv).
08407                                           add($('td.' + $.datepicker._currentClass, inst.dpDiv));
08408                                     if (sel[0])
08409                                           $.datepicker._selectDay(event.target, inst.selectedMonth, inst.selectedYear, sel[0]);
08410                                     else
08411                                           $.datepicker._hideDatepicker();
08412                                     return false; // don't submit the form
08413                                     break; // select the value on enter
08414                         case 27: $.datepicker._hideDatepicker();
08415                                     break; // hide on escape
08416                         case 33: $.datepicker._adjustDate(event.target, (event.ctrlKey ?
08417                                           -$.datepicker._get(inst, 'stepBigMonths') :
08418                                           -$.datepicker._get(inst, 'stepMonths')), 'M');
08419                                     break; // previous month/year on page up/+ ctrl
08420                         case 34: $.datepicker._adjustDate(event.target, (event.ctrlKey ?
08421                                           +$.datepicker._get(inst, 'stepBigMonths') :
08422                                           +$.datepicker._get(inst, 'stepMonths')), 'M');
08423                                     break; // next month/year on page down/+ ctrl
08424                         case 35: if (event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey) $.datepicker._clearDate(event.target);
08425                                     handled = event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey;
08426                                     break; // clear on ctrl or command +end
08427                         case 36: if (event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey) $.datepicker._gotoToday(event.target);
08428                                     handled = event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey;
08429                                     break; // current on ctrl or command +home
08430                         case 37: if (event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey) $.datepicker._adjustDate(event.target, (isRTL ? +1 : -1), 'D');
08431                                     handled = event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey;
08432                                     // -1 day on ctrl or command +left
08433                                     if (event.originalEvent.altKey) $.datepicker._adjustDate(event.target, (event.ctrlKey ?
08434                                                       -$.datepicker._get(inst, 'stepBigMonths') :
08435                                                       -$.datepicker._get(inst, 'stepMonths')), 'M');
08436                                     // next month/year on alt +left on Mac
08437                                     break;
08438                         case 38: if (event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey) $.datepicker._adjustDate(event.target, -7, 'D');
08439                                     handled = event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey;
08440                                     break; // -1 week on ctrl or command +up
08441                         case 39: if (event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey) $.datepicker._adjustDate(event.target, (isRTL ? -1 : +1), 'D');
08442                                     handled = event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey;
08443                                     // +1 day on ctrl or command +right
08444                                     if (event.originalEvent.altKey) $.datepicker._adjustDate(event.target, (event.ctrlKey ?
08445                                                       +$.datepicker._get(inst, 'stepBigMonths') :
08446                                                       +$.datepicker._get(inst, 'stepMonths')), 'M');
08447                                     // next month/year on alt +right
08448                                     break;
08449                         case 40: if (event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey) $.datepicker._adjustDate(event.target, +7, 'D');
08450                                     handled = event.ctrlKey || event.metaKey;
08451                                     break; // +1 week on ctrl or command +down
08452                         default: handled = false;
08453                   }
08454             else if (event.keyCode == 36 && event.ctrlKey) // display the date picker on ctrl+home
08455                   $.datepicker._showDatepicker(this);
08456             else {
08457                   handled = false;
08458             }
08459             if (handled) {
08460                   event.preventDefault();
08461                   event.stopPropagation();
08462             }
08463       },
08464 
08465       /* Filter entered characters - based on date format. */
08466       _doKeyPress: function(event) {
08467             var inst = $.datepicker._getInst(event.target);
08468             if ($.datepicker._get(inst, 'constrainInput')) {
08469                   var chars = $.datepicker._possibleChars($.datepicker._get(inst, 'dateFormat'));
08470                   var chr = String.fromCharCode(event.charCode == undefined ? event.keyCode : event.charCode);
08471                   return event.ctrlKey || (chr < ' ' || !chars || chars.indexOf(chr) > -1);
08472             }
08473       },
08474 
08475       /* Synchronise manual entry and field/alternate field. */
08476       _doKeyUp: function(event) {
08477             var inst = $.datepicker._getInst(event.target);
08478             if (inst.input.val() != inst.lastVal) {
08479                   try {
08480                         var date = $.datepicker.parseDate($.datepicker._get(inst, 'dateFormat'),
08481                               (inst.input ? inst.input.val() : null),
08482                               $.datepicker._getFormatConfig(inst));
08483                         if (date) { // only if valid
08484                               $.datepicker._setDateFromField(inst);
08485                               $.datepicker._updateAlternate(inst);
08486                               $.datepicker._updateDatepicker(inst);
08487                         }
08488                   }
08489                   catch (event) {
08490                         $.datepicker.log(event);
08491                   }
08492             }
08493             return true;
08494       },
08495 
08496       /* Pop-up the date picker for a given input field.
08497          @param  input  element - the input field attached to the date picker or
08498                         event - if triggered by focus */
08499       _showDatepicker: function(input) {
08500             input = input.target || input;
08501             if (input.nodeName.toLowerCase() != 'input') // find from button/image trigger
08502                   input = $('input', input.parentNode)[0];
08503             if ($.datepicker._isDisabledDatepicker(input) || $.datepicker._lastInput == input) // already here
08504                   return;
08505             var inst = $.datepicker._getInst(input);
08506             if ($.datepicker._curInst && $.datepicker._curInst != inst) {
08507                   $.datepicker._curInst.dpDiv.stop(true, true);
08508             }
08509             var beforeShow = $.datepicker._get(inst, 'beforeShow');
08510             extendRemove(inst.settings, (beforeShow ? beforeShow.apply(input, [input, inst]) : {}));
08511             inst.lastVal = null;
08512             $.datepicker._lastInput = input;
08513             $.datepicker._setDateFromField(inst);
08514             if ($.datepicker._inDialog) // hide cursor
08515                   input.value = '';
08516             if (!$.datepicker._pos) { // position below input
08517                   $.datepicker._pos = $.datepicker._findPos(input);
08518                   $.datepicker._pos[1] += input.offsetHeight; // add the height
08519             }
08520             var isFixed = false;
08521             $(input).parents().each(function() {
08522                   isFixed |= $(this).css('position') == 'fixed';
08523                   return !isFixed;
08524             });
08525             if (isFixed && $.browser.opera) { // correction for Opera when fixed and scrolled
08526                   $.datepicker._pos[0] -= document.documentElement.scrollLeft;
08527                   $.datepicker._pos[1] -= document.documentElement.scrollTop;
08528             }
08529             var offset = {left: $.datepicker._pos[0], top: $.datepicker._pos[1]};
08530             $.datepicker._pos = null;
08531             // determine sizing offscreen
08532             inst.dpDiv.css({position: 'absolute', display: 'block', top: '-1000px'});
08533             $.datepicker._updateDatepicker(inst);
08534             // fix width for dynamic number of date pickers
08535             // and adjust position before showing
08536             offset = $.datepicker._checkOffset(inst, offset, isFixed);
08537             inst.dpDiv.css({position: ($.datepicker._inDialog && $.blockUI ?
08538                   'static' : (isFixed ? 'fixed' : 'absolute')), display: 'none',
08539                   left: offset.left + 'px', top: offset.top + 'px'});
08540             if (!inst.inline) {
08541                   var showAnim = $.datepicker._get(inst, 'showAnim');
08542                   var duration = $.datepicker._get(inst, 'duration');
08543                   var postProcess = function() {
08544                         $.datepicker._datepickerShowing = true;
08545                         var borders = $.datepicker._getBorders(inst.dpDiv);
08546                         inst.dpDiv.find('iframe.ui-datepicker-cover'). // IE6- only
08547                               css({left: -borders[0], top: -borders[1],
08548                                     width: inst.dpDiv.outerWidth(), height: inst.dpDiv.outerHeight()});
08549                   };
08550                   inst.dpDiv.zIndex($(input).zIndex()+1);
08551                   if ($.effects && $.effects[showAnim])
08552                         inst.dpDiv.show(showAnim, $.datepicker._get(inst, 'showOptions'), duration, postProcess);
08553                   else
08554                         inst.dpDiv[showAnim || 'show']((showAnim ? duration : null), postProcess);
08555                   if (!showAnim || !duration)
08556                         postProcess();
08557                   if (inst.input.is(':visible') && !inst.input.is(':disabled'))
08558                         inst.input.focus();
08559                   $.datepicker._curInst = inst;
08560             }
08561       },
08562 
08563       /* Generate the date picker content. */
08564       _updateDatepicker: function(inst) {
08565             var self = this;
08566             var borders = $.datepicker._getBorders(inst.dpDiv);
08567             inst.dpDiv.empty().append(this._generateHTML(inst))
08568                   .find('iframe.ui-datepicker-cover') // IE6- only
08569                         .css({left: -borders[0], top: -borders[1],
08570                               width: inst.dpDiv.outerWidth(), height: inst.dpDiv.outerHeight()})
08571                   .end()
08572                   .find('button, .ui-datepicker-prev, .ui-datepicker-next, .ui-datepicker-calendar td a')
08573                         .bind('mouseout', function(){
08574                               $(this).removeClass('ui-state-hover');
08575                               if(this.className.indexOf('ui-datepicker-prev') != -1) $(this).removeClass('ui-datepicker-prev-hover');
08576                               if(this.className.indexOf('ui-datepicker-next') != -1) $(this).removeClass('ui-datepicker-next-hover');
08577                         })
08578                         .bind('mouseover', function(){
08579                               if (!self._isDisabledDatepicker( inst.inline ? inst.dpDiv.parent()[0] : inst.input[0])) {
08580                                     $(this).parents('.ui-datepicker-calendar').find('a').removeClass('ui-state-hover');
08581                                     $(this).addClass('ui-state-hover');
08582                                     if(this.className.indexOf('ui-datepicker-prev') != -1) $(this).addClass('ui-datepicker-prev-hover');
08583                                     if(this.className.indexOf('ui-datepicker-next') != -1) $(this).addClass('ui-datepicker-next-hover');
08584                               }
08585                         })
08586                   .end()
08587                   .find('.' + this._dayOverClass + ' a')
08588                         .trigger('mouseover')
08589                   .end();
08590             var numMonths = this._getNumberOfMonths(inst);
08591             var cols = numMonths[1];
08592             var width = 17;
08593             if (cols > 1)
08594                   inst.dpDiv.addClass('ui-datepicker-multi-' + cols).css('width', (width * cols) + 'em');
08595             else
08596                   inst.dpDiv.removeClass('ui-datepicker-multi-2 ui-datepicker-multi-3 ui-datepicker-multi-4').width('');
08597             inst.dpDiv[(numMonths[0] != 1 || numMonths[1] != 1 ? 'add' : 'remove') +
08598                   'Class']('ui-datepicker-multi');
08599             inst.dpDiv[(this._get(inst, 'isRTL') ? 'add' : 'remove') +
08600                   'Class']('ui-datepicker-rtl');
08601             if (inst == $.datepicker._curInst && $.datepicker._datepickerShowing && inst.input &&
08602                         inst.input.is(':visible') && !inst.input.is(':disabled'))
08603                   inst.input.focus();
08604       },
08605 
08606       /* Retrieve the size of left and top borders for an element.
08607          @param  elem  (jQuery object) the element of interest
08608          @return  (number[2]) the left and top borders */
08609       _getBorders: function(elem) {
08610             var convert = function(value) {
08611                   return {thin: 1, medium: 2, thick: 3}[value] || value;
08612             };
08613             return [parseFloat(convert(elem.css('border-left-width'))),
08614                   parseFloat(convert(elem.css('border-top-width')))];
08615       },
08616 
08617       /* Check positioning to remain on screen. */
08618       _checkOffset: function(inst, offset, isFixed) {
08619             var dpWidth = inst.dpDiv.outerWidth();
08620             var dpHeight = inst.dpDiv.outerHeight();
08621             var inputWidth = inst.input ? inst.input.outerWidth() : 0;
08622             var inputHeight = inst.input ? inst.input.outerHeight() : 0;
08623             var viewWidth = document.documentElement.clientWidth + $(document).scrollLeft();
08624             var viewHeight = document.documentElement.clientHeight + $(document).scrollTop();
08625 
08626             offset.left -= (this._get(inst, 'isRTL') ? (dpWidth - inputWidth) : 0);
08627             offset.left -= (isFixed && offset.left == inst.input.offset().left) ? $(document).scrollLeft() : 0;
08628             offset.top -= (isFixed && offset.top == (inst.input.offset().top + inputHeight)) ? $(document).scrollTop() : 0;
08629 
08630             // now check if datepicker is showing outside window viewport - move to a better place if so.
08631             offset.left -= Math.min(offset.left, (offset.left + dpWidth > viewWidth && viewWidth > dpWidth) ?
08632                   Math.abs(offset.left + dpWidth - viewWidth) : 0);
08633             offset.top -= Math.min(offset.top, (offset.top + dpHeight > viewHeight && viewHeight > dpHeight) ?
08634                   Math.abs(dpHeight + inputHeight) : 0);
08635 
08636             return offset;
08637       },
08638 
08639       /* Find an object's position on the screen. */
08640       _findPos: function(obj) {
08641             var inst = this._getInst(obj);
08642             var isRTL = this._get(inst, 'isRTL');
08643         while (obj && (obj.type == 'hidden' || obj.nodeType != 1)) {
08644             obj = obj[isRTL ? 'previousSibling' : 'nextSibling'];
08645         }
08646         var position = $(obj).offset();
08647           return [position.left, position.top];
08648       },
08649 
08650       /* Hide the date picker from view.
08651          @param  input  element - the input field attached to the date picker */
08652       _hideDatepicker: function(input) {
08653             var inst = this._curInst;
08654             if (!inst || (input && inst != $.data(input, PROP_NAME)))
08655                   return;
08656             if (this._datepickerShowing) {
08657                   var showAnim = this._get(inst, 'showAnim');
08658                   var duration = this._get(inst, 'duration');
08659                   var postProcess = function() {
08660                         $.datepicker._tidyDialog(inst);
08661                         this._curInst = null;
08662                   };
08663                   if ($.effects && $.effects[showAnim])
08664                         inst.dpDiv.hide(showAnim, $.datepicker._get(inst, 'showOptions'), duration, postProcess);
08665                   else
08666                         inst.dpDiv[(showAnim == 'slideDown' ? 'slideUp' :
08667                               (showAnim == 'fadeIn' ? 'fadeOut' : 'hide'))]((showAnim ? duration : null), postProcess);
08668                   if (!showAnim)
08669                         postProcess();
08670                   var onClose = this._get(inst, 'onClose');
08671                   if (onClose)
08672                         onClose.apply((inst.input ? inst.input[0] : null),
08673                               [(inst.input ? inst.input.val() : ''), inst]);  // trigger custom callback
08674                   this._datepickerShowing = false;
08675                   this._lastInput = null;
08676                   if (this._inDialog) {
08677                         this._dialogInput.css({ position: 'absolute', left: '0', top: '-100px' });
08678                         if ($.blockUI) {
08679                               $.unblockUI();
08680                               $('body').append(this.dpDiv);
08681                         }
08682                   }
08683                   this._inDialog = false;
08684             }
08685       },
08686 
08687       /* Tidy up after a dialog display. */
08688       _tidyDialog: function(inst) {
08689             inst.dpDiv.removeClass(this._dialogClass).unbind('.ui-datepicker-calendar');
08690       },
08691 
08692       /* Close date picker if clicked elsewhere. */
08693       _checkExternalClick: function(event) {
08694             if (!$.datepicker._curInst)
08695                   return;
08696             var $target = $(event.target);
08697             if ($target[0].id != $.datepicker._mainDivId &&
08698                         $target.parents('#' + $.datepicker._mainDivId).length == 0 &&
08699                         !$target.hasClass($.datepicker.markerClassName) &&
08700                         !$target.hasClass($.datepicker._triggerClass) &&
08701                         $.datepicker._datepickerShowing && !($.datepicker._inDialog && $.blockUI))
08702                   $.datepicker._hideDatepicker();
08703       },
08704 
08705       /* Adjust one of the date sub-fields. */
08706       _adjustDate: function(id, offset, period) {
08707             var target = $(id);
08708             var inst = this._getInst(target[0]);
08709             if (this._isDisabledDatepicker(target[0])) {
08710                   return;
08711             }
08712             this._adjustInstDate(inst, offset +
08713                   (period == 'M' ? this._get(inst, 'showCurrentAtPos') : 0), // undo positioning
08714                   period);
08715             this._updateDatepicker(inst);
08716       },
08717 
08718       /* Action for current link. */
08719       _gotoToday: function(id) {
08720             var target = $(id);
08721             var inst = this._getInst(target[0]);
08722             if (this._get(inst, 'gotoCurrent') && inst.currentDay) {
08723                   inst.selectedDay = inst.currentDay;
08724                   inst.drawMonth = inst.selectedMonth = inst.currentMonth;
08725                   inst.drawYear = inst.selectedYear = inst.currentYear;
08726             }
08727             else {
08728                   var date = new Date();
08729                   inst.selectedDay = date.getDate();
08730                   inst.drawMonth = inst.selectedMonth = date.getMonth();
08731                   inst.drawYear = inst.selectedYear = date.getFullYear();
08732             }
08733             this._notifyChange(inst);
08734             this._adjustDate(target);
08735       },
08736 
08737       /* Action for selecting a new month/year. */
08738       _selectMonthYear: function(id, select, period) {
08739             var target = $(id);
08740             var inst = this._getInst(target[0]);
08741             inst._selectingMonthYear = false;
08742             inst['selected' + (period == 'M' ? 'Month' : 'Year')] =
08743             inst['draw' + (period == 'M' ? 'Month' : 'Year')] =
08744                   parseInt(select.options[select.selectedIndex].value,10);
08745             this._notifyChange(inst);
08746             this._adjustDate(target);
08747       },
08748 
08749       /* Restore input focus after not changing month/year. */
08750       _clickMonthYear: function(id) {
08751             var target = $(id);
08752             var inst = this._getInst(target[0]);
08753             if (inst.input && inst._selectingMonthYear) {
08754                   setTimeout(function() {
08755                         inst.input.focus();
08756                   }, 0);
08757             }
08758             inst._selectingMonthYear = !inst._selectingMonthYear;
08759       },
08760 
08761       /* Action for selecting a day. */
08762       _selectDay: function(id, month, year, td) {
08763             var target = $(id);
08764             if ($(td).hasClass(this._unselectableClass) || this._isDisabledDatepicker(target[0])) {
08765                   return;
08766             }
08767             var inst = this._getInst(target[0]);
08768             inst.selectedDay = inst.currentDay = $('a', td).html();
08769             inst.selectedMonth = inst.currentMonth = month;
08770             inst.selectedYear = inst.currentYear = year;
08771             this._selectDate(id, this._formatDate(inst,
08772                   inst.currentDay, inst.currentMonth, inst.currentYear));
08773       },
08774 
08775       /* Erase the input field and hide the date picker. */
08776       _clearDate: function(id) {
08777             var target = $(id);
08778             var inst = this._getInst(target[0]);
08779             this._selectDate(target, '');
08780       },
08781 
08782       /* Update the input field with the selected date. */
08783       _selectDate: function(id, dateStr) {
08784             var target = $(id);
08785             var inst = this._getInst(target[0]);
08786             dateStr = (dateStr != null ? dateStr : this._formatDate(inst));
08787             if (inst.input)
08788                   inst.input.val(dateStr);
08789             this._updateAlternate(inst);
08790             var onSelect = this._get(inst, 'onSelect');
08791             if (onSelect)
08792                   onSelect.apply((inst.input ? inst.input[0] : null), [dateStr, inst]);  // trigger custom callback
08793             else if (inst.input)
08794                   inst.input.trigger('change'); // fire the change event
08795             if (inst.inline)
08796                   this._updateDatepicker(inst);
08797             else {
08798                   this._hideDatepicker();
08799                   this._lastInput = inst.input[0];
08800                   if (typeof(inst.input[0]) != 'object')
08801                         inst.input.focus(); // restore focus
08802                   this._lastInput = null;
08803             }
08804       },
08805 
08806       /* Update any alternate field to synchronise with the main field. */
08807       _updateAlternate: function(inst) {
08808             var altField = this._get(inst, 'altField');
08809             if (altField) { // update alternate field too
08810                   var altFormat = this._get(inst, 'altFormat') || this._get(inst, 'dateFormat');
08811                   var date = this._getDate(inst);
08812                   var dateStr = this.formatDate(altFormat, date, this._getFormatConfig(inst));
08813                   $(altField).each(function() { $(this).val(dateStr); });
08814             }
08815       },
08816 
08817       /* Set as beforeShowDay function to prevent selection of weekends.
08818          @param  date  Date - the date to customise
08819          @return [boolean, string] - is this date selectable?, what is its CSS class? */
08820       noWeekends: function(date) {
08821             var day = date.getDay();
08822             return [(day > 0 && day < 6), ''];
08823       },
08824 
08825       /* Set as calculateWeek to determine the week of the year based on the ISO 8601 definition.
08826          @param  date  Date - the date to get the week for
08827          @return  number - the number of the week within the year that contains this date */
08828       iso8601Week: function(date) {
08829             var checkDate = new Date(date.getTime());
08830             // Find Thursday of this week starting on Monday
08831             checkDate.setDate(checkDate.getDate() + 4 - (checkDate.getDay() || 7));
08832             var time = checkDate.getTime();
08833             checkDate.setMonth(0); // Compare with Jan 1
08834             checkDate.setDate(1);
08835             return Math.floor(Math.round((time - checkDate) / 86400000) / 7) + 1;
08836       },
08837 
08838       /* Parse a string value into a date object.
08839          See formatDate below for the possible formats.
08840 
08841          @param  format    string - the expected format of the date
08842          @param  value     string - the date in the above format
08843          @param  settings  Object - attributes include:
08844                            shortYearCutoff  number - the cutoff year for determining the century (optional)
08845                            dayNamesShort    string[7] - abbreviated names of the days from Sunday (optional)
08846                            dayNames         string[7] - names of the days from Sunday (optional)
08847                            monthNamesShort  string[12] - abbreviated names of the months (optional)
08848                            monthNames       string[12] - names of the months (optional)
08849          @return  Date - the extracted date value or null if value is blank */
08850       parseDate: function (format, value, settings) {
08851             if (format == null || value == null)
08852                   throw 'Invalid arguments';
08853             value = (typeof value == 'object' ? value.toString() : value + '');
08854             if (value == '')
08855                   return null;
08856             var shortYearCutoff = (settings ? settings.shortYearCutoff : null) || this._defaults.shortYearCutoff;
08857             var dayNamesShort = (settings ? settings.dayNamesShort : null) || this._defaults.dayNamesShort;
08858             var dayNames = (settings ? settings.dayNames : null) || this._defaults.dayNames;
08859             var monthNamesShort = (settings ? settings.monthNamesShort : null) || this._defaults.monthNamesShort;
08860             var monthNames = (settings ? settings.monthNames : null) || this._defaults.monthNames;
08861             var year = -1;
08862             var month = -1;
08863             var day = -1;
08864             var doy = -1;
08865             var literal = false;
08866             // Check whether a format character is doubled
08867             var lookAhead = function(match) {
08868                   var matches = (iFormat + 1 < format.length && format.charAt(iFormat + 1) == match);
08869                   if (matches)
08870                         iFormat++;
08871                   return matches;
08872             };
08873             // Extract a number from the string value
08874             var getNumber = function(match) {
08875                   lookAhead(match);
08876                   var size = (match == '@' ? 14 : (match == '!' ? 20 :
08877                         (match == 'y' ? 4 : (match == 'o' ? 3 : 2))));
08878                   var digits = new RegExp('^\\d{1,' + size + '}');
08879                   var num = value.substring(iValue).match(digits);
08880                   if (!num)
08881                         throw 'Missing number at position ' + iValue;
08882                   iValue += num[0].length;
08883                   return parseInt(num[0], 10);
08884             };
08885             // Extract a name from the string value and convert to an index
08886             var getName = function(match, shortNames, longNames) {
08887                   var names = (lookAhead(match) ? longNames : shortNames);
08888                   for (var i = 0; i < names.length; i++) {
08889                         if (value.substr(iValue, names[i].length) == names[i]) {
08890                               iValue += names[i].length;
08891                               return i + 1;
08892                         }
08893                   }
08894                   throw 'Unknown name at position ' + iValue;
08895             };
08896             // Confirm that a literal character matches the string value
08897             var checkLiteral = function() {
08898                   if (value.charAt(iValue) != format.charAt(iFormat))
08899                         throw 'Unexpected literal at position ' + iValue;
08900                   iValue++;
08901             };
08902             var iValue = 0;
08903             for (var iFormat = 0; iFormat < format.length; iFormat++) {
08904                   if (literal)
08905                         if (format.charAt(iFormat) == "'" && !lookAhead("'"))
08906                               literal = false;
08907                         else
08908                               checkLiteral();
08909                   else
08910                         switch (format.charAt(iFormat)) {
08911                               case 'd':
08912                                     day = getNumber('d');
08913                                     break;
08914                               case 'D':
08915                                     getName('D', dayNamesShort, dayNames);
08916                                     break;
08917                               case 'o':
08918                                     doy = getNumber('o');
08919                                     break;
08920                               case 'm':
08921                                     month = getNumber('m');
08922                                     break;
08923                               case 'M':
08924                                     month = getName('M', monthNamesShort, monthNames);
08925                                     break;
08926                               case 'y':
08927                                     year = getNumber('y');
08928                                     break;
08929                               case '@':
08930                                     var date = new Date(getNumber('@'));
08931                                     year = date.getFullYear();
08932                                     month = date.getMonth() + 1;
08933                                     day = date.getDate();
08934                                     break;
08935                               case '!':
08936                                     var date = new Date((getNumber('!') - this._ticksTo1970) / 10000);
08937                                     year = date.getFullYear();
08938                                     month = date.getMonth() + 1;
08939                                     day = date.getDate();
08940                                     break;
08941                               case "'":
08942                                     if (lookAhead("'"))
08943                                           checkLiteral();
08944                                     else
08945                                           literal = true;
08946                                     break;
08947                               default:
08948                                     checkLiteral();
08949                         }
08950             }
08951             if (year == -1)
08952                   year = new Date().getFullYear();
08953             else if (year < 100)
08954                   year += new Date().getFullYear() - new Date().getFullYear() % 100 +
08955                         (year <= shortYearCutoff ? 0 : -100);
08956             if (doy > -1) {
08957                   month = 1;
08958                   day = doy;
08959                   do {
08960                         var dim = this._getDaysInMonth(year, month - 1);
08961                         if (day <= dim)
08962                               break;
08963                         month++;
08964                         day -= dim;
08965                   } while (true);
08966             }
08967             var date = this._daylightSavingAdjust(new Date(year, month - 1, day));
08968             if (date.getFullYear() != year || date.getMonth() + 1 != month || date.getDate() != day)
08969                   throw 'Invalid date'; // E.g. 31/02/*
08970             return date;
08971       },
08972 
08973       /* Standard date formats. */
08974       ATOM: 'yy-mm-dd', // RFC 3339 (ISO 8601)
08975       COOKIE: 'D, dd M yy',
08976       ISO_8601: 'yy-mm-dd',
08977       RFC_822: 'D, d M y',
08978       RFC_850: 'DD, dd-M-y',
08979       RFC_1036: 'D, d M y',
08980       RFC_1123: 'D, d M yy',
08981       RFC_2822: 'D, d M yy',
08982       RSS: 'D, d M y', // RFC 822
08983       TICKS: '!',
08984       TIMESTAMP: '@',
08985       W3C: 'yy-mm-dd', // ISO 8601
08986 
08987       _ticksTo1970: (((1970 - 1) * 365 + Math.floor(1970 / 4) - Math.floor(1970 / 100) +
08988             Math.floor(1970 / 400)) * 24 * 60 * 60 * 10000000),
08989 
08990       /* Format a date object into a string value.
08991          The format can be combinations of the following:
08992          d  - day of month (no leading zero)
08993          dd - day of month (two digit)
08994          o  - day of year (no leading zeros)
08995          oo - day of year (three digit)
08996          D  - day name short
08997          DD - day name long
08998          m  - month of year (no leading zero)
08999          mm - month of year (two digit)
09000          M  - month name short
09001          MM - month name long
09002          y  - year (two digit)
09003          yy - year (four digit)
09004          @ - Unix timestamp (ms since 01/01/1970)
09005          ! - Windows ticks (100ns since 01/01/0001)
09006          '...' - literal text
09007          '' - single quote
09008 
09009          @param  format    string - the desired format of the date
09010          @param  date      Date - the date value to format
09011          @param  settings  Object - attributes include:
09012                            dayNamesShort    string[7] - abbreviated names of the days from Sunday (optional)
09013                            dayNames         string[7] - names of the days from Sunday (optional)
09014                            monthNamesShort  string[12] - abbreviated names of the months (optional)
09015                            monthNames       string[12] - names of the months (optional)
09016          @return  string - the date in the above format */
09017       formatDate: function (format, date, settings) {
09018             if (!date)
09019                   return '';
09020             var dayNamesShort = (settings ? settings.dayNamesShort : null) || this._defaults.dayNamesShort;
09021             var dayNames = (settings ? settings.dayNames : null) || this._defaults.dayNames;
09022             var monthNamesShort = (settings ? settings.monthNamesShort : null) || this._defaults.monthNamesShort;
09023             var monthNames = (settings ? settings.monthNames : null) || this._defaults.monthNames;
09024             // Check whether a format character is doubled
09025             var lookAhead = function(match) {
09026                   var matches = (iFormat + 1 < format.length && format.charAt(iFormat + 1) == match);
09027                   if (matches)
09028                         iFormat++;
09029                   return matches;
09030             };
09031             // Format a number, with leading zero if necessary
09032             var formatNumber = function(match, value, len) {
09033                   var num = '' + value;
09034                   if (lookAhead(match))
09035                         while (num.length < len)
09036                               num = '0' + num;
09037                   return num;
09038             };
09039             // Format a name, short or long as requested
09040             var formatName = function(match, value, shortNames, longNames) {
09041                   return (lookAhead(match) ? longNames[value] : shortNames[value]);
09042             };
09043             var output = '';
09044             var literal = false;
09045             if (date)
09046                   for (var iFormat = 0; iFormat < format.length; iFormat++) {
09047                         if (literal)
09048                               if (format.charAt(iFormat) == "'" && !lookAhead("'"))
09049                                     literal = false;
09050                               else
09051                                     output += format.charAt(iFormat);
09052                         else
09053                               switch (format.charAt(iFormat)) {
09054                                     case 'd':
09055                                           output += formatNumber('d', date.getDate(), 2);
09056                                           break;
09057                                     case 'D':
09058                                           output += formatName('D', date.getDay(), dayNamesShort, dayNames);
09059                                           break;
09060                                     case 'o':
09061                                           output += formatNumber('o',
09062                                                 (date.getTime() - new Date(date.getFullYear(), 0, 0).getTime()) / 86400000, 3);
09063                                           break;
09064                                     case 'm':
09065                                           output += formatNumber('m', date.getMonth() + 1, 2);
09066                                           break;
09067                                     case 'M':
09068                                           output += formatName('M', date.getMonth(), monthNamesShort, monthNames);
09069                                           break;
09070                                     case 'y':
09071                                           output += (lookAhead('y') ? date.getFullYear() :
09072                                                 (date.getYear() % 100 < 10 ? '0' : '') + date.getYear() % 100);
09073                                           break;
09074                                     case '@':
09075                                           output += date.getTime();
09076                                           break;
09077                                     case '!':
09078                                           output += date.getTime() * 10000 + this._ticksTo1970;
09079                                           break;
09080                                     case "'":
09081                                           if (lookAhead("'"))
09082                                                 output += "'";
09083                                           else
09084                                                 literal = true;
09085                                           break;
09086                                     default:
09087                                           output += format.charAt(iFormat);
09088                               }
09089                   }
09090             return output;
09091       },
09092 
09093       /* Extract all possible characters from the date format. */
09094       _possibleChars: function (format) {
09095             var chars = '';
09096             var literal = false;
09097             // Check whether a format character is doubled
09098             var lookAhead = function(match) {
09099                   var matches = (iFormat + 1 < format.length && format.charAt(iFormat + 1) == match);
09100                   if (matches)
09101                         iFormat++;
09102                   return matches;
09103             };
09104             for (var iFormat = 0; iFormat < format.length; iFormat++)
09105                   if (literal)
09106                         if (format.charAt(iFormat) == "'" && !lookAhead("'"))
09107                               literal = false;
09108                         else
09109                               chars += format.charAt(iFormat);
09110                   else
09111                         switch (format.charAt(iFormat)) {
09112                               case 'd': case 'm': case 'y': case '@':
09113                                     chars += '0123456789';
09114                                     break;
09115                               case 'D': case 'M':
09116                                     return null; // Accept anything
09117                               case "'":
09118                                     if (lookAhead("'"))
09119                                           chars += "'";
09120                                     else
09121                                           literal = true;
09122                                     break;
09123                               default:
09124                                     chars += format.charAt(iFormat);
09125                         }
09126             return chars;
09127       },
09128 
09129       /* Get a setting value, defaulting if necessary. */
09130       _get: function(inst, name) {
09131             return inst.settings[name] !== undefined ?
09132                   inst.settings[name] : this._defaults[name];
09133       },
09134 
09135       /* Parse existing date and initialise date picker. */
09136       _setDateFromField: function(inst, noDefault) {
09137             if (inst.input.val() == inst.lastVal) {
09138                   return;
09139             }
09140             var dateFormat = this._get(inst, 'dateFormat');
09141             var dates = inst.lastVal = inst.input ? inst.input.val() : null;
09142             var date, defaultDate;
09143             date = defaultDate = this._getDefaultDate(inst);
09144             var settings = this._getFormatConfig(inst);
09145             try {
09146                   date = this.parseDate(dateFormat, dates, settings) || defaultDate;
09147             } catch (event) {
09148                   this.log(event);
09149                   dates = (noDefault ? '' : dates);
09150             }
09151             inst.selectedDay = date.getDate();
09152             inst.drawMonth = inst.selectedMonth = date.getMonth();
09153             inst.drawYear = inst.selectedYear = date.getFullYear();
09154             inst.currentDay = (dates ? date.getDate() : 0);
09155             inst.currentMonth = (dates ? date.getMonth() : 0);
09156             inst.currentYear = (dates ? date.getFullYear() : 0);
09157             this._adjustInstDate(inst);
09158       },
09159 
09160       /* Retrieve the default date shown on opening. */
09161       _getDefaultDate: function(inst) {
09162             return this._restrictMinMax(inst,
09163                   this._determineDate(inst, this._get(inst, 'defaultDate'), new Date()));
09164       },
09165 
09166       /* A date may be specified as an exact value or a relative one. */
09167       _determineDate: function(inst, date, defaultDate) {
09168             var offsetNumeric = function(offset) {
09169                   var date = new Date();
09170                   date.setDate(date.getDate() + offset);
09171                   return date;
09172             };
09173             var offsetString = function(offset) {
09174                   try {
09175                         return $.datepicker.parseDate($.datepicker._get(inst, 'dateFormat'),
09176                               offset, $.datepicker._getFormatConfig(inst));
09177                   }
09178                   catch (e) {
09179                         // Ignore
09180                   }
09181                   var date = (offset.toLowerCase().match(/^c/) ?
09182                         $.datepicker._getDate(inst) : null) || new Date();
09183                   var year = date.getFullYear();
09184                   var month = date.getMonth();
09185                   var day = date.getDate();
09186                   var pattern = /([+-]?[0-9]+)\s*(d|D|w|W|m|M|y|Y)?/g;
09187                   var matches = pattern.exec(offset);
09188                   while (matches) {
09189                         switch (matches[2] || 'd') {
09190                               case 'd' : case 'D' :
09191                                     day += parseInt(matches[1],10); break;
09192                               case 'w' : case 'W' :
09193                                     day += parseInt(matches[1],10) * 7; break;
09194                               case 'm' : case 'M' :
09195                                     month += parseInt(matches[1],10);
09196                                     day = Math.min(day, $.datepicker._getDaysInMonth(year, month));
09197                                     break;
09198                               case 'y': case 'Y' :
09199                                     year += parseInt(matches[1],10);
09200                                     day = Math.min(day, $.datepicker._getDaysInMonth(year, month));
09201                                     break;
09202                         }
09203                         matches = pattern.exec(offset);
09204                   }
09205                   return new Date(year, month, day);
09206             };
09207             date = (date == null ? defaultDate : (typeof date == 'string' ? offsetString(date) :
09208                   (typeof date == 'number' ? (isNaN(date) ? defaultDate : offsetNumeric(date)) : date)));
09209             date = (date && date.toString() == 'Invalid Date' ? defaultDate : date);
09210             if (date) {
09211                   date.setHours(0);
09212                   date.setMinutes(0);
09213                   date.setSeconds(0);
09214                   date.setMilliseconds(0);
09215             }
09216             return this._daylightSavingAdjust(date);
09217       },
09218 
09219       /* Handle switch to/from daylight saving.
09220          Hours may be non-zero on daylight saving cut-over:
09221          > 12 when midnight changeover, but then cannot generate
09222          midnight datetime, so jump to 1AM, otherwise reset.
09223          @param  date  (Date) the date to check
09224          @return  (Date) the corrected date */
09225       _daylightSavingAdjust: function(date) {
09226             if (!date) return null;
09227             date.setHours(date.getHours() > 12 ? date.getHours() + 2 : 0);
09228             return date;
09229       },
09230 
09231       /* Set the date(s) directly. */
09232       _setDate: function(inst, date, noChange) {
09233             var clear = !(date);
09234             var origMonth = inst.selectedMonth;
09235             var origYear = inst.selectedYear;
09236             date = this._restrictMinMax(inst, this._determineDate(inst, date, new Date()));
09237             inst.selectedDay = inst.currentDay = date.getDate();
09238             inst.drawMonth = inst.selectedMonth = inst.currentMonth = date.getMonth();
09239             inst.drawYear = inst.selectedYear = inst.currentYear = date.getFullYear();
09240             if ((origMonth != inst.selectedMonth || origYear != inst.selectedYear) && !noChange)
09241                   this._notifyChange(inst);
09242             this._adjustInstDate(inst);
09243             if (inst.input) {
09244                   inst.input.val(clear ? '' : this._formatDate(inst));
09245             }
09246       },
09247 
09248       /* Retrieve the date(s) directly. */
09249       _getDate: function(inst) {
09250             var startDate = (!inst.currentYear || (inst.input && inst.input.val() == '') ? null :
09251                   this._daylightSavingAdjust(new Date(
09252                   inst.currentYear, inst.currentMonth, inst.currentDay)));
09253                   return startDate;
09254       },
09255 
09256       /* Generate the HTML for the current state of the date picker. */
09257       _generateHTML: function(inst) {
09258             var today = new Date();
09259             today = this._daylightSavingAdjust(
09260                   new Date(today.getFullYear(), today.getMonth(), today.getDate())); // clear time
09261             var isRTL = this._get(inst, 'isRTL');
09262             var showButtonPanel = this._get(inst, 'showButtonPanel');
09263             var hideIfNoPrevNext = this._get(inst, 'hideIfNoPrevNext');
09264             var navigationAsDateFormat = this._get(inst, 'navigationAsDateFormat');
09265             var numMonths = this._getNumberOfMonths(inst);
09266             var showCurrentAtPos = this._get(inst, 'showCurrentAtPos');
09267             var stepMonths = this._get(inst, 'stepMonths');
09268             var isMultiMonth = (numMonths[0] != 1 || numMonths[1] != 1);
09269             var currentDate = this._daylightSavingAdjust((!inst.currentDay ? new Date(9999, 9, 9) :
09270                   new Date(inst.currentYear, inst.currentMonth, inst.currentDay)));
09271             var minDate = this._getMinMaxDate(inst, 'min');
09272             var maxDate = this._getMinMaxDate(inst, 'max');
09273             var drawMonth = inst.drawMonth - showCurrentAtPos;
09274             var drawYear = inst.drawYear;
09275             if (drawMonth < 0) {
09276                   drawMonth += 12;
09277                   drawYear--;
09278             }
09279             if (maxDate) {
09280                   var maxDraw = this._daylightSavingAdjust(new Date(maxDate.getFullYear(),
09281                         maxDate.getMonth() - (numMonths[0] * numMonths[1]) + 1, maxDate.getDate()));
09282                   maxDraw = (minDate && maxDraw < minDate ? minDate : maxDraw);
09283                   while (this._daylightSavingAdjust(new Date(drawYear, drawMonth, 1)) > maxDraw) {
09284                         drawMonth--;
09285                         if (drawMonth < 0) {
09286                               drawMonth = 11;
09287                               drawYear--;
09288                         }
09289                   }
09290             }
09291             inst.drawMonth = drawMonth;
09292             inst.drawYear = drawYear;
09293             var prevText = this._get(inst, 'prevText');
09294             prevText = (!navigationAsDateFormat ? prevText : this.formatDate(prevText,
09295                   this._daylightSavingAdjust(new Date(drawYear, drawMonth - stepMonths, 1)),
09296                   this._getFormatConfig(inst)));
09297             var prev = (this._canAdjustMonth(inst, -1, drawYear, drawMonth) ?
09298                   '<a class="ui-datepicker-prev ui-corner-all" onclick="DP_jQuery_' + dpuuid +
09299                   '.datepicker._adjustDate(\'#' + inst.id + '\', -' + stepMonths + ', \'M\');"' +
09300                   ' title="' + prevText + '"><span class="ui-icon ui-icon-circle-triangle-' + ( isRTL ? 'e' : 'w') + '">' + prevText + '</span></a>' :
09301                   (hideIfNoPrevNext ? '' : '<a class="ui-datepicker-prev ui-corner-all ui-state-disabled" title="'+ prevText +'"><span class="ui-icon ui-icon-circle-triangle-' + ( isRTL ? 'e' : 'w') + '">' + prevText + '</span></a>'));
09302             var nextText = this._get(inst, 'nextText');
09303             nextText = (!navigationAsDateFormat ? nextText : this.formatDate(nextText,
09304                   this._daylightSavingAdjust(new Date(drawYear, drawMonth + stepMonths, 1)),
09305                   this._getFormatConfig(inst)));
09306             var next = (this._canAdjustMonth(inst, +1, drawYear, drawMonth) ?
09307                   '<a class="ui-datepicker-next ui-corner-all" onclick="DP_jQuery_' + dpuuid +
09308                   '.datepicker._adjustDate(\'#' + inst.id + '\', +' + stepMonths + ', \'M\');"' +
09309                   ' title="' + nextText + '"><span class="ui-icon ui-icon-circle-triangle-' + ( isRTL ? 'w' : 'e') + '">' + nextText + '</span></a>' :
09310                   (hideIfNoPrevNext ? '' : '<a class="ui-datepicker-next ui-corner-all ui-state-disabled" title="'+ nextText + '"><span class="ui-icon ui-icon-circle-triangle-' + ( isRTL ? 'w' : 'e') + '">' + nextText + '</span></a>'));
09311             var currentText = this._get(inst, 'currentText');
09312             var gotoDate = (this._get(inst, 'gotoCurrent') && inst.currentDay ? currentDate : today);
09313             currentText = (!navigationAsDateFormat ? currentText :
09314                   this.formatDate(currentText, gotoDate, this._getFormatConfig(inst)));
09315             var controls = (!inst.inline ? '<button type="button" class="ui-datepicker-close ui-state-default ui-priority-primary ui-corner-all" onclick="DP_jQuery_' + dpuuid +
09316                   '.datepicker._hideDatepicker();">' + this._get(inst, 'closeText') + '</button>' : '');
09317             var buttonPanel = (showButtonPanel) ? '<div class="ui-datepicker-buttonpane ui-widget-content">' + (isRTL ? controls : '') +
09318                   (this._isInRange(inst, gotoDate) ? '<button type="button" class="ui-datepicker-current ui-state-default ui-priority-secondary ui-corner-all" onclick="DP_jQuery_' + dpuuid +
09319                   '.datepicker._gotoToday(\'#' + inst.id + '\');"' +
09320                   '>' + currentText + '</button>' : '') + (isRTL ? '' : controls) + '</div>' : '';
09321             var firstDay = parseInt(this._get(inst, 'firstDay'),10);
09322             firstDay = (isNaN(firstDay) ? 0 : firstDay);
09323             var showWeek = this._get(inst, 'showWeek');
09324             var dayNames = this._get(inst, 'dayNames');
09325             var dayNamesShort = this._get(inst, 'dayNamesShort');
09326             var dayNamesMin = this._get(inst, 'dayNamesMin');
09327             var monthNames = this._get(inst, 'monthNames');
09328             var monthNamesShort = this._get(inst, 'monthNamesShort');
09329             var beforeShowDay = this._get(inst, 'beforeShowDay');
09330             var showOtherMonths = this._get(inst, 'showOtherMonths');
09331             var selectOtherMonths = this._get(inst, 'selectOtherMonths');
09332             var calculateWeek = this._get(inst, 'calculateWeek') || this.iso8601Week;
09333             var defaultDate = this._getDefaultDate(inst);
09334             var html = '';
09335             for (var row = 0; row < numMonths[0]; row++) {
09336                   var group = '';
09337                   for (var col = 0; col < numMonths[1]; col++) {
09338                         var selectedDate = this._daylightSavingAdjust(new Date(drawYear, drawMonth, inst.selectedDay));
09339                         var cornerClass = ' ui-corner-all';
09340                         var calender = '';
09341                         if (isMultiMonth) {
09342                               calender += '<div class="ui-datepicker-group';
09343                               if (numMonths[1] > 1)
09344                                     switch (col) {
09345                                           case 0: calender += ' ui-datepicker-group-first';
09346                                                 cornerClass = ' ui-corner-' + (isRTL ? 'right' : 'left'); break;
09347                                           case numMonths[1]-1: calender += ' ui-datepicker-group-last';
09348                                                 cornerClass = ' ui-corner-' + (isRTL ? 'left' : 'right'); break;
09349                                           default: calender += ' ui-datepicker-group-middle'; cornerClass = ''; break;
09350                                     }
09351                               calender += '">';
09352                         }
09353                         calender += '<div class="ui-datepicker-header ui-widget-header ui-helper-clearfix' + cornerClass + '">' +
09354                               (/all|left/.test(cornerClass) && row == 0 ? (isRTL ? next : prev) : '') +
09355                               (/all|right/.test(cornerClass) && row == 0 ? (isRTL ? prev : next) : '') +
09356                               this._generateMonthYearHeader(inst, drawMonth, drawYear, minDate, maxDate,
09357                               row > 0 || col > 0, monthNames, monthNamesShort) + // draw month headers
09358                               '</div><table class="ui-datepicker-calendar"><thead>' +
09359                               '<tr>';
09360                         var thead = (showWeek ? '<th class="ui-datepicker-week-col">' + this._get(inst, 'weekHeader') + '</th>' : '');
09361                         for (var dow = 0; dow < 7; dow++) { // days of the week
09362                               var day = (dow + firstDay) % 7;
09363                               thead += '<th' + ((dow + firstDay + 6) % 7 >= 5 ? ' class="ui-datepicker-week-end"' : '') + '>' +
09364                                     '<span title="' + dayNames[day] + '">' + dayNamesMin[day] + '</span></th>';
09365                         }
09366                         calender += thead + '</tr></thead><tbody>';
09367                         var daysInMonth = this._getDaysInMonth(drawYear, drawMonth);
09368                         if (drawYear == inst.selectedYear && drawMonth == inst.selectedMonth)
09369                               inst.selectedDay = Math.min(inst.selectedDay, daysInMonth);
09370                         var leadDays = (this._getFirstDayOfMonth(drawYear, drawMonth) - firstDay + 7) % 7;
09371                         var numRows = (isMultiMonth ? 6 : Math.ceil((leadDays + daysInMonth) / 7)); // calculate the number of rows to generate
09372                         var printDate = this._daylightSavingAdjust(new Date(drawYear, drawMonth, 1 - leadDays));
09373                         for (var dRow = 0; dRow < numRows; dRow++) { // create date picker rows
09374                               calender += '<tr>';
09375                               var tbody = (!showWeek ? '' : '<td class="ui-datepicker-week-col">' +
09376                                     this._get(inst, 'calculateWeek')(printDate) + '</td>');
09377                               for (var dow = 0; dow < 7; dow++) { // create date picker days
09378                                     var daySettings = (beforeShowDay ?
09379                                           beforeShowDay.apply((inst.input ? inst.input[0] : null), [printDate]) : [true, '']);
09380                                     var otherMonth = (printDate.getMonth() != drawMonth);
09381                                     var unselectable = (otherMonth && !selectOtherMonths) || !daySettings[0] ||
09382                                           (minDate && printDate < minDate) || (maxDate && printDate > maxDate);
09383                                     tbody += '<td class="' +
09384                                           ((dow + firstDay + 6) % 7 >= 5 ? ' ui-datepicker-week-end' : '') + // highlight weekends
09385                                           (otherMonth ? ' ui-datepicker-other-month' : '') + // highlight days from other months
09386                                           ((printDate.getTime() == selectedDate.getTime() && drawMonth == inst.selectedMonth && inst._keyEvent) || // user pressed key
09387                                           (defaultDate.getTime() == printDate.getTime() && defaultDate.getTime() == selectedDate.getTime()) ?
09388                                           // or defaultDate is current printedDate and defaultDate is selectedDate
09389                                           ' ' + this._dayOverClass : '') + // highlight selected day
09390                                           (unselectable ? ' ' + this._unselectableClass + ' ui-state-disabled': '') +  // highlight unselectable days
09391                                           (otherMonth && !showOtherMonths ? '' : ' ' + daySettings[1] + // highlight custom dates
09392                                           (printDate.getTime() == currentDate.getTime() ? ' ' + this._currentClass : '') + // highlight selected day
09393                                           (printDate.getTime() == today.getTime() ? ' ui-datepicker-today' : '')) + '"' + // highlight today (if different)
09394                                           ((!otherMonth || showOtherMonths) && daySettings[2] ? ' title="' + daySettings[2] + '"' : '') + // cell title
09395                                           (unselectable ? '' : ' onclick="DP_jQuery_' + dpuuid + '.datepicker._selectDay(\'#' +
09396                                           inst.id + '\',' + printDate.getMonth() + ',' + printDate.getFullYear() + ', this);return false;"') + '>' + // actions
09397                                           (otherMonth && !showOtherMonths ? '&#xa0;' : // display for other months
09398                                           (unselectable ? '<span class="ui-state-default">' + printDate.getDate() + '</span>' : '<a class="ui-state-default' +
09399                                           (printDate.getTime() == today.getTime() ? ' ui-state-highlight' : '') +
09400                                           (printDate.getTime() == selectedDate.getTime() ? ' ui-state-active' : '') + // highlight selected day
09401                                           (otherMonth ? ' ui-priority-secondary' : '') + // distinguish dates from other months
09402                                           '" href="#">' + printDate.getDate() + '</a>')) + '</td>'; // display selectable date
09403                                     printDate.setDate(printDate.getDate() + 1);
09404                                     printDate = this._daylightSavingAdjust(printDate);
09405                               }
09406                               calender += tbody + '</tr>';
09407                         }
09408                         drawMonth++;
09409                         if (drawMonth > 11) {
09410                               drawMonth = 0;
09411                               drawYear++;
09412                         }
09413                         calender += '</tbody></table>' + (isMultiMonth ? '</div>' + 
09414                                           ((numMonths[0] > 0 && col == numMonths[1]-1) ? '<div class="ui-datepicker-row-break"></div>' : '') : '');
09415                         group += calender;
09416                   }
09417                   html += group;
09418             }
09419             html += buttonPanel + ($.browser.msie && parseInt($.browser.version,10) < 7 && !inst.inline ?
09420                   '<iframe src="javascript:false;" class="ui-datepicker-cover" frameborder="0"></iframe>' : '');
09421             inst._keyEvent = false;
09422             return html;
09423       },
09424 
09425       /* Generate the month and year header. */
09426       _generateMonthYearHeader: function(inst, drawMonth, drawYear, minDate, maxDate,
09427                   secondary, monthNames, monthNamesShort) {
09428             var changeMonth = this._get(inst, 'changeMonth');
09429             var changeYear = this._get(inst, 'changeYear');
09430             var showMonthAfterYear = this._get(inst, 'showMonthAfterYear');
09431             var html = '<div class="ui-datepicker-title">';
09432             var monthHtml = '';
09433             // month selection
09434             if (secondary || !changeMonth)
09435                   monthHtml += '<span class="ui-datepicker-month">' + monthNames[drawMonth] + '</span>';
09436             else {
09437                   var inMinYear = (minDate && minDate.getFullYear() == drawYear);
09438                   var inMaxYear = (maxDate && maxDate.getFullYear() == drawYear);
09439                   monthHtml += '<select class="ui-datepicker-month" ' +
09440                         'onchange="DP_jQuery_' + dpuuid + '.datepicker._selectMonthYear(\'#' + inst.id + '\', this, \'M\');" ' +
09441                         'onclick="DP_jQuery_' + dpuuid + '.datepicker._clickMonthYear(\'#' + inst.id + '\');"' +
09442                         '>';
09443                   for (var month = 0; month < 12; month++) {
09444                         if ((!inMinYear || month >= minDate.getMonth()) &&
09445                                     (!inMaxYear || month <= maxDate.getMonth()))
09446                               monthHtml += '<option value="' + month + '"' +
09447                                     (month == drawMonth ? ' selected="selected"' : '') +
09448                                     '>' + monthNamesShort[month] + '</option>';
09449                   }
09450                   monthHtml += '</select>';
09451             }
09452             if (!showMonthAfterYear)
09453                   html += monthHtml + (secondary || !(changeMonth && changeYear) ? '&#xa0;' : '');
09454             // year selection
09455             if (secondary || !changeYear)
09456                   html += '<span class="ui-datepicker-year">' + drawYear + '</span>';
09457             else {
09458                   // determine range of years to display
09459                   var years = this._get(inst, 'yearRange').split(':');
09460                   var thisYear = new Date().getFullYear();
09461                   var determineYear = function(value) {
09462                         var year = (value.match(/c[+-].*/) ? drawYear + parseInt(value.substring(1), 10) :
09463                               (value.match(/[+-].*/) ? thisYear + parseInt(value, 10) :
09464                               parseInt(value, 10)));
09465                         return (isNaN(year) ? thisYear : year);
09466                   };
09467                   var year = determineYear(years[0]);
09468                   var endYear = Math.max(year, determineYear(years[1] || ''));
09469                   year = (minDate ? Math.max(year, minDate.getFullYear()) : year);
09470                   endYear = (maxDate ? Math.min(endYear, maxDate.getFullYear()) : endYear);
09471                   html += '<select class="ui-datepicker-year" ' +
09472                         'onchange="DP_jQuery_' + dpuuid + '.datepicker._selectMonthYear(\'#' + inst.id + '\', this, \'Y\');" ' +
09473                         'onclick="DP_jQuery_' + dpuuid + '.datepicker._clickMonthYear(\'#' + inst.id + '\');"' +
09474                         '>';
09475                   for (; year <= endYear; year++) {
09476                         html += '<option value="' + year + '"' +
09477                               (year == drawYear ? ' selected="selected"' : '') +
09478                               '>' + year + '</option>';
09479                   }
09480                   html += '</select>';
09481             }
09482             html += this._get(inst, 'yearSuffix');
09483             if (showMonthAfterYear)
09484                   html += (secondary || !(changeMonth && changeYear) ? '&#xa0;' : '') + monthHtml;
09485             html += '</div>'; // Close datepicker_header
09486             return html;
09487       },
09488 
09489       /* Adjust one of the date sub-fields. */
09490       _adjustInstDate: function(inst, offset, period) {
09491             var year = inst.drawYear + (period == 'Y' ? offset : 0);
09492             var month = inst.drawMonth + (period == 'M' ? offset : 0);
09493             var day = Math.min(inst.selectedDay, this._getDaysInMonth(year, month)) +
09494                   (period == 'D' ? offset : 0);
09495             var date = this._restrictMinMax(inst,
09496                   this._daylightSavingAdjust(new Date(year, month, day)));
09497             inst.selectedDay = date.getDate();
09498             inst.drawMonth = inst.selectedMonth = date.getMonth();
09499             inst.drawYear = inst.selectedYear = date.getFullYear();
09500             if (period == 'M' || period == 'Y')
09501                   this._notifyChange(inst);
09502       },
09503 
09504       /* Ensure a date is within any min/max bounds. */
09505       _restrictMinMax: function(inst, date) {
09506             var minDate = this._getMinMaxDate(inst, 'min');
09507             var maxDate = this._getMinMaxDate(inst, 'max');
09508             date = (minDate && date < minDate ? minDate : date);
09509             date = (maxDate && date > maxDate ? maxDate : date);
09510             return date;
09511       },
09512 
09513       /* Notify change of month/year. */
09514       _notifyChange: function(inst) {
09515             var onChange = this._get(inst, 'onChangeMonthYear');
09516             if (onChange)
09517                   onChange.apply((inst.input ? inst.input[0] : null),
09518                         [inst.selectedYear, inst.selectedMonth + 1, inst]);
09519       },
09520 
09521       /* Determine the number of months to show. */
09522       _getNumberOfMonths: function(inst) {
09523             var numMonths = this._get(inst, 'numberOfMonths');
09524             return (numMonths == null ? [1, 1] : (typeof numMonths == 'number' ? [1, numMonths] : numMonths));
09525       },
09526 
09527       /* Determine the current maximum date - ensure no time components are set. */
09528       _getMinMaxDate: function(inst, minMax) {
09529             return this._determineDate(inst, this._get(inst, minMax + 'Date'), null);
09530       },
09531 
09532       /* Find the number of days in a given month. */
09533       _getDaysInMonth: function(year, month) {
09534             return 32 - new Date(year, month, 32).getDate();
09535       },
09536 
09537       /* Find the day of the week of the first of a month. */
09538       _getFirstDayOfMonth: function(year, month) {
09539             return new Date(year, month, 1).getDay();
09540       },
09541 
09542       /* Determines if we should allow a "next/prev" month display change. */
09543       _canAdjustMonth: function(inst, offset, curYear, curMonth) {
09544             var numMonths = this._getNumberOfMonths(inst);
09545             var date = this._daylightSavingAdjust(new Date(curYear,
09546                   curMonth + (offset < 0 ? offset : numMonths[0] * numMonths[1]), 1));
09547             if (offset < 0)
09548                   date.setDate(this._getDaysInMonth(date.getFullYear(), date.getMonth()));
09549             return this._isInRange(inst, date);
09550       },
09551 
09552       /* Is the given date in the accepted range? */
09553       _isInRange: function(inst, date) {
09554             var minDate = this._getMinMaxDate(inst, 'min');
09555             var maxDate = this._getMinMaxDate(inst, 'max');
09556             return ((!minDate || date.getTime() >= minDate.getTime()) &&
09557                   (!maxDate || date.getTime() <= maxDate.getTime()));
09558       },
09559 
09560       /* Provide the configuration settings for formatting/parsing. */
09561       _getFormatConfig: function(inst) {
09562             var shortYearCutoff = this._get(inst, 'shortYearCutoff');
09563             shortYearCutoff = (typeof shortYearCutoff != 'string' ? shortYearCutoff :
09564                   new Date().getFullYear() % 100 + parseInt(shortYearCutoff, 10));
09565             return {shortYearCutoff: shortYearCutoff,
09566                   dayNamesShort: this._get(inst, 'dayNamesShort'), dayNames: this._get(inst, 'dayNames'),
09567                   monthNamesShort: this._get(inst, 'monthNamesShort'), monthNames: this._get(inst, 'monthNames')};
09568       },
09569 
09570       /* Format the given date for display. */
09571       _formatDate: function(inst, day, month, year) {
09572             if (!day) {
09573                   inst.currentDay = inst.selectedDay;
09574                   inst.currentMonth = inst.selectedMonth;
09575                   inst.currentYear = inst.selectedYear;
09576             }
09577             var date = (day ? (typeof day == 'object' ? day :
09578                   this._daylightSavingAdjust(new Date(year, month, day))) :
09579                   this._daylightSavingAdjust(new Date(inst.currentYear, inst.currentMonth, inst.currentDay)));
09580             return this.formatDate(this._get(inst, 'dateFormat'), date, this._getFormatConfig(inst));
09581       }
09582 });
09583 
09584 /* jQuery extend now ignores nulls! */
09585 function extendRemove(target, props) {
09586       $.extend(target, props);
09587       for (var name in props)
09588             if (props[name] == null || props[name] == undefined)
09589                   target[name] = props[name];
09590       return target;
09591 };
09592 
09593 /* Determine whether an object is an array. */
09594 function isArray(a) {
09595       return (a && (($.browser.safari && typeof a == 'object' && a.length) ||
09596             (a.constructor && a.constructor.toString().match(/\Array\(\)/))));
09597 };
09598 
09599 /* Invoke the datepicker functionality.
09600    @param  options  string - a command, optionally followed by additional parameters or
09601                     Object - settings for attaching new datepicker functionality
09602    @return  jQuery object */
09603 $.fn.datepicker = function(options){
09604 
09605       /* Initialise the date picker. */
09606       if (!$.datepicker.initialized) {
09607             $(document).mousedown($.datepicker._checkExternalClick).
09608                   find('body').append($.datepicker.dpDiv);
09609             $.datepicker.initialized = true;
09610       }
09611 
09612       var otherArgs = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments, 1);
09613       if (typeof options == 'string' && (options == 'isDisabled' || options == 'getDate' || options == 'widget'))
09614             return $.datepicker['_' + options + 'Datepicker'].
09615                   apply($.datepicker, [this[0]].concat(otherArgs));
09616       if (options == 'option' && arguments.length == 2 && typeof arguments[1] == 'string')
09617             return $.datepicker['_' + options + 'Datepicker'].
09618                   apply($.datepicker, [this[0]].concat(otherArgs));
09619       return this.each(function() {
09620             typeof options == 'string' ?
09621                   $.datepicker['_' + options + 'Datepicker'].
09622                         apply($.datepicker, [this].concat(otherArgs)) :
09623                   $.datepicker._attachDatepicker(this, options);
09624       });
09625 };
09626 
09627 $.datepicker = new Datepicker(); // singleton instance
09628 $.datepicker.initialized = false;
09629 $.datepicker.uuid = new Date().getTime();
09630 $.datepicker.version = "1.8.4";
09631 
09632 // Workaround for #4055
09633 // Add another global to avoid noConflict issues with inline event handlers
09634 window['DP_jQuery_' + dpuuid] = $;
09635 
09636 })(jQuery);
09637 /*
09638  * jQuery UI Progressbar 1.8.4
09639  *
09640  * Copyright 2010, AUTHORS.txt (http://jqueryui.com/about)
09641  * Dual licensed under the MIT or GPL Version 2 licenses.
09642  * http://jquery.org/license
09643  *
09644  * http://docs.jquery.com/UI/Progressbar
09645  *
09646  * Depends:
09647  *   jquery.ui.core.js
09648  *   jquery.ui.widget.js
09649  */
09650 (function( $, undefined ) {
09651 
09652 $.widget( "ui.progressbar", {
09653       options: {
